title: Without Luna
description:
This is a parody cover of Eminem's Without Me, with lyrics that retell the story of Luna Eclipsed. 

Lyrics: 

Two Canterlot ponies stuck on the moon

Guess who's back... back again... Luna's back... tell a friend

I must just be a monster
'Cause nopony wants to see Nightmare no more, they want Luna, I'm chopped liver
Well if you want Luna, this is what I'll give ya
A little bit of LOUDNESS from the royal sister
Some nightmares that'll jumpstart your heart quicker than the shock
Rainbow Dash got at the hospital when she stopped
Sitting around and started reading
Figured out Daring Do's really captivating
You waited this long to stop debating
Well I'm back, the fun has been doubled, and some still hating
I know that you're having fun miss Pinkie
But your manic antics are aggravating
So the CMC's all scared of me
Won't let me be me, so help me please
I tried to shut down Nightmare Night you see
But they felt so empty without me, so
Whatever kids, I'll do it for kicks
After all, they seem to love it, especially Pip
But get ready, 'cause this night's about to get scary
'Cause I'm gonna let her out, here comes NIGHTMARE BABY!

(chorus (X2))
Now this looks like a night for me
So everypony, don't run and scream
Show a little love for the royal we
'Cause you'd feel so empty without me

Little stallions, call off the battalions
I'm rockin' this fun, think I've won some medallions
Been in prison years counted in thousands
'till someone came along on a mission and yelled, "FRIEND!"
A visionary, Twilight is scary
A friendship revolution
She tells me come down to her level
First just let me revel and bask in the fact that I got everypony kissin' my (flank)
But it's a disaster, such a catastrophe
That you could see so little of my face you're scared of me
Well I'm back, princess Luna Luna Luna Luna
Makin' my debut no soona soona soona soona
Spiders I'm tossin, apples I'm bobbin', like a winner
The center of attention, back for the winter
I'm interesting, best princess non-Celestine
Done resting in your kids' fears and nesting
(TESTING, ATTENTION PONIES)
Feel the tension every time I'm on the screen
An announcement - a royal decree
YOU'RE GOING TO LOVE ME!

(chorus (X2)) 

Ya'll better back it, I'll go tit for tat with
Anypony whose makin' children frantic
Rainbow Dash, kid, you gon' get your cloud kicked
Worse than these little Pinkie Pie antics and
Twilight, well I guess you are alright
Even dressed up as a couple-thousand-year-old guy
But Fluttershy, come on now, let go
It's over, CAN'T YOU SEE I AM NOT NIGHTMARE?
Let's be fair, just gimme a signal
Anytime that my royal voice comes off as an insult
I've been gone - on the moon for so long
I kinda don't even know where I'm going wrong
But sometimes, it just seems
Everypony only wants to run from me
Well this must mean that I'm frightening
What do you see that's so obscene?
Well I'm not the real queen of Equestria
I'm not the worst thing since Trollestia
Who used her student so selfishly
But I'm just glad her friendship helped me
Hey! There's a concept that works
Concentrated friendship in magical bursts
Now I hope that the magic can make them see
They would feel so empty without me

(chorus (X2))

title: Revelations
description: I tried out something new for this song, so it took a little longer than expected. Rather than writing the song on guitar, and transposing it by hand like I usually do, I decided it would be a little more interesting to record it live with a keyboard. It took much longer than expected though, which is why it's so late. I just winged it for most of the violin part, so I apologize if something sounds a little off.

title: The abandoned mansion
description:
There is a abandoned mansion in the middle of Canterlot. All of Canterlots inhabitants knows about it, altough they rarely acknowledges it.
Rumors say that the mansion is haunted; a few ponies also say that they've actually seen ghosts and spirits in the broken windows. Celesta, wise as she is, 
doesn't really know what to make of all the rumors. She decides that there is only one way to figure it out. 
She sends the Mane6 to investigate and report back to her about her findings.

title: Interrobang Pie befriends Kil6969 - Wily Invades Equestria
description:
Dr. Wily has found a new place to terrorize, but can Mega Man save this mysterious land or are the ponies' fates sealed??!?!

I used Famitracker (VRC6) to make a remixed Kil6969's "Winter Wrap Up 8bit Boss Battle", which you can find here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=93C6gqdEej0. I also stuck in some Mega Man SFX to stay topical.

title: Interrobang Pie x Sci - Cerebral Meltdown
description:
Pinkamena doesn't like a party of one - she wants to share the fun! She waited for the perfect, peaceful afternoon, in which she unleashed her best party yet. Unfortunately, her new idea of a party involves the murder of several citizens of Ponyville. What measures must be taken to stop Pinkamena's bloodthirsty rampage?

This is (one of) my challenge entries for the Brony Remix War III. This war's challenge was to collaborate with another brony - I chose fellow tracker Sci. 

You can find more of Sci's cool work here: http://www.youtube.com/user/scibot9000

title: The Manliest Brony in the World
Solar Empire VS Lunar Republic
description:
Solar Empire is beast son, my name is intentionally on the better side, get lost H@t3rs!

Does this count as a remix? I guess it's a mashup of a remix and an original song which wasn't released in the first place.

I am not a big fan of the sounds I've used, or the overall mixing, but I didn't want to just load it with bass, and just when I was about to master/equalize, my PC died, so I transfered my soundcard to another but it has a lot of static and just sounds differently here, goddamn ancient motherboard :(

Let's give some credits shall we:

For a New Lunar Republic: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sf0tYs5U5RI
..by iamnotacleverpony: http://www.youtube.com/iamnotacleverpony

Right side of the picture by Makkon: http://makkon.deviantart.com/art/New-Lunar-Republic-210931331

Left side @ Photoshop :)

Also, additional vocal samples by VozDeSuenos: http://www.youtube.com/user/VozDeSuenos

-CS

title: Black alleys of Canterlot
description:
I've really wanted to create a detective-ish tune for some time, and this is the outcome. 
 I actually planned to have my own voice in this one, i would tell the audience a story while the song played in the background. But, the mic i was planning to use wasn't good enough, so i decided to just do the song instead. 
I also planned on having samples in it, but it was pretty hard to find any that actually fit with the story i wanted to tell.

title: Zecora (Winter Rap-up)
description:
from nothing to this in 3 hours. Would've done more but I only knew about this until one day before submission. Submission for the winter rap-up thingie

Lyrics:
Tell me the hobbies of Zecora
She into fauna or she into flora
I have no idea. how about you
only give answer if you know it too

some say she is into witchcraft
trying to brew the ultimate witch-draft
She's seen with TS, that odd purple filly
is there a cult down in everfree?

or perhaps she's just likes flowers
and she trots around them for hours
admiring the vegetation
and observing if there's a relation
between what the plants do and what she can see

Or maybe she draws her my little human OC

title: Allegedly Cold-Hearted (Winter Rap Off: Round 1)
description:
My first musical composition ever.

I literally have no skill with any of this stuff... ^.^;

Lyrics:

A zebra always hears about bein cold-hearted 
And those stripes? Don't even get me started, bout the 
Stereotypes, runnin your life, let me just impart a 
Bit of wisdom, if you'll listen, bout my girl Zecora

She's got a, bubblin cauldron, used for cookin foals allegedly 
Witchcraft? You can't be serious, you're kiddin me 
I can't just make you open up your eyes and really see, but 
If you did you'd know, that in that bowl, is just your average home remedy

title: Interrobang Pie - The Clanky Doodle 2000
description:
Pinkie Pie has angered Cranky so much that he's built a giant robot and is now going to exterminate everything!!! This backstory makes no sense.

A 2A03 remix of Yankee Doodle, which was a pleasant surprise to the credits of the most recent episode! This track uses a lot of techniques and wierd and random things that I've never really tried before, so sorry if you're put off!! It's also a tiny little bit of a stylistic emulation of HertzDevil, but only a little bit. DON'T GET MAD AT ME, HERTZYBABES~

This song is designed to loop, and so plays through twice! You can download and play the NSF for an infinitely looping version though!

NSF: http://www.mediafire.com/?wid6uqbou7qhser
FTM: http://www.mediafire.com/?d0capu99j9c70gp

title: Interrobang Pie befriends StormWolf - Dedede Invades Equestria
description:
The spiritual successor to Wily Invades Equestria has finally arrived! How will Equestria fare against a new villain, namely King Dedede and his army of bulgy walking eyeballs?

This is a follow-up to a previous track of mine - I used a similar formula in terms of structure and design, but I can assure you it's a completely different track. It's pretty long track at that, which is rather unheard of for me. Hopefully it won't bore you stiff, though!

This is a remix of StormWolf's amazing original piece, The Beginning of Order. I recommend you listen to the original right now! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LtIIGf7p4Aw

I also mashed in King Dedede's recurring theme from the Kirby series, and a few other jingles. Go listen to an example of Dedede's theme here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l1WuYXdETjc

Massive massive thanks to General Mumble for making the artwork! He's such a pro, it's unbelievable. Artwork is avaliable on his deviantArt: http://poowis.deviantart.com/art/Interrobang-Pie-Dedede-invades-song-art-276702841

Another "Becoming Popular" remix... but it's better than YOURS.

When Rarity's "Becoming Popular" song made it's debut, i must admit that it didn't sit well with me. It's not to say it wasn't a good song, but I felt like it's disney-musical style didn't fit what was basically a shallow, lie-filled ego-trip... SO i decided to take matters into my own hands! title: Never back down (Ft. Gyro and MrKyuub)
Equestrian Anthem- Glory to Our Princess (feat. Overkillus)
description:
All hail the mighty Overkillus for singing on this song.
This is the Equestrian Anthem in the spirit of the whole Pony/ Soviet Equestria thing.
I would like to also thank Oliver Codd and A. Alexandrov for the inspirational music I listened to before writing this. 

Lyrics:

Beloved fair land Equestria
Shining pearl of creation
Glory and Victory Bless us
the trials that we face are always hard

We as a nation have always prevailed 
through the times which we have all shed tears
for we are led by voice of the Goddess 
of the golden sun

We marched onwards through the dark void
when there were no stars to guide
broke through the lies cast from chaos
the armies of Discord were destroyed

We as a nation have always prevailed 
through the times which we have all shed tears
for we are led by voice of the Goddess 
of the golden sun and now we

March onwards to the future
we face whatever comes
there will be some who will fear it
but they needn't despair for we are

Sons and Daughters of greatness!
there is no challenge we won't face
for the sun and glory to our land
our voices will climb to the heavens we

All hail our princess!
Celestia our Goddess
your golden wisdom won't lead us astray!
Beloved mother 
please lead us from darkness
your divine light shall show us the way!

title: HeZeD & Code befriend Glaze - Cirno Invades Equestria
description:
VERBATIM:

"Collab with CodeLimit a.k.a. LunaticBone: http://youtube.com/user/LunaticBone

Verbatim:
"After suffering dozens of humiliating defeats, Cirno sets out to make herself stronger by challenging every opponent she comes across. Discovering a dimensional rift near the edge of Gensokyo, she wanders into Equestria, hoping to find some new challengers. These colorful ponies are just more target practice to her, and she begins a great freezeover, shrouding the inhabitants in ice and snow. Can the Elements of Harmony come together once more to combat the strongest foe Equestria has ever known?

This song originally began as a little injoke between me and HertzDevil, referring to Interrobang Pie's series of "Invade" remixes and Hertz's Cirno fetish. But after realizing that it was a fantastic opportunity for an immense collaboration project, Hertz got quickly to work and we developed it into what is now a deadly 8-minute reincarnation of Interrobang Pie himself.

This is a remix of WoodenToaster's track "She's A Pony". Since the 23rd is his birthday, I suppose you could consider this a birthday present!"

And yes. Quinton Miller is BACK. No pie is consumed for the making of this remix.

MP3 Download: --
NSF Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?8xif1pe1s63tky3
FTM Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?hjxb9h28jol6sif
PNG Download: --
SWF Download: http://hertzdevil.deviantart.com/art/Cirno-Invades-Equestria-VRC6-281055975"

Alt: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FV_0NTThJ9g

Octavia + DnB = :D Was originally planned to include lyrics, but it can't be helped :(

Inspired by Chain Algorithm's track Elements of Harmonics, which I'm sure you know of :)

Also, Pinkie somehow broke in the recording studio, somehow..

I don't have an idea who's playing the counterparts, you choose. It might be a separate recording anyways ^^ I guess Vinyl helped because Octavia is helpless putting it all together.

I wish I had decent string VSTs so I could make violins and chellos sound realistic tho..

Who said she only does classical music? ;)

Sorry to end it abruptly, didn't want to extend it any longer.

Original art by Rautakoura: http://rautakoura.deviantart.com/art/Octavia-s-Fiery-Concerto-269492452


-CommandSpry

description:

WAV 1536 kbps download: http://www.mediafire.com/?k35028prylz94my

SoundCloud: http://soundcloud.com/thorinair
YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/Thorinair 
Visit my Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Thorinair-Music/181104641974397
Visit my deviantART page: http://thorinair.deviantart.com/
Follow me on Tumblr: http://thorinair-music.tumblr.com/


----- 500 SUBSCRIBER SPECIAL -----

Woah, thanks so much guys for 500 subs!!! My 500th subscriber was Bartekko (http://www.youtube.com/user/bartekkko), go visit him now!

Okay, for this original track, I decided to go towards a bit more harder side of trance. We all know how Applejack is strong and all, yet loyal and can fill your heart with warmth. My idea was to try and describe this using contrasts in my track between beautiful and full-out dark. The track is mostly inspired by the episode "Applebuck Season". Whole intro of the track describes Applejack getting ready for the Applebuck Season. She is determined to succeed. The moment when the drop happens is the moment where she begins her hard work. I tried to simulate her raw energy and willpower in the drop.

Hope you like it!

title: "Kudasai" : [INTENSE ANIME HARD TRANCE]
description:
I think it's time I try to merge my hardstyle with the rawness of hard trance itself. I am very pleased with this song and how it turned out. Expect more of this style of music to come in the near future and throughout 2015.

@Tokyo Magika Productions 2014, LLC.

title: Winter Rap Off round 1 - Berd's verse
description:
Lemme take you on a trip through the Everfree forest,
To a little hut where a zebra named Zecora lives,
Using herbology and chemistry to conjure up remedies,
To cure whatever ails you readily,
Some Devil's Haze, some Heart's Desire,
Put the herbs in a bowl and spark a fire,
Speaks in rhyme, all the time, always keep them verses flowin',
Looking for the perfect potion, keeping up the stirring motion,
On that double double, toil and trouble,
Cauldron boil and bubble, Zecora toys with the puzzle,
Of what could make a solution of miracles, boy,
As she chants her incantation with that lyrical voice,
Sits back to relax, enjoy herself some solitude,
Then back to the lab for the creation of molecules,
Impossible? Maybe, but then again the townponies say she's crazy,
So hide your wives and your babies.

title: Shine Like a Diamond
description:
I-DE-A!: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=roXJuJfbdG4
Finally - an idea for my Six EP. This time is a trance dedication to a very creative and beautiful pony from Ponyville - Rarity.
This track is gentle like her usually behavior, we are dealing with a lady, after all. But also dynamic like Rares during her work. In fact, her I-DE-AS are as same as mine. Sometimes I have an idea from nowhere! Seriously! And when I have it, I just must create until it's done. Just like Rarity. Also the track is a little bit sharpy - I think you know why... Beware the Marshmallow Kick!
Gentle and sharpy, kind, creative, very feminine, beautiful... and with talent to fashion and for searching gems. Element of Generosity. Voiced by Tabitha St. Germain.
Rarity...

title: What Does Zecora Do? (Winter Rap Off r1)
description:
Fillies and Gentlecolts!!
Now presenting, from the mad mind of Automatic Jack!!
February 2012's
Winter Rap-Off   
Here we go!!

Boom shakka lakka!

Wit the whole forest free to roam
Zecora has her options, she can
gather leaves and mushrooms or
mix up a mad concoction 

But when all the bidness handled
there's one thing I gotta know:
What does Zecora do?
Nopony knows!!

She could be a smug thug smugglin'
jugs of bugs she dug up out the
dirty dirt and chuggin' 40's
with a voodoo donut for desert,

Or an undercover scientist from Canterlot,
who's naturalistic instincts made 'er
move to where the weather's hot

Or maybe she a zombie huntin'
merc who's perks inculude a same day
service makin' everything un-dead
for miles very nervous,

Service with a smile but I'll
never really know, because
What does Zecora do?
Nopony knows!!

Smart money's on the bet that she don't
ever stop her brewin, chewin'
roots an leaves an herbs to curb the
aches and pains and keep it stewin'

Remedy for anything an
everything and everypony
sings her praise for days in ways u
can't begin to understand...

Ha ha ha ha, I mean shit, man,
what DOES Zecora get up to in that forest?
It's like 800,000,000 acres wide...
The Cutie Mark Crusaders all roamin' all over it all the time...
I just... I just don't even know anymore, man...

title: Spiders on the Web
description:
As the sun begins to rise after Luna's night in Ponyville, she reflects; struggling to understand her life through the spectrum of a Nightmare Night tradition.

Based on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Season 2 Episode 4 - Luna Eclipsed.

MP3 DOWNLOAD: http://www.mediafire.com/?jkasyq03ke474ky

See the rest of the ERS04 (Episode Response) Toastbeard here: http://toastbeard.comli.com/pony/a/ERS04/

LYRICS
What are we,
But disgusting things,
Thrown back in to the tangle?
When we fall,
How many points do we receive?
What are we worth?
Who knows?
If there was an answer
We can't remember.
It feels like we've been hanging here
In this web forever
But still...

Here we are
Spiders on the web,
Together.

Pray tell
What purpose do we serve?
The eight-legged sister
To a goddess,
Who can only show up to scare Ponyville
But still...
We're not weak like them and
We won't die like them and
We're not like them
We are alone,
But still...

title: Flutterdream (Original Mix)
description:
WAV 1536 kbps download: http://www.mediafire.com/?bg98c3mudgvydrg
Album Artwork download: http://www.mediafire.com/i/?l91tfxv45km3254

SoundCloud: http://soundcloud.com/thorinair
YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/Thorinair
Visit my Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Thorinair-Music/181104641974397
Visit my deviantART page: http://thorinair.deviantart.com/
Follow me on Tumblr: http://thorinair-music.tumblr.com/


Ok, I don't like something with this new track I made. Some producers in here might notice I used a sample for the pad. I am not all that good with creating melodies, and when I heard the sample, I simply WANTED to use it. To compensate for this, I tried layering more synths over the original sample to somewhat mask it... Maybe being my first "original" track, you can somehow look past it.

I still hate myself for using the sample.

Anyway, now that we got over the painful and shameful part of this track, we can actually discuss it!
Obviously, Fluttershy was my inspiration. Don't say it doesn't have anything to do with ponies because it is an INSPIRED track. Just a little idea I had... I just thought a trance track would nicely fit with the cuteness that is Fluttershy! :)

Hope you enjoy!

Special thanks to kurokaji11 (http://kurokaji11.deviantart.com/) for the vector of Fluttershy sleeping! :)

Yay, finally a different intro! Twilight seems to like sending "trance letters" to Princess Celestia! :D

What I like about this track: it sounds a bit different than my previous tracks. 
What I don't like about it: it has a slightly too long intro maybe and the melody is played throughout the whole track.

Also, seems I like to produce trance the most! It fills me with great joy to hear all the harmonic melodies. :)

Anyway, Hope you enjoy!

Special thanks to RilDraw (http://rildraw.deviantart.com/) for the awesome Twilight  Sparkle vector! :D

title: Snowfall in Ponyville
description:
I made this with the idea of soundtracking the season's first snowfall in ponyville. 

The middle part can be interpreted however you want, but I imagined it as trotting past houses on which loose wooden boards were knocking against each other in the wind. 

tl;dr: it's a song about ponies and snow, I hope you like it :D

description:

STORY !  !! ! !! 
Vinyl was playing one of her gigs, started playing her best hit, and noticed something strange on the dancefloor. 
Everypony was dancing, save for one grey pony...that was floating above the floor!

Thanks to ATR for the fantastic track as I loved the original instrumental and it gave me a lot to work with plus they've also been my closest friend on MLR.

title: Pinkie Cake - Gamemaster (Freewave's Remix)
description: The second Discord themed remix, this too had some orchestral themes and dialogue added but was a dark dubstep. This wasn't a huge leap from the original track but I found there were enough things I wanted to change and (hopefully) improve upon that it led to this remix. Glad to have 2 great Discord remixes. Overall I enjoyed doing this remix although i really still feel i haven't mastered dubstep (whether original style or brostep) to the best of my abilities quite yet.

title: The Rainbow Dash Cheer Song
description:
This Moment in the show really touched me for some reason. So I wrote a song about it. And for once, used vocals. My voice sucked when I recorded this, and it still sucks today!

Most sounds used are mine, recorded using a mic, but a few are (obviously) taken from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. I claim no ownership of them.

-----

Lyrics:

Who's always first to the scene,
When there is a pony in need?
Who'll be there to save the day,
And in the coolest way?

She'll be there, ready to fly.
call for help, she won't pass you by.
If you need a helping hand,
she'll come to make a stand.

Rainbow Dash!
It's time to try your best, now!
Never, ever break your vow!
If there's trouble, be there in a flash!
Never give up, Rainbow Dash!
You can win,
If you don't hold back here,
So in earnest do we cheer!
If there's trouble, be there in a flash!
Never give up, Rainbow Dash!

You stand up, even alone,
Ready to protect our home.
Ponyville depends on you, 
So you must carry through!

Rainbow Dash!
It's time to try your best, now!
Never, ever break your vow!
If there's trouble, be there in a flash!
Never give up, Rainbow Dash!
You can win,
If you don't hold back here,
So in earnest do we cheer!
If there's trouble, be there in a flash!
Never give up, Rainbow Dash!

title: Deae Lunae (Thorinair Remix)
description:
MP3 320 kbps download: http://www.mediafire.com/?0zex90xnn6oieit
WAV 1536 kbps download: http://www.mediafire.com/?listdbwjou2j37j
Album Artwork download: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1739027/MLP/Makkon%20-%20Deae%20Lunae%20%28Thorinair%20Remix%29.png

To make more awesome music, I will need to buy more software and hardware equipment, which costs. Feeling generous? You can help by donating! http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1739027/Donate/donate.html

SoundCloud: http://soundcloud.com/thorinair
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/Thorinair
Visit my Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Thorinair-Music/181104641974397
Visit my deviantART page: http://thorinair.deviantart.com/
Follow me on Tumblr: http://thorinair-music.tumblr.com/
PonySquare: http://ponysquare.com/Thorinair/

Makkon's channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/makkon06
Original: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6NbyUtARW6I


Ahh, finally a new track after such a long time... Sorry to keep you waiting!

Here, I present to you, my remix of Makkon's Deae Lunae.
Imagine how it would feel to be a princess of the Moon, yet being imprisoned in the same Moon for a thousand years... That is the story of Nightmare Moon...
I don't know if this is the inspiration Makkon originally had, but it is how I saw the track... :)
Makkon's original is simply fantastic. I couldn't believe my ears when I heard it the first time. After I "recovered", I thought, how would it sound like trance?

Hope you like it!

Special thanks to Makkon ( http://www.youtube.com/user/makkon06 ) for making one of the best classical/film music compositions in the community!

The amazing picture used in artwork was made by C-Puff ( http://c-puff.deviantart.com/ ). You should definitely go check out her work!

title: Don't You See?
description:
Woo! Back after a three month dry-spell.

So, a lot of people seemed to like "Hush" over my other tracks, and I had a lot of fun making it, so I figured I'd try my hand at ambient once more. I kinda lost control of it though, and ended up with something that exists in the gulf between ambient and trip-hop. Not my intention, but hey, whatever works.

Made over the course of a single fifteen hour session in Ableton. I've honestly never had this much fun making music before. It's good to be back.

title: Daring Do and the Quest for the Sapphire Statue
description:
FULL CREDIT for the picture goes to http://newfrenchartist.deviantart.com/art/The-Awesome-Dar... ! Check out their page! Amazing artist right there.

0:00-0:20

The first 20 seconds bring us to Daring Do, standing in front of the temple with bated breath, no way to know what lies inside. She takes her first steps inside the temple

0:21-2:00

Daring Do cautiously makes her way through the temple, studying the cryptic signs on the walls before her. She realizes, in a rather harsh manner, that the place she is in does not want her there. Her dance through the temple, narrowly avoiding death at every corner, begins.

2:01-2:20

Daring Do finds the treasure she's been seeking, and is filled with joy. However...

2:20-3:12

The temple begins to collapse around Daring Do, and suddenly she has to think fast, or burn. She narrowly escapes death by lava, and breathes a sigh of relief as she climbs with her life. However, her relief is short lived...

3:12-4:00

Daring Do is captured by her evil nemesis, Ahuizotl. Suddenly, she realizes that burning to death would have been preferable over what she was about to experience at the hands of Ahuizotl. 

4:00-End

Daring Do once again, narrowly escapes with her life. Our heroine then swiftly retrieves the Sapphire Statue from Ahuizotl, prevailing victorious once again.

The end. Hope you enjoyed!

title: The Twisa Spajor Non-Stop Party Adventure [Winter Rap Off Round 2]
description:
[b][i]The Twisa Spajor Non-Stop Party Adventure[/i][/b]
by
[b][i]Automatic Jack[/b][/i]

[b][Announcer][/b]
[i]Hello again Fillies and Gentlecolts, and welcome back to Winter Rap Off!
This time it's Round 2 with AutomaticJack doing a WEIRD song... Here we go!![/i]

[b][v1][/b]
Well it was a fine day, fine hay, anyway,
Twilight took a stroll and found a strange gateway,
And on the otha side a dark place, dangerous like Park Place,
Lookin' like a fully-extra-normal-alternate-dimensional space,

So, of course, she took a look inside,
A unicorn's magic horn is good for keepin' you alive,
Cause an Ursa Major's den is somethin' you don't undastand,
It will bend your sense of self until you break down and die, man,

What else happens?[/i]

But Twilight was a strong pony, braver than most,
and so she, shuffled on through, fearin' nothin' 'til it got close,
And that's when she realized, it wasn't dark at all,
that the Ursa Major was the darkness, wide as it was tall,

With a yawn and a roar, the Ursa Major woke up and stared
Twilight in the eye, as it sized the Pony up,
but she stood her ground firm, and she stared right back,
and the Ursa never rose and never tried to attack,

Go skiing, Go skating, Ghost ride the '87,
Tag Walls, Prank calls, Turn the amp up to 11,
Go Karts, Dirtbikes, take the metro straight to heaven,

[b][Fin][/b]
and that was that,
end of story,
what'd u think'd happen,
somethin' gory?

What?They gotta battle? No way!! Not necessary!
Ursa Major's are very passive when they don't have a Minor to watch out for;
they don't like fear, but they don't mind company...
It's all good!

This is based off the "New Lunar Republic" idea. Tyrant Celestia and Rebel Luna happens to be something I like, and it works rather nicely with dark, dramatic music.

-----

Lyrics:

Tyranny and bigotry.
She who rules the land won't hear our plea.
With her so-called "harmony,"
she expects us all to bend our knee.

She has power over all.
Everypony's at her beck and call.
Though our powers are very small,
We'll be watching her, plotting her fall.

Gone are the days when the sun did shine.
Gone are the days of Celestia, divine.
Gone are the days of solar tyranny,
Darkness comes for thee!

Gone are the days when the daytime prevails.
Gone are the days when the shadow fails.
Gone are the days, so say "farewell"
Nighttime is eternal!

When the true princess appears,

We'll fight back with our blood, sweat, and tears.

Nevermore will tyrants reign.
Our forces will always be their bane.

Never to behold the light again.

title: The last stand
description:
"EEK!", yelled Fluttershy as the dragon flame engulfed her flank, her yellow and smooth fur turning black and charred with a hiss. 
With a loud thud, she hit the ground, cringing and crying. 
"Fluttershy darling!", Rarity screamed as she ran towards the hurt pegasus. Blood smoothly seeped out of the black wound, coloring Fluttershys fur the tint of a ripe tomato. 
Rarity tore of a piece of her dress with tears in her eyes. She slammed it against the wound, making the young pegasus scream a chilling scream.
The rest of Raritys dress was covered in traces of blood, weither it was her own or dragon blood Twilight didn't know. She hoped it was the latter.
"Twilight, we need to retreat! We are sitting ducks out her!", Rainbow Dash screamed at the lavender unicorn. 
Twilight knew Dash was correct; out here in the open they were going to be decimated by the dragons sooner or later, no matter what they did. Retreating was an option; an option that would 
mean the destruction of Ponyville... and it's citizens.

She was a good leader and strategist in normal cases. When questions related to her friends small problems, she never hesitated. She always knew what she had to say. 
She was never good at big questions.

"No Dash. I am afraid we can't do that.", she said, feeling tears bubbling up inside of her. She was afraid; afraid she wouldn't se Celestia, Luna or anyone else again.
 "If we go, Ponyville will be destroyed. The citizen will die. "
Silence. In the distance you could hear the dragons roaring. It echoed. 
"We need to buy Celestia and her troops more time to get to Ponyville."

"Prepare yourself girls. We make our final stand here!" 

The story above is what i thought of when i made this song. Tried to mix three genres in this song; metal, orchestral and electronical. (A bit lacking on the metal part, according to me)
This is the second war or combat related song i've made in a row now, so i'll probably lay low on those for some time. Something happy and upbeat will probably be next.

title: True Colors
description:
That smile is fake, yo.

I herd you like music so I put slow music in your fast music so you can slow down while going fast :)

I don't usually read or anything, but if someone made a fiction about how Soarin's trying so hard to fit into the wonderbolds and don't appear awkward, I'd totally read that :) It's interesting to me how a person in that position can be on a verge of a breakdown, being very socialy different. So this song is kind of about that :)

This was a sort of experiment, to see how would you master a song on Dr Drum, so I didn't use any filters or additional EQ, only panning, volume, low, high and mid bands (no ajusting), no automations as well, just a simple fade-in effect.

A bit slower this time, but hopefully should be still good :)

Credits given where credit's due:

Original art by BlackM3sh: http://blackm3sh.deviantart.com/gallery/31480814#/d3g0y4i

Art: http://i.imgur.com/an2gc.jpg

-CS

Yeah, sometimes my I-DE-AS are weird. I mean... I do understand it, but explain them to you, guys, is... problematic xd
Well... this is a trance... story about the Everfree Forest. But not that scary one which we all know from the stories. This is my vision of... other Everfree. You know, Everfree from the future or from the alternate universe. Where it is still a little bit scary and mysterious, but that's it. It has lovely weather, sunlights hits between the swishing leaves, birds and crickets are singing all over. Just an ordinary forest with some secrets like abandoned castle or some creepy trees.
Do you like that vision?

Walls of Canterlot
description:
CHECK IT HERE: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nKlbVgxmxjs
***
***
***
Very nice work made by QSteel (careful with it, it's huuuge)
http://fav.me/d474ns9
***
***
***
So today is a great day. I finally made the last track from the EP "Walls of Canterlot" - here you have a title track.
Canterlot is such a beautiful place. It was built by magic of unicorns on the flank of the mountain. Thanks to their spells it has that amazing shape - a lot of towers and walls, gardens and canals, and a waterfalls too! About that is my track. About that beautiful place where our princesses live. About its evergreen gardens and trees with chirping birds, about flowers which sow an amazing aromas. About that small brick streets and alleys. About magnificent royal castle with many gold copings. And, of course, that tune is about walls. Gorgeous white walls.
The track at the beginning is kinda sad... Because I think that our palace has its victims... Making building with magic can be exhausting and for somepony can be deadly... Sad melody is my tribute for all of them. And the horns in the end? That's the voice of royal wedding.

title: David's Hubris
description:
Youtube page: 
Cover Art (by me): http://fav.me/d50sioq
Soundcloud page: http://soundcloud.com/bugsydor/davids-hubris-final

That wicked David is so evil, I even wrote a song about him! This song is supposed to be a theme for a bossfight against the villain David from CardsLafter's amazing MLP:FiM Fanfic, Through the Eyes of Another Pony. I figured that since the fight would take place in a cathedral, it better have a good organ. Then I couldn't find a good organ, and had to settle for a Cello. Octavia, eat your heart out.

Anyhow, the song is my first piece I've made in Linux Multimedia Studio, and really is my first foray into the world of writing my own music rather than singing or playing what somebody else wrote. Feel free to give out constructive criticism, scathing critiques, or glowing gushing sessions here, the youtube page, or on the deviantart page linked above.

A massive thankyou to CardsLafter:, ToastWaffle, and lightningfast for alpha and then beta testing my song, telling me what sucked and how to fix it. I couldn't have done this nearly this well without you guys.

And if anybody's looking for someone to blame for unleashing me onto the world of music creation, the person responsible is CardsLafter. He said since I was so into music I should make my own, and that surely there's a good quality music making program out there (legitimately) for free. He was right, and he has doomed us all.

Fun fact: All of the software used cost me a grand total of $0. Even the extra VSTi's I picked up were freeware.

The cover art: The sparkly cloud int the top-left corner is a chunk of Nightmare Moon's mane, which was included to reference the Nightmare. In the bottom left corner, we have a flame for Firewall. On the right, we have the rose that I drew for Mother's Day, because I figured David would be the kind of guy to grow those impossibly easy to kill things (they die from disease and pests at the drop of a hat), being sophisticated and all that. That, and Firewall hates roses with a burning passion. (ROSEBUSH?! Kill it with fire!)

If you want to use either the song or my album art, in whole or in part, that's perfectly fine with me! Just be sure to credit me, link back to this page, the youtube page, or the DeviantArt page, and drop me a link to wherever you used it. Also, it'd be nice if you asked for permission first. ;)

title: 86'd from CTX [CENSORED] Winter Rap Off Round 3
description:
Winter Rap Off Round 3
Automatic Jack - 86'd from CTX
CENSORED with EXTREME FLANGER =3


[Lyrical Shtuff]

Fillies and Gentlecolts!!
Welcome back to another round of Winter Rap-Off...
This song is performed by Automatic Jack, and tells the tragic tale of how he got kicked out of Canterlot.
HERE WE GO!!


So it's been said u wanna know, just how - the flyin feather,
I got kicked outta Canterlot, with all it's pretty weather,
and the rich and the famous - the movers and the shakers,
the fabulous fantabulous social earth-quakers...

Well I was never one to follow rules,
even in school...
I had a problem with the un-cool,
And so I was a bad little colt,
the adults all said, 'He's a rebel! A youth in revolt!!'

But the fact was I'ma a stallion with a mind of my own,
and if you disagree with me you better leave me the hay alone,
Cause I'm somepony who should NOT be f****** with,
Do anything I want, whatever the hay I feel, b****!

And so, you can see, that I mighta had some trouble
with the Canterlot police department, one too many times,
but the reason I was 86'd was somethin' altogether different,
somethin'  even worse than all my many minor crimes...


I helped an old mare to cross a busy street,
she was hunched and frail, she was wrinkly and pale,
she was carrying a saddle bag full of mail,
But turns out my good deed was full of fail,

cause that old-a** mare wasn't old at all,
she was in disguise havin' robbed a jewelry store,
so when the po-leece came, they took me as well,
said I'd helped to plan the job, and I was doomed as h***!!

But a Good-a** lawyer can save your life,
I just got the hoof instead of doin' time,
I was 86'd to a tiny-a** town,
they call it Pony-ville...

...and now I'm stuck here with nothin in the world to do but just hang around at home all day like some common f***** mule... No offense, but I miss my city and all my friends and all the places I used to go... man, my luck must absolutely.....

title: Everfree Forest (Elegy of Disharmony Soundtrack)
description:
This track is a soundtrack for an upcoming game called "Elegy of Disharmony", check it out here: http://www.derpykoncepts.com/

MP3 320 kbps download: http://www.mediafire.com/?5ypeytar13c3854
WAV 1536 kbps download: http://www.mediafire.com/?8sgay55b2jvm897

(Ambiental Mix version with sounds of rustling leaves)
MP3 320 kbps AMBIENTAL download: http://www.mediafire.com/?9kghb65n5v8h4dd
WAV 1536 kbps AMBIENTAL download: http://www.mediafire.com/?vds14t3f2f90u6d

Album Artwork download: http://www.mediafire.com/i/?a5g46c6ouray2g4


To make more awesome music, I will need to buy more software and hardware equipment, which costs. Feeling generous? You can help by donating! http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1739027/Donate/donate.html

YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/Thorinair 
SoundCloud: http://soundcloud.com/thorinair
Visit my Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Thorinair-Music/181104641974397
Visit my deviantART page: http://thorinair.deviantart.com/
Follow me on Tumblr: http://thorinair-music.tumblr.com/
PonySquare: http://ponysquare.com/Thorinair/

Elegy of Disharmony website: http://www.derpykoncepts.com/

Hey again guys! I decided to join the guys who work on an MLP RPG game called "Elegy of Disharmony" and make soundtrack for their game! This is the first track for the game, and there will be many more, so stay tuned!

This one is Everfree Forest themed (it will be background music for the zone). It is meant to be dark, scary and ambiental. Yep, this is not trance, but more something like a blend of orchestral and ambiental. 

Funfact: The very distorted and stuttered sound you can hear at places like 1:03 is actually Rainbow Dash's voice.

Hope you like it! :D

The artwork was drawn by one of the team members, Cadet-J ( http://cadet-j.deviantart.com/ )

title: Lost in Cyberspace
description:
New thingy majingy!

So, this song started as a video game idea. I thought of a MLP platforming game, where one of the stages would take place in cyberspace, as a result of some test that went wrong. 
Pretty fun one to do, quite some time ago since i actually did any electronical stuff. I wanted the song to be unique, or a bit different then the rest of the other electronical stuff
you can find out there, and thus i focused alot on melodies and to make sure the whole song was rather melodical and video game-esque, and not just a bass line and a drum pattern.

I think this would fit pretty well in a Mega Man or a Mega Man x game, no?

title: Show me how to Fly
description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H_w5ebSG9xM

Hay matty here for a track not even near those of swagbergs so don't cheer but i'm here to blow me clear of the. 
Frustration and despair i try to catch life but i can't it's like like i'm stuck without a strand of self-respect or any plans.
I'm like a cutie-mark crusader fuckin flailin it's a god damn miracle if i do something without derailin, i've tried a lot of things checked nailin,tailin,mailin, sailin paint me green and call me sally, it doesn't matter I will fail it.
Now it's time to pick it up eeyup eeyup don't stop i'm buckin eeger as a pup. Life's short resort to never ever give up, life's a drink makes ya think but i brought my own cup. 

This is it, my final chance to prance amongst the stars just a glance and dance fucker dance. I need a match, a reason to dispatch i gotta catch every oppertunity in life i'm starting from scratch!

~ I really want to tell you
I really want to staaaart over and
I really want to fly high with you
Oh please wont you show me the way there ~ 

Someday I'll get my mark, just need to get up there and show them why I'm here and I

Need your help to lift me above and to be strong when times are rough and when my wings wont bear me

Like two pegasi,
you and I 
we will soar the skies and never come down 

That's it huh, I guess i better pack my stack up i wish i had the will of applejack. But there's one thing I lack now imma attack, remember to stay out of her shack. smack

Take me to the sky, your tears i'll dry, we'll fly so high. I'm sorry for acting like a mix between derpy and fluttershy, but i can't lie the end is nigh, I too will die, oh my 

Retaliate, debate, i fuckin hate, the weight, i can't afford to wait. Like alexander the great i'll stand up and change my fate, you're never too late. shame some ponies eat from gold plates.

But that's life, nothing's fair, always strife never glare, don't look back, there's more mares, I can share, no despare, someday you'll find the one appreciating that you care

title: Midimistro's Rainbow Factory Midi Mixup
description:
Submission For Toastbeard's ZIQ98.

Checklist for This week's ZIQ:
Ear-buster: Check.
Revival: Check.
Personalization and Uniqueness: Check, Check.

Preservering through the history of brony music, this familiar song once agian takes it stake at brony music, but this time, its all instrumental.
Introducing the FULL MIDI Mix-Up of WoodenToaster's/Glaze's Rainbow Factory. WoodenToaster has graciously let me create the full MIDI of this ever-popular song. This particular version of the song, however, features this full MIDI, but with some tweaks to instrumentation and added effects to give it a new and unique feel. No this version is not a complete copy of the original as the originals vocals are also 100% instrumental in this version (do note that this version is also notated quite accurately as well).

Instrument Changes:
Piano to Harpsicord; Bass Lead Synths to Power Chord Guitar; and Vocals to Alto Saxophone, Harmony Pad and Bagpipes.
Instruments Added (double of original, changed to another instrument):
Space Lead, Mixed Chior, Square Lead, and Slicer Lead.
Effects Added:
Reverb, Phaser, and Delay.

Normally I have composition idea spree on the Weekend, but this week's topic just didn't click for me this time around. So instead I decided to use one of my older projects and change it up a bit. The fact that I am bringing back Rainbow Factory covers the revival aspect of this entry. I am not infringing on any copyright grounds as this is a MIDI instrumental mix, and that WoodenToaster has allowed me to recreate the full song entirely as a MIDI.

I would also like to personally thank zorg for graciously recreating the percussion of the song, the only weak aspect of my ability to recreate songs.

If you forgot the Lyrics or just want to follow along with the instruments that take the place of the vocals:
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Now a rainbow's tale isn't quite as nice
as the story we knew of sugar and spice,
But a rainbow's easy once you get to know it,
With the help of the magic of a Pegasus Device

Now let's delve deeper into rainbow philosophy,
far beyond that of Cloudsdale's mythology.
it's easy to misjudge that floating city,
with it's alluring decor and social psychology.
But with all great things comes a great responsibility,
That of Cloudsdale's being weather stability.
"How", you ask, "are they up to the task?",
to which the answer is in a simple facility

In the Rainbow Factory, where your fears and horrors come true.
In the Rainbow Factory, where not a single soul gets through.
In the Rainbow Factory, where your fears and horrors come true.

(Instrumental)

In the Rainbow Factory, where your fears and horrors come true.
In the Rainbow Factory, where not a single soul gets through.
In the Rainbow Factory, where your fears and horrors come true.
In the Rainbow Factory, where not a single soul gets through.
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Check out the Story inspired by the Song, written by AuroraDawn: 
https://www.fanfiction.net/s/8942390/1/Original-Rainbow-Factory
Check out the movie inspired by the story, currently under production: 
https://rfamp.tumblr.com
Listen to the original submission of the song: 
http://toastbeard.bronyradio.com/a/ZIQ06/
Want the normal FULL MIDI? Here it is (my version (Version 3)): 
https://www.dropbox.com/s/5w5ttd9xwzeryup/RainbowFactoryAndVocals%20%283%29.mid
Want zorg's version? Here it is (version 2):
https://www.dropbox.com/s/7cdjz7gb02s82ci/Rainbow%20Factory%20Percussion%20version.mid

Keep an eye out for my YouTube channel if you're interested in the sheet music:
https://www.youtube.com/user/midimistro

This MIDI Mix-Up was made using Alexander Gross's (Xewton) Music Studio for iOS. No copyright infringments intended in any way. This is a midi only version, not a complete rehash of the original.

Time spent making this: 5 total man hours.

title: Crazy (feat. MC Flowny)
description:
Download Here!
http://sdoggingsworth.bandcamp.com/track/crazy-feat-mc-flowny

Copyright 2012, Sprocket Doggingsworth
http://www.youtube.com/sdoggingsworth

Music by Sprocket Doggingsworth
Lyrics and Rap Performance by Sprocket Doggingsworth and MC Flowny
MC Flowny - http://www.youtube.com/iamrhymeflow
Special thanks to Cyril the Wolf for mastering the track.
Cyril the Wolf - http://www.youtube.com/cyrilrufus


LYRICS

SPROCKET: 
I heard it stated that the show is for kids 
But the township of Ponyville's been infected with madness. 
From pony to pony to pony it's all the same 
I'm telling you 
They're all out of their brain. 
Take Fluttershy whose prevelant element is to be kind. 
Underneath her wavy mane 
She's containing a pained mind 
Then she trains the pain to bottle all up inside 
Until she goes insane and triggers off like a landmine. 
A timebomb! 
My rhymes are filling the page 
And there ain't enough room to document all the flutterrage. 
Nopony's gonna help you if you step to her friends 
Whether dragon or cockatrice you'll meet similar ends 
But friends ain't even safe when Mr. Hyde is in town 
Only schmeckles step to Jeckyll, 
Fluttershy cuts `em all down. 
Bitter at the critters in the garden above me, 
Even if they get the jitters, 
"You are going to love me." 

Damn.   
If I was a garden creature all I could say would be "Yes, Ma'am" 
There ain't no protection from the punch of her fury 
And without affection she becomes the judge and the jury 
Now there ain't no way an animal can hide or can run 
'Cause she'll rage right in the court before the Queen of the Sun! 
Fluttershy don't give a buck. 
The fact that she don't room with Screw Loose is a matter of luck 
But they had better act soon or y'all be coming up dead 
Prey don't stay that way what's it's tasted the predatorial lifestyle that be driving her up out of her head 
An institutional solution gives her much needed street cred'. 
It seems theatrical but psychiatrical meds - 
An intervention thus preventing her from splashing the walls red. 
For your own safety please don't ignore what I said 
If nothing else believe me just stay out of her shed! 

CHORUS 
Twilight says "All the ponies in this town are crazy." 
Twilight Sparkle may be right. 
Twilight says "All the ponies in this town are crazy." 
-Crazy? 
-Crazy 
-Crazy 
Twilight Sparkle... 
Likes books. 


MC FLOWNY: 
The Party Planner, with an eidetic mind 
Remembers every single birthday, each and every time. 
And everytime, can tell you what the days are remaining. 
And when your number's coming up, she's the first in line waiting. 
The Pink Bodied Equestrian got Balloons on ther side. 
The Cotton Candy mane, with the wide CERULEAN eyes. 
All the sweetest cakes and desserts got nowhere to hide. 
Find your yourself without a babysitter?  Call Pinkie pie. 
The Laugh Element, Master of Smiles - Chuckle Development. 
Fourth wall breaking, and making physics irrelevent. 
The way i'm tellin it, ain't no reason you shouldn't meet her... 
But, you break a Pinkie Promise? And honestly? Couldn't beat her. 
Try to run, make an excuse, or vanish into vapor 
Cause the promise that you broke makes it certain you can't escape her. 
But the madness she possesses goes deeper than broken promises 
The depths we'll have to go will be darker and far beyond the mysts 
What I speak of's the one they call Pinkamena. 
Gray tint, straight hair, just pray you never meet her. 
Meaner than the most deviant beings you've ever seen. 
Pinkamena is the Nightmare if Pinkie Pie is the Dream. 
Don't accept an invitation, and flatly lie in her face. 
Watch her face drain of color, her eyes stare into space. 
And you find as friend, you have suddenly been replaced. 
By a bag of flour, or some rocks stacked in a vase. 
That is just a taste, to the terror that she can make. 
Have you ever read the fan-based fiction called Cupcakes? 
Yeah. 
Demented twisted and bent, vindictive misfit and spent 
her time dismembering Dash into ingredients. 
Immediate evacuation of the facility 
When Pinkamena Diane Pie is in the building. 
And I got a feeling after the babysitting she'd been through. 
Pumpkin and Pound Baby Cakes is on the Menu. 


CHORUS 


SPROCKET: 
Twilight, you ain't exactly one who should talk 
You could lose your marbles over blackboard and chalk 
Your ambitions are fine till they come crumbling down 
Then in sedition you rise against the good of the whole town 
We all admire your scholastical strengths - fantastical lengths you take refining practical brains 
But you know how you can tell that you been missing the point? 
When you unleash more chaos than when Discord ran the joint! 
Even Derpy set to bring on the pain 
And rain down the wrath of agression unrestrained 
Over a doll - now that's what I call insane 
Although I must admit I really really like her mane. 
It's tragic, the element of magic is crackin' 
Town's manic, load up the paddywagon. 
From Manehattan the toughest streets in the world 
And there ain't nothing scarier than hearing "Hello Girls" 

MC FLOWNY: That wasn't scary, Twilight's under mad stress. 

SPROCKET: Well, your cupcake story was a Fictional Fan Press. 

MC FLOWNY: And what, Fluttershy's shed is something Hasbro thought up? 

SPROCKET: Well, um..sorta. Not exactly, You see...shut up! 
Alright, so the ponies ain't as mad as they seem 

MC FLOWNY: And that's because they always dream of being nobler beings. 
What holds you together as your world is falling apart? 

SPROCKET: The magic of friendship living up in your heart. 

MC FLOWNY: So even though they get a little crazy up in a bind. 

SPROCKET: Their friendship magically untangles it every time. 

MC FLOWNY: So in otherwords, anyone can lose it just a little. 

SPROCKET: As long as they have friends, it pull's em back in the middle. 

MC FLOWNY: It'll be a mess if Ponies had to do it all alone. 

SPROCKET: Which is the moral of these stories to Bronies out on their own. 
Just remember we're together when facing all of these menaces. 

SPROCKET & FLOWNY: 'Cause friends help friends FINISH UP each others' SENTENCES." 


CHORUS/FINALE 
The cure to insanity doesn't require a prescription 
'Cause the cure to insanity is friendship. 
Word! 
Scientists suspect that friendship is made out of magic.

***
***
***

***

***
I really didn't see it comming.
Previously that track was called "Orchid" but when I was remaking it, it started fits me to Cadence. And after I found a pic made by CSImadmax, I knew I must dedicate that track to her.
This track is, in fact, my imagination of Celestia's niece. I think she will be nice and kind, very feminine and also dynamic. She looks young, after all xd At least she's younger than Celestia and Luna. And I'm quite sure that her light pink coat may suggest she is not so powerful... And I've got a hunch that she will be a kick-assing flying unicorn xd
In 21.04.2012 we'll see if my suggestion was correct or not.

Why "kites"? I think that's a small gift from ponies to the newly-weds xd Something like a wish of propitious winds in their life.

title: Unexplored Worlds
description:
One year anniversary, everyone!
Yeah, that's right. One year ago, i uploaded my first pony video, Fluttershy's Goodbye. 
I've been uploading pony and non-pony music in a regular basis since. Not only is it my one
year anniversary of being a brony-musician, but it is also my one year anniversary being a serious musicican. 
While i did some music before Fluttershy's Goodbye, it wasn't very serious, and i didn't really spend any money or time on it.

So, thank you everyone for listening to my songs, and expect more stuff to appear over the next couple of years!

Now, on to the song itself!

This song is based on a scenario where Twilight and RD is having of their reading sessions. I didn't only want the song to
represent the harmony och calmness of the sessions itself, but also the adventures that await them in the 
unexplored worlds of litterature.

Warbalist, Coconeru, and Metal Mary's "Rodgers and Hammerstein" cover of Wooden Toaster and Living Tombstone's "Love Me Cheerilee," created for the radio drama adaptation of Kkat's novel, Fallout: Equestria; the absolute, most bizarre idea for a crossover, ever, and a wonderful read.

The Living Tombstone: http://www.youtube.com/user/TheLivingTombstone

facebook: http://www.facebook.com/FalloutEquestriaRadio

So far, this project has been a complete joy to work on. There are so many talented individuals giving so much of their love, time and effort in order to bring Kkat's excellent story to life. I feel honored to be a part of the team.

Download links coming soon.

Wooden Toaster and The Living Tombstone, if you're reading, I'm sorry the taint of the wasteland got to your music.

title: Jelly Pony Battle theme
description:
So, i wanted to do a song dedicated to the Jelly Pony. However, since we've only seen a few seconds of him, it is rather hard to know how he's actually like. 
In my mind, he is a happy pony, one that always smiles and cracks jokes. But, he is also rather "weird", or special. Some ponies have a hard time actually spending time with him,
simply because he isn't like the others. He is sort of cheesy, in a "weird" way.
That's what i think about him atleast. I tried to compose this song after what i had in mind, trying to make the song a bit weird, special or just unusual.
Also tried to make it a bit video game-esque; lightly inspired by Crash Bandicot. (Mainly the marimba and the Xylophone)

title: Final Day Area
description:
A direct remix of the show by I-Pie?? Impossible!!

I remixed "This Day Aria" (or "Cadence Aria") into a boss-fight-ish 8-bit track!! To the best of my knowledge I am the first to do this, but please please please correct me if I'm wrong!!

This particular track makes use of the RP2C33 channel inside the Famicom Disk System. I also used this expansion for Pinkie's Homebrew.

title: MC Flowny - Dog Diamonds (Over Animus Vox)
description:
This is my take on the Diamond Dogs over the Glitch Mob's 'Animus Vox'

In regards to 'Animus Vox': So I took the short intro, used the "rappy" part which went right into the "choral" part, added ANOTHER "rappy" part, and then added the ending. That makes sense, right?

Lyrics: 
Beneath the earth under the dirt / below the subterranean passages
past the masses of the black facets / It is the land hid in the back
Beyond the track, deep into the depths of the darkest of all paths. 

We are a race of ravenous wrath beings.
Some fast feeding, furious mad heaving get that ass beaten.. 
And that's meaning you passed the first meeting, and by pass
I mean you last - the rip & thrash greeting. 

Our calling cards are shards of gems - bound around our necks. 
Embedded in leather, a sign of respect.
And the better and more precious a gem is.
The more venomous and more likely to wreck - that veteran is. 

And we are pack minded. Meaning Omegas straight attack 
While the Alphas plan ahead designing trap mines.
These fine devices devised by wry bastards. 
And you will find in these Mine Shafts - divine Masters 

We the diamond dogs, our dog diamonds
glimmer underneath the dim of Earth and keep shining.
So keep an eye on your rocks, or you'll get rocked on. 
These dogs are off of the leash, and you'll get dogged on. 

Who let the dogs out?
Who let the dogs out?
Who let the dogs out?
We let the dogs out! 

Better climb if you find yourself lost here. 
We the canines that dine upon your heart's fear. 

I won't stop you, becoming self independent. 
If you want to venture into the pit, then go ahead and 
Don't blame me if you fall off a cliff or get beheaded. 
Cause you Dance with the Dogs - admit - your life has ended. 

Been in the clutches of the dogs before. 
I've seen their fury underground like they gods of war. 
Soulless beasts who can gorge and feast upon the living. 
Cerberus has a far better chance to be forgiving
Now, there is another who survived this feat.. 
An urban legend of girl who connived and schemed.
Instead of pleading for her life, she decides to treat 
them to a mind trick, and in the end defies their greed.

A rare breed of a beautiful sly manipulator. 
And confined as a prisoner, doesn't try to escape
Buys time with confusion, until her friends can save her 
When in fact, it's the dogs whose dying to separate her. 

//CHORUS//

It's a rare case, so - let it marinate. 
Go tell your pony friends - that this Mare's great. 
Go share that Diamond Dogs got all their nerves grated. 
And that one pony was more than they anticipated.

And that within one day she was the most hated. 
And that this chance occurence was truly ill fated.
And that a pony's whining is simply understated. 
A Rarity indeed - it cannot be debated. 

References: 
http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2011/309/7/a/diamond_dogs_are_gonna_getcha_...
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=17PM-UMVud8
http://el-grimlock.deviantart.com/art/Werewolf-Warrior-255138248

title: The Queen of Changelings
description:
SEE IT ALSO HERE: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z1V_1Ka7Me8
***
***
***
An awesome art made by Fore Trekker
http://fav.me/d4x7ezp
***
***
***
Yes, indeed - Canterlot Wedding part I & II were the best episodes from entire II season. But when I saw the black character my I-DE-A turned on. I love Queen Chrysalis. She's so perfect villain. Her design is awesome.

This track symbolize her power, beauty and slyless. She fooled everypony, including Celestia herself. She showed her power in the fight agaist Tia. I didn't see that comming, I mean... I knew Chrysalis will won but in that style? Anyway, this track should be more dark, but... that's mainstream. She is dark and we already know it. I want to show you her beauty and magnificent. The track is also fast and a little bit agressive like her actions.
This track can also symbolize the destruction of Canterlot by the horde of changelings minions. Magic beams, collapsing walls, house in ruins... The city is burning and she's winning. So close...

title: Memories of the seaponies
description:
With this one i wanted it to be kinda chill and slow. I also wanted to give it a video game feeling, like i always do.

Storywise: We all remember the sea ponies. How they jumped out of the water, always there to help anyone who needed their help. But, what happened to them? What has happened to them since? Are they gone forever, or do they exist somewhere that we haven't explored yet? Or maybe, do they hold a darker secret? We might never know.

title: Unicorns are the best pony breed
Equestria Girls (Music Sounds Better With Ponies)
description: I liked the short and cute Hasbro original that's everywhere but wanted a real club version. This mashes up that with KP's California Girls (already in there but more so) and Stardust's Music Sounds Better With You (a busier double chorus). Thought it worked decently and made from parts of all 3 tracks in hopefully a way that doubles the fun from the original. Could be a little cleaner (something funky going on in a bassline that i couldnt clean up) but hey its a mashup and hopefully overall it works.

title: Love is in Bloom  (Reception Remix)
description:
Well I know Archie V beat everyone to this remix of Daniel Ingram's song from the show but I might be #2 (finished this late on sunday), lol. Went for a progressive / filtered house track. I don't normally operate on such a short time frame but I had a few hours to myself and everything clicked. A great season, a great finale, and a nice song to remix (and plenty more that episode). Enjoy. 

You can get the Honeymoon version which is very similar but more cleaned up.

title: Misses PinkiePieSwear - Flutterwonder (Natural Ambience Mix)
description: Well this is my real on-topic Toast Beard entry. One of the artists I immediately was impressed with and admired from early on in the brony community was PinkiePieSwear. Sadly they've moved on from the scene and not wanting to be defined by it which i can understand (but I still miss them). Their prescence is sorely missed and so I did Flutterwonder as an ambient track from collaged bits of the original, some show dialogue, and a slowed microsound of the original track (ie paulstretch). Hopefully this sounds epic and not boring. :)

description:
Next time i'll spend more time mixing my songs. : P

-----------------------------------

My second track in what might become a series of themes for the mane 6. This time it's Twilight's turn. Her persistence and sense of duty are worth admiring but can also become a problem some of the time. Who else almost goes insane that often? In a way she's even crazier than Pinkie Pie.

This time i kind of like what i cobbled together here...at least a little bit.

Enjoy.

title: Scary Monsters and Obsolescence
description:
Got this idea from Nexus on Fillydelphia Radio. 
He played a mashup of Archie.V - Magic Is Timeless (Silva Hound Remix) vs. Obsolete by Twenty Ten (Mic The Microphone and IBringDaLulz) which can be found here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n1FmTqauxds

I did this in roughly a day bouncing between it and studying for my finals. Any constructive criticism is welcome. There are some syncing issues that I couldn't really overcome due to how fast they are rapping (listen to the original to see why that is).

I hope you all enjoy it. There should be some more stuff coming soon once my finals are finished.

title: fluttershy face your fears
description:
This song is a story, 
Fluttershy the kind pegasus is alone in the woods at first shes happy and smiling (beginning) 
She then realizes she has no friends with her, no forest friends by her sides. she starts getting quiet, her fears start kicking in (the loud parts) after a while of the fears yelling at her she tries to calm down (the harp starts to play) she is getting calm. "NO" the fears screem (BAM of the music) no! (louder harp as it gos on for 2 messures) Fluttershy is calming down but as she looks around she knows anything could happen her fears come back (loud music comes back) she then remembers how her friends would always tell her she is strong and can do anything (the hard music stops it gets soft) its just like the beginning she is happy and nothing can stop her

title: BPFF'S
description:
New song!

It's a symphonic metal song, again. I'm betting some of you are getting tired of these, but i really felt like doing something that was heavy, "epic" and full of emotion.
Tried to implement more metal in this one, because i've been told that the former songs of this type was lacking in the rock/metal departement. (Something i completely agree with)
I'm not sure this time tough; i kinda feel like it's lacking in metal again. But oh well.
As always,i also wanted it to fit in a video games. It's pretty much a goal i want all of my songs to reach. 

So, story wise.

It's another battle theme, but this time between Twilight and Dash. They don't want to fight, but they have too. 
They both know that the fight will solve everything, no matter who will perish. 

It's pretty lacking in the story departement, i know. But still, i wanted to create a song that would fit a fight between those two.
A song filled with heavy riffs but also sad emotions. Neither of them wants to fight, and neither of them wants to perish. But they both know
that one of them won't live to se the sunset.

BPFF's stands for Best pony friends forever.

title: Closet Brony
description:
A little bit of a song experiment for me about my own awkwardness. Hoorah!

Interested in having me do vocals on your track? I'm game! Hit me up at sircrowbar@gmail.com or superdocisaac@gmail.com

Lyrics:

Dear Princess Celestia,
Never thought I ever would but now I'm writing to you
First time caller, long time listener
But I knew that you were the right character

To discuss problems, help make the panacea
Mostly, I blame dementia
Deliberate abstentia, the mind consumes
The perfect answer to an elaborate ruse

To this whole world of vague status update
From people I barely know, the hounds at the gate
Rarely I reply but I do give a *nod*,
An adelphia born from the white noise fog

From that connection we start a little family,
Bleeps and bloops, randomness and the memes
Listening soon becomes a full-on feat
Falling asleep to the non-sequitur beat

It's all good, but I want a little more,
The piece to feel complete, increase my score.
A quarter life crisis but the affliction seasonal
Ever increasing; far too many conditionals

Like maybe I should give a crap about my job
Pitchfork says to Torch, "Come join the mob!"
When I'm confronted why I can't change my ways
The only thing I can think is to s-stutter and say:


CHORUS
"I am a Closet Brony
Come dance with me and you will learn to see
You will find what it means to dream
The life you want to lead on a little glowing screen."



First World Problems accumulate into Five,
So party at my house when the Apocalypse arrives 
And he better bring the punch that he promised
I've got the Party Cannon rented, ready to launch!

And sure enough, he invited the girls
Wait, what? Crap, I'm never ready, mind unfurls,
He's only trying to help I must admit
Introverion inverts into a mobius strip

Not yet heard but they smell the nerd
Absurd, but you know it when they see the witty word
Written on my shirt, hawaiian attached.
The comfortable, fashionable Rainbow Crash!

I could mope, loathe and rage
But I've learned since there are too many better ways
If you're going to mock me, it might as well be on stage! 
Where I stand before an audience and s-say:


CHORUS
"I am a Closet Brony
Come dance with me and you will learn to see
You will find what it means to dream
The life you want to lead on a little glowing screen."

"I am a Closet Brony
Come sing with me and we will soon see.
What sort of thing could this turn out to be
When I put a melody to a blundering scene


BRIDGE

Gotta Find the lesson in this mess
Gotta Find a reason so I can rest
Gotta Hit the books, pass every test
Gotta Make everyone love me like Smarty Pants

Learn to be kind and learn to be fast
Learn to loosen up and have a blast
Learn to find the harmony in nature
Learn to be at least 20 percent cooler

Strive to be honest, strive to be free,
Strive to be the only one I know I can be,
Strive to know yourself, and know your friends
Strive to be the one that they can depend

Know when to give and when to give more
Know only you can reflect the dischord
Know when you're being crazy with your crazy thoughts
Know that the magic will never, ever stop!



I stand here staring at the mic in my hand,
Occasionally I'll sing but I don't understand.
Quite entirely the power funneling
But I have the will to be the one controlling

So what if I'm a little bit awkward?
I'll improve myself with every step forward!   
Time to make the leap like Daring-Do.
My weapon the mic will ignite the room!

So Princess Celestia,
I'm not really sure what I learned this episode
But I'll keep being myself, I'll be alright
Problems will rise and fall but I'll still be a-flight

I've got friends who'll help fight my enemies!
Cheesily we agree we can take on anything!
Raise the volume, let's start another day!
Give a pause, a deep breath *gasp* and exclaim:

"I am a Closet Brony
Come dance with me and you will finally see
What it means to be what you want to be
Live the life you want to lead beyond the glowing screen."

"I am a Closet Brony
Come sing with me and we will soon see.
What sort of thing can I make this to be
When I put a melody to the world before me.

I love spring. Everything is greener, the nature's comming back to life. And I started to wonder how beautiful spring is in Equestria... And I made that track.

It is full of joy and fun... You can feel the warm sunrays of Celestia's Sun and shine of Luna's Moon. You can smell the scent of flowers and hear the animals. Delicate zephyr's swinging the leaves, in the distance you can hear the buzzing of bees. Equestria is such beatiful right now...

title: The Equestral Plane
description:
Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/navy-brony
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Navy-Brony/246536198762996

Background image used with permission, by John Joseco: http://johnjoseco.deviantart.com/art/Crazy-Pie-and-Angry-Shy-209810495

A little background on the song (considering there's no lyrical content):

The story's about a man who dreamt of going to Equestria, and through discovering the wonders of Astral Projection, decides to try and project himself into the world. However things are not as he imagined, and he quickly discovers himself locked in a never ending nightmare, his only wish to return home from where he came, but was he in Equestria to begin with?

I end up thinking some interesting stories when making music.

Genre: ? Probably a mutated baby from the mating of psytrance and industrial.

description:

Arrangement by SuperPsyguy

Lyrics by Mr. X
My name is Derpy and I'm -A- pony.
I was formerly Ditzi.
But then you all renamed me!
My name is Derpy Hooves and let's be pals.
I'm actually a gal!
But still I can boost morale.
I used to be within the background there.
And all you would notice is my cross-eyed stare
But then because of my unique two eyes.
You just wouldn't let me die.
So now with a name you know I-
Have gotta name and it is Derpy Hooves.
So now I am truly moved.
At what all the fans have proved!
Ev-er-y-pony and everybody,
You all show that you love me.
So much that I get to be~
Part of the TV show you love so much.
I got my own scene so I could fly around and such.
Yeah so I dropped something on Rainbow Dash.
At least I was still a smash!
I made Hasbro lots of cash. SO. THERE.
[What's all this now, where have I gone?
Wait a minute, am I being drawn!?
I'm now a pony, this is all so strange.
This is horrible, almost deranged!
One minute I was running, a Dalek giving chase,
Now I'm the pony-master of time and space,
No matter I am henceforth "Doctor Whooves."
The name just popped inside my head and I say I approve!
This place is so confusing I can't stand up straight.
So I'll do what I always do I must investigate.
If only I had a companion, someone to assist!
Always running, always helping, you get the gist.]

Let's fix it up and you'll be on your way.
I may be a shade of gray, but I can make everything o-kay!

title: Winter Rap Off round 4 - Berd's verse
description:
I am a Brony, ponies are my poetic passion,
 Responsible for wasting all the hours I'm supposed to be nappin'
Instead, I'm smokin' hash & checking out the latest episode,
Constantly in awe of Hasbro's animation spectacles,
 Plus the character development is very intelligent,
And the life lessons taught to us are rarely irrelevant,
You see, the show's compelled me to be a better person,
If I'm rapping about ponies then my verses are all curseless,
Now I'm spittin' clean, you'd think I'm swiggin Listerine,
Plus I'm buying figurines that's marketed at little tweens,
 (Regardless) the Brony is a sign of real cultural advancement,
Community expandin' to lend a helping hand,
All you need to give is kindness, big or small,
If you like ponies or not, come one, come all,
I promise we won't judge, come as you are,
We won't send you to the moon but we'll let you see the stars,
 Now I'm here to spread the gospel, yes it's awesome, let it rock you,
And we'll party just like Pinkie Pie would do,
Cause I'm a Brony he's a Brony she's a Brony we be Bronies,
Would you like to be a Brony too?

[facts]
Contains a sample from "Garden of Peace" performed by Lonnie Liston Smith, and an interpolation of some Dr. Pepper commercial from the 70's.
Thanks to ponies I've reignited my passion for poetry.  True story.
Pinkie Pie is best pony.
You might recognize the sample from Jay-Z's "Dead Presidents"

title: Love is in Bloom (Honeymoon Remix)
description:
Archie V beat everyone to this remix of Daniel Ingram's song from the show but I think I might have been #2 (put mine out on that Sunday). Went for a progressive / filtered house track. I don't normally operate on such a short time frame but I had a few hours to myself and everything clicked and i released this that Sunday. 

This is a 2nd version (hence the honeymoon version). Not massive changes but vocals are louder, some extra background music filtered in, and some annoying flaws gone (hopefully). Slightly better end version I think so wanted to get an improvement out. Thanks so much for the positive feedback on the first version!!

Art by http://gtun3d.deviantart.com/ 
Thanks!!

title: watsci
description:
I like these synths.

A fm2fm is kinda wonky, like, theres no amp on the main osc (if I didnt like blatantly ignore it), so in polymode, it clips internally.
But DoFi is one of the most fun synths I've played with. Would love an internal lfo for both.

This thing is just a collection of scetches what I came up with during four hours of just messing about, seeing what kinda sounds it can make. Might save some of them to a new project and flesh it out, who knows.

Anyways, thanks a lot, sci, really like these, keep up the good work.

title: Swagberg + The Beastie Bronies - Pony Swag (Freewave Loves Censoring Remix /Tribute)
description:
This was initially a Toast Beard entry (theme was swag or a remix of pony swag) and made in 2 hrs but i cleaned it up a little more and added some more samples. Made as a tribute to MCA (R.I.P.) + old school hip-hop sampling. He will be missed. When I think of the BBoys i think of love & happiness and so many great memories so that's what I wanted to convey (until the last 10 seconds).

This has pony samples instead of cussing
