title: Changeling's essence
description:
A.k.a, orhcestral as done by a electronic idiot.

I honestly have no idea how to do orchestral, I have 0 music theory knowledge, I don't know what a dissodance or a cadence is, I don't even know what key that's in! xD

But I had fun, and I COULD CARE LESS ABOUT Y'ALL MUHAHAHHA

..kidding, I did put effort into it :)

I didn't want to make an episode responce but as I was making it it all kinda got me inspired from the last episode, and traditional chinese music. I even put a bit of Erhu in it, although it sounds very off..chinese music + pony music...orchestral design, make it happen, I beg you ^^

Heavily inspired by Orchestral Design & Makkon.

Okay, let's take care of this all:

Original art by Durpy: http://durpy.deviantart.com/art/Changeling-297907835?q=boost%3Apopular%20changeling&qo=36

Art: http://eqbeats.org/track/1407/art

-CS

title: Cognitive Corruption[Winter Rap Off]
description:
Let's give this Winter Rap Off thing a go, hey~

LYRICS:

Lil' miss Derpy Hooves, wearin' grooves, no one could choose,
Who she woos, but never doubtin', surroundin' from every view(whoa!),
When suddenly an ugly spell, that'd never do well,
You couldn't tell from right or wrong, cause she warned you hard as she fell,

Let's hope for Twi's sake, that her mistake would even let 'er walk again,
Or even send the mail again, or else they'll bring the pain(GET OVER HERE!),
Now a vital spark from the dark, heard all 'round the park,
Gathered everyone's attention and made all the dogs bark,

She better be killing me quick, too slick, but never degenerative,
My mare is always smilin', her while it has rendered me sensitive,
Her cognitive powers have showered all over Ponyville,
And makin' haters ill on her fate, waitin' and standin' still,

What about her newfound ability for mental agility?
Her psychic charms, had us alarmed, and stunned me lyrically,
The silly filly smarter than Einstein now, obviously,
But could it be, mind playin' tricks, sickenin' us physically?

Cause no one knew for sure how the day went so smoothly,
But you'll see, answers are comin' through the mail usually,
Amuse me, Derpy, you heard me, you know me,
Think you best enlighten me and brighten up the situation for us to see,

"Heresy!" someone yells, you can't really tell,
Will Derpy go to hell for something beyond her control,
I'm on a roll here, never 'gon fear, or shed a tear,
Cause Derpy Hooves's rear coppin' flak, all of the haters near

Pity the witty filly, so silly, what's the dealio?
Couldn't you see, that Derpy, is still the same, yo?
Don't really care, but gotta think it's not fair,
On her part, she gotta part ways with this new mental flair,

And hey, Celestia draws near and says "Twi, I disappoint,
How could you jeopardize your own home, don't see the point,
Now that Ponyville's clean, Derpy's back, lemmie say real quick,
Word life, this is basic thuganomics!

title: Nightmare Night (Symphonic Metal Cover)
description:
Phew, best work yet? Ya! Also: I changed the lyrics only slightly in one part cuz I thought it sounded more metul. ENJOY!

Special thanks to Stormwolf http://www.youtube.com/user/JoshLohMusic for letting me gut his orchestra for my own personal molestation. 
Forest Rain http://www.youtube.com/user/PutTrustInFate for giving me one particular sound that you'll hear on bigger speaker set ups. (You'll know) and some other little advices.

Thanks to Glaze for helping me out by giving me what I needed to complete this, Mic for helping me get the grindrap flow just right and to Bagpipe Brony for getting me of my ass to finish it out. 

Art from http://seven-kicks.tumblr.com

Lyrics:
WELCOME TO NIGHTMARE NIGHT!

Welcome Fillies and Gentlecolts; No reason to scream
Your favorite Princess is back; She's walkin' up on the scene
She has been stuck on the moon, but that's no reason to fret
She's not a Nightmare no more, so buckle down and get set
She's comin'; Gracin' her subjects. She ain't leavin' no choice
She's gonna blow you all back with her Equestrian Voice
So cover all of your fears and stowe away all your fright
The Lunar Princess is back; to bring the Nightmares Tonight

(Chorus)
She's living in the past
so you won't last
Without the proper care
With a royal farewell
And an animate spell
You won't have long to prepare

Now little fillies, this is Nightmare Night Your ruler Nightmare Moon is back to come and fill you with fright
So Hurry
Now get your goodies and fill up all your bags
And go and leave a candy offering for that big ol' hag
Get runnin'
And pray above that she's not coming back
To come and take away your soul and eat you up for a snack
So run away and go hide; just keep your head out of sight
The darkness: rising again cause it's Nightmare Night

(Chorus)

Nightmare Night

Follow me:
http://cyrilmusic.tumblr.com
http://facebook.com/cyrilmusic
http://facebook.com/CSillyShow
http://twitter.com/cyrilthewolf
http://ponysquare.com/cyrilthewolf

title: Trixie
description:
SEE IT ALSO HERE: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qw6QErQaJsw
***
***
***
CHECK MY SITES:
- DeviantART: http://niklasshepherd.deviantart.com/
- Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/nicolas-dominique
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/99plusmusic
- Tumblr: http://n-dominique.tumblr.com/
***
***
***
An awesome art made by Ponykillerx
http://fav.me/d4n4ebc
***
***
***
TRIXIE IS BEST PONY! Was there ever any doubt?
Well... many of bronies like her. For me she was way too arogant... But my I-DE-A likes her and I cannot argue with that (my arguments are invalid).

I was trying to show there her good side. That track is my vision of changed Trixie, conjugated by the events in Ponyville. She's not arognant now but still confident and powerful. Her magic level increased multiple times and now she's respective opponent for Twilight.
She's strong and she knows a lot of powerful spells. Now she's finally great and powerful. Like she supposed to be.
***
***
***
GENRE: The Great and Powerful Trance
BPM: 140

title: The Doctrine
description:
Luna took over — industry and prosperity and renaissance in technology and medicine — for everyone. 

Everyone with money — you can get magic by installing manufacured horn, you can fly if you get wings, you can enhance anything, but every time you do that, you feel like you're giving some part of you away forever. 

And you're part-machine as well by now — to perform better. And sometimes you wish you didn't do that.

Hopes and dreams clash with reality — rough lifeless technology and slowly but surely crushes them.

Sometimes it feels like you don't have anything left of you but hopes and dreams, so you cling to them as you slowly become part of a bigger machine.

———
Inspired by Cerberus Phantoms and Deus Ex: Equine Revolution.

description:

It was sort of inspired by "It started with your Smile" by MandoPony (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gzGbhc9HGxc). Not my kind of music actually but ponies make everything better. I'm quite satisfied with this one actually although i didn't manage to include a harpsichord (because...Rarity!).

Enjoy.

title: Are You Happy Now [Solar Empire/Lunar Republic]
description:
A different take on the Solar Empire/Lunar Republic story, that (as far as I know) was never explored. Kinda like inverse Macbeth, I suppose...

This was originally going to be an epic orchestral rock song, with Overkillius and Cyril The Wolf, but the project got neglected by all of us for months. I eventually decided to go all Matthew Mosier on it instead (I've got the hair to do it now too :P)

Video is here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T3GLjSH73Hk

LYRICS:
So you thought that you could take over the nation,
Bring the beast to its knees, and win our adoration.
Take a good look around at our barren city.
Out of all of the lands, ours is to be pitied.
Had you not been her kin, I would understand it,
But you could have saved so much by being underhanded.
Take away just one life for the sake of many.
Just like that, you would reign. There was never any need for war.

Millions of us died because of you
We battled because you ordered us to.
So tell me, are you happy now?

Then on one normal day, just like any other
You declared civil war, sister against brother.
You called yourself rightful heir and called for mass retraction.
Either for or against, forcing us to faction.
Daily, I do my best to keep myself from crying
When left and right, all I see is everybody dying
Each new face on the ground tells a different story
Be it just to survive, or kill all for the glory or for peace.

This is worse than what we had before.
I don't call this place home anymore
I hope that we'll all get through this somehow.
But tell me, are you happy now?

Ignorant or evil, I don't know,
But either way there's nothing left to show
This battleground was once a happy land,
Harmonious, prosperous, peaceful and grand.
The leaders play with us like we're a game
And though we're different, we all fall the same,
With nothing left except a simple name
And one day I will just be one of them.

title: This Day Aria-Solo Acoustic Guitar Arrangement
description:
Hello again, my friends. Have you ever had one of those awkward moments when someone you thought you knew turned out to be someone else, entirely? Those kind of confusing moments can cause a lot of turmoil in your life and can leave you feeling alone and betrayed.

Don't let them get to you! Even though it can sometimes be tough, keep your mind focused on the good things, the true friends you have, maybe a family member who understands, and if all else fails, you can always believe in yourself.

/cheese

Sorry about the buzz in this piece, but it sounds as though my Variax could use a new nut.

Download: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?9rvob0ddzjgf624
Sheet Music/Tabs: http://www.mediafire.com/view/?0ed91k1bc94aeb2 
YouTube version: http://youtu.be/Sl2gG7fVhuw

title: VINXIS & MC Flowny feat. Feather ~dream~ (Been Dreaming Remix)
description:
So last year, I was huge fan of Living Tombstone's 'Been Dreaming' song.  I've ALWAYS wanted to rap over it. VINXIS stepped up and took my challenge.  But I didn't want to tread over the same vocals... SOOOOO Enter: Feather.  This stunning vocalist from Down Under offered her voice and pushed herself vocally to pull off this chorus.  Add into the Mix Vinxis friend: ProcRAdocks, Colortwelve's Advice on working with Vocals, and Ember Dash's morale support & Rainbow Flavored Visualization... 

And you have 'Dream'.  It's truly a collaborative effort, and I thank EVERYONE who was part of it.  Just like Mic the Microphone dedicated HIS lyrics to his fans... the same goes for me.  You all make me want to keep writing and recording music! 

TL:DR ~ Thanks to everyone who helped me, and thanks to my core subscribers!  THIS IS FOR YOU! 

LYRICS: 

Think back to a time in the past 
when you had aspirations and dreams to move fast.

You had heroes,and role models and leaders.
And you failed several times but never stayed defeated. 

And you believed in yourself when others didn't. 
But you cherished in the fact - that you could never fit in.

And you did, what others thought forbidden. 
You stayed on your path while others thought you were kiddin. 

You didn't think after all those years 
You would drink in success after all those fears. 

Admittedly you were in it from the beginnin
And if anyone was destined to win it, you'd in a minute.

Put in the effort involved was your bravado.
And then showing off your skills in a flash would be your motto. 

Bottle it up and add a dash of class. 
Then BOOM.  Your burning the competition to ASH. 


 
From the lines of the wide horizon 
You rise from the skies and fly beside the titans.

Mighty and fine, and you blaze with grace.
You're On pace in this race to the take the 1st place.

The main player in the face of neighsayers.
An ace in the the air, make 'em taste the space layer.

Or ozone as it's otherwise known. 
you leave 'em gaspin for breath, while you takin the gold home.

But don't let the praise go to your head.
Use humility to fuel your abilities instead.

Cause when you're grounded your foundations are built better. 
You can withstand the earthquakes, and ill weather. 

And still tethered to the roots of your being. 
The truth is you're only limited to what you can see.

Meaning the sky's the limit, so you just keep trying. 
Use your dreams as the reasons so that you keep flying.

Obligatory Reference Links:
Intro Video : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3cNkvG2bOcI
Living Tombstone's Remix: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-Rawg958Yw
VINXIS: http://www.youtube.com/user/OYKXF
Feather: http://www.youtube.com/user/feather0ponyart

MP3 Cover Art from: http://explosivegent.deviantart.com/art/Time-Off-Fear-of-Falling-255928759

title: A Long Way From Equestria (Orchestral Cover)
Smile Song (Rock Cover)
description:
"Smile Song" is my favorite song from MLP, so it was only a matter of time until I would try my hand at producing a rock version of it. Big thanks to MrMusicalPony on YouTube for the isolated vocal track. However I had to use the original MLP recording for the choir part at the end (what would this song be without the choir?). Some of the original instrumentation might bleed through a bit, but I did everything I could to remove it or cover it up.

Likes, favorites and comments are greatly appreciated. Subscribe to stay up to date on goings on.

Here you can download the MP3 version:
http://www.mediafire.com/?h1v1sa3lg4htv73

title: All Fluttered Up
description:
This was the first track ever to be put under the concept of the United Equestria Ponyville label. Now UEP is functioning more as my first pony album, and a clear parody of UKF.

This track was made back before I understood the importance of sub bass. However, a lot of people seemed to like the lack of distinct bass (as a bit more of an original style) so I'm a bit reluctant to add in sub at this point. It was also before I understood to avoid limiters at all costs.

Additional Fluttershy voices provided by LilyPichu, and additional affects provided by ISMBOFepicly

title: The Canter of Canterlot

description:
I personally felt this had a lot of chaos going on in it, but I don't know, some people felt it lacked a lot of originality. 

I can see the point. The synth lines could certainly have used some more ingenuity to them. That and there's a lot of glitch to this, meaning a lot of the original track's samples were cut up and reused in different fashions.

This is the first in a series of tracks for another album I have planned called "Sgt-Whip Remixes the Bronies". It will include remixes of tracks by Alex S, Omnipony, Silva Hound (no, couldn't be!), Not a Clever Pony, Cats Millionaire, Art Attack, and probably some more. title: Fruits of Her Labour [WoodenToaster + Stormwolf] (QT Remix)
On the Equestrian Sea
description:
New thingy!

Please note: Don't take this one to seriously; it is mostly a filler and a practice song for me. 

So, this one is a pirate-ish song. It is based on a story where the mane six finds a treasure map in an old book in the library.
They decide to go look for it. They hire a boat and a crew and set sails towards the unkown and the treasure.

It was pretty fun to do, but was mostly a practice run for me. It is short, around 1:50, but it loops. I wanted it to work in a video game, so that explains that.
In the video, i've looped it once; that's why the video is around 4 minutes long.

Working on two projects at the moment, so expect them to arrive soon.

Link to the amazing art i used: http://hlissner.deviantart.com/art/Equestria-and-beyond-rev-8-1-253465186?

title: Luna's Redemption
description:
As seen on Seeds of Kindness! http://broniesforgood.org/seeds-of-kindness/ They are still raising money for a village in Burundi, and if you order now, you get the Smile! album as well, which means 63 original tracks from dozens of brony musicians like myself.

This particular song follows Nightmare Moon as she plots her escape, mobilizes her forces, executes her plan, only to be liberated by the Mane Six and forgiven by her sister.

It is part of a concept album I'm working on about the history of Equestria from Luna's point of view ( "A Little Night Music"). 

Download My Music At: http://sdoggingsworth.bandcamp.com

Art is "Any Colour Luna Likes" by Mister Hand used with permission from: http://mister-hand.deviantart.com/art/Any-Colour-Luna-Likes-257483124

title: The Homework Blues (feat. Your Enigma)
description:
A blues song sung from the perspective of a filly in Miss Cheerilee's class.
Featuring YourEnigma on piano. http://www.youtube.com/user/Yourenigma

Copyright 2012 Sprocket
Available for download at: http://sdoggingsworth.bandcamp.com

My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic characters copyright 2010 The Hub, and Hasbro, Inc.

LYRICS:
I got too many maths 
I got too many maths 
How's a filly supposed to play when you got so many maths? 
Oooh-Hoooo. 
What's a pony to do? 
I'm begging you Cheerilee, baby, please relieve these homework blues. 

Applebloom and Scoots 
Sweetie Belle and me 
Got to go a-questin' 
To find our destiny 
But readin's only paper 
And your history is bones 
Stuck staring out my window 
Doing homework all alone 
Ooh-Ooooh. Cheerilee! 
Take away my homework blues 

Science is a shackle 
Essays are a cage 
Thrust on us by grown-ups 
All because our age 
Age is just a number 
I count 7, 3, 13. 
Don't nopony believe me 
I got all the maths I need. 
Woo-Hoo. 
Cheerilee! 
Relieve my homework blues! 

I got those homework blues. Mmhmm. Cheerilee. The homework blues.

I can't spell "dragonequus." You got me on that, Miss Cheerilee, but answer me this: when am I ever going to need to know how? Seriously has that ever been - has that piece of information ever been useful to you at all except when teaching me how to spell "dragonequus"?

title: Robotic Fillies
description:
Wow! I know jack shit about lighting. Should study it if I ever get hardcore back into visual art.

Anyway, about the song. Well, there isn't too much to say on it. It's kind of a silly concept, and I can't take it anywhere further than it already is. Or rather I don't want to take it anywhere further.

This my attempt at IDM. Eh, I think the focus might be too much on funny sound effects as opposed to the complexity of the sound. Not sure. I'm pretty sure there's a difference.

If you find you like my work, please comment, rate, like, subscribe, follow, etc.

Lossless: http://sgt-whip.bandcamp.com/track/robotic-fillies

CMC vector by nowego found here: http://fav.me/d4r6od8

title: CopyCat - Capturing Winter In C Sharp (Freewave's 4 Seasons Remix)
description:
Well I LOVED the original version of this track by Copycat and was planning on doing a re-edit /remix of this classic for awhile (didn't have the midi's but was given the cutup vocals and the original track). I've tinkered around with this for several weeks and the culmination of finalizing it just after bronycon (I couldn't go) is what kind of made me want to combine the concept of the passage of time for the pmv (seasons passing from fall to summer)

Massive thanks to CopyCat as i did use large chunks of the original and it is his track i remixed after all
http://www.youtube.com/user/MixMastaCopyCat
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GNqGwv7GoVU

title: Rise and Fall of Emperor Discord
description:
This is a new song added to the recently updated Smile! charity album. You can get 63 exclusive songs (including two others from me) by donating here http://broniesforgood.org/seeds-of-kindness/instructions/

Free Download of this Song and Other Works Here:
http://sdoggingsworth.bandcamp.com

This particular track tells the story of Discord's reign, his attempt to seduce Luna to the darkside, her rejection of him, and his ultimate defeat by Celestia and Luna - wielders of the Elements of Harmony. It is eventually going to be integrated into a concept album I'm working on about the History of Equestria from Luna's point of view ("A Little Night Music").

The Rise and Fall of Emperor Discord Copyright 2012 Sprocket

Art is a cropped version of "Palace Discord" by Jamie Swiftrunner, Commissioned by TiQ. View the full piece here: http://jamieswiftrunner.deviantart.com/#/d49wiqj

My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic was created by Lauren Faust for Hasbro, Inc, and the Hub. They own the rights to the character Discord.

title: Dashin' Dreams
description:
The theme pony is, who else than one of my favorites, one and only, Rainbow Dash. Waking up from her peaceful airy dreams, she streches her wings and slowly takes off into calm air. Above the cloud line, staring into the thick white sea of clouds, she realizes this will be another great day -- and doing so, she goes into a straight dive through the clouds, flying off towards adventures, leaving only a trail of colors and sunshine behind her.

Finally continuing from where I was left back in December, after half a year of hard life, college, loss of finances and no time to learn/make music, I managed to make this -- my second track i've ever done , despite all the trouble i had, from FL Studio crashing to losing project files - hence the track turned out bland and repetitive, but oh well, I'm moving on.

title: Love and Tolerance
description:
This was in response to a number of incidents that I saw in the brony community a while back. If we don't actively maintain community, then it will continue to head down the road it's going and fall apart.

Obviously, the lyrics of the singing parts are from Daniel Ingram's "You Gotta Share", from the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic episode, "Over a Barrel".

LYRICS:
So maybe I'm
naïve, or seeing this from a musician's perspective, but
reflective of the fact that we place, at the base, the phrase
“Love and Tolerate” in our fandom, it seems random and unexpected
That it's being neglected, rejected by the bulk of this
community. You see, I hold strongly to the hope that we can
man up and stand up and walk through conflict head on, instead of
taking the cheap route and spouting abuse. It's not
helping you or me or anypony grow.	The show
States that friendship, laughter, loyalty, honesty,
generosity, and kindness is the core of sound comradery.
But looking 'round, it's not the picture I'm seeing. These
Themes should be reflected in our very being.

You gotta share. You gotta care. It's the right thing to do.
You gotta share. You gotta care. There'll always be a way through.

Or did that become irrelevant or obsolete now? Did somehow a
show focused on the magic of friendship take a tragic turn
for the worse and make the opposite arise? The answer lies in the
hearts and the mind of those who view the show. *Pause*
Little kids know how to get this right. why can't you?
Do you put the morals into practice like you ought to?
Or are the things Fox News say about us really true?
Are we just a bunch of freaks with nothing to do? At what point did 
Bronydom miss this, and start to diss and evaluate,
misinterpret, rate, opinionate and excommunicate
Those who made a mistake with no intent to harm?
Was the charm of coloured ponies not enough? Or do we need new
content to keep us content? We fight for no reason,
maybe 'cause we're angsty teens waiting for the next season. Angrily
agreeing in front mirrors and smoke. Something's broke here. Is it
really wise to choke each other, shame and defame though under the
surface the same, aside the name, and a change
in melanin? “We shouldn't argue”, you say. Well, there's a difference between an
argument and a fight; bringing injustices to light and righting a
wrong like some rogue vigilante. Between trying to under-
stand another person's point of view, and insulting your brother, and calling his
mother a dog too. Between disgreeing with a statement a person
makes and hating them as a person, mate. Conflict is
neccesary, war isn't.

You gotta share. You gotta care. It's the right thing to do.
You gotta share. You gotta care. There'll always be a way through.
You gotta share. You gotta care. It's the right thing to do.
You gotta share. You gotta care. There'll always be a way through.

We all laughed at 
Ghost mostly 'cause of his trivial rants
yet with our song and dance, I wouldn't be surprised if someone caught us with our
pants down. How would bronies react to that? Some equate us to modern day
Furries and, mate, the line's blurry.
I'm not dissing furries here. I 'aint a hater.
But in later days, arrogance is rampant in both camps.
Although at the start, the heart was so sincere and
sympathetic, empathetic. Now it's just pathetic.
I guess my pivotal point is that you need to place others before
yourself, and shelf aside your own interests to give others the
respect they need; protect the dejected. help those who the world knows as
outcasts; the least and the last. It's always hard, but the
Seeds of kindness is what frees us from the blindness of the bitter
emptiness, and lets us shine to our full capacity.
And if you won't even try new sincerity, get out of this community.

title: Dawn
description:
Okay, Dawn should not have taken as long as it did, but I kept finding little tiny errors to fix after each export. A good lesson to take from this is to let your project sit for a day or so, then come back and check to see if you hate it or not.

This is also really different from my usual style, I recognize. Sorry if that upsets anyone, but I was trying to go for something a bit more vast than intrinsic. SubVibe was a major inspiration for the style here.

Just one track left for the main album. However, I might have some surprises in store for you guys.

Album art was made with stock from ponibooru:
http://ponibooru.413chan.net/post/view/21722
http://ponibooru.413chan.net/post/view/14513

If you find you like my work, please comment, rate, like, subscribe, follow, etc.

title: Epic Mr. Eric feat. MC Flowny ~Fluttercity~
description:
This song belongs to Epic Mr. Eric.  I am uploading it because I think he's out of the country.  As soon as he's back, I'll take it down from here! 

Great writing on MC Flowny's behalf. 
This has been in the works for ages, I wanted to do a nice soft and timid Fluttershy song for a while now...
D O W N L O A D :
http://soundcloud.com/epicmreric/fluttercity-ft-mc-flowny-1
MC F L O W N Y :
http://www.youtube.com/user/IAmRhymeFlow
F A C E B O O K :
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Epic-Eric/214124938672520
==============================================
LYRICS ~~~~
Gotta cautionary tale that you wanna hear. 
Bout a filly really shy pretty filled with fear. 

Put up in a pretty tough situation. 
Made to take trip that caused rough hesitation. 

Anyone could've done it with without much work. 
But then again, ANYONE WASN'T JUST HER. 

To MUSTER the courage, more-than-enough SIR.
to even THINK to do it, yo she was UNSURE.

But then again it's a family affair. 
And if she - didn't attend, there'd be nobody there. 

So Long story short, the result wasn't pretty. 
Imma tell you 'bout Fluttershy in the city.



Started with a letter from a distant relative. 
and that this elderly mare, had little to live.

With no heirs to care, she had little to give. 
But remembered all the kindness Fluttershy did. 

In a bid to commend her for all her kind work.
She invited the filly to stand beside her.

A MINOR request, at best many kind words.
But guess what? Fluttershy'd rather DIE FIRST.

Don't get it twisted, she loved the old mare. 
But at the time she helped, she was just-not-there.

And by there, I mean the big city. 
The noise, and the buildings, & the people moving quickly. 

And strictly-speaking, Flutter's a country girl.
In a way Canterlot is like Disneyworld. 

And Not a dizzy world, spinning like Manehattan. 
Where if you play the game wrong, anything can happen. 

And happen, things DID to her. 
After stepping out the Cab, she clipped the curb. 

And ran into a vendor, sending his wares tumbling.
Too scared to say she's sorry, she's just mumbling. 

She got lost, then ac-costed by a Diamond Dog. 
Who was -tryna pawn -watch that he lied he 'bought'.

And he GOT 20 bits out of Flutter.
He thanked her for time, as the watch starts to sputter. 

So she tried to spread her wings and just fly away.
Then Police said today wasn't flying day. 

She'd pay a fine if she flew out of order. 
But if she wants, she could take a cab to the border. 

And this sordid affair only got worse.
The gift that she brought she had dropped in her purse.

She forgot. So she didn't have it, ~ she was getting frantic
Now emphatically manic, she was having panic attacks.

DAMN... 

What's a girl to do. 

Lost in a city you feel's spitting on you.
And the truth is - any other Pony would give up now.

But beneath Fluttershy is a tough gal.

So she cried, then she dried her eyes. 
And she asked for directions from the nearest guy. 

And Rhyme Flow took her straight to the Mare's Front door.
It's anti-climactic but then why would you want more? 

===========================================
Submit To Equestria Daily if you think it's worthwhile! ;)

title: Dawn and Dusk are my Darlings Rising - Backing Track (Unmastered)
description:
OK, so this is a piano recording I did for Riku (on BAU), who wanted a lullaby for his newest story he was writing.
So me and Leo joined forces, and we came up with this. Credits for lyrics - Leo.

Lyrics:
The Sun is floating just above the horizon, but she does not cry
Though it does seem lonely up there, high in the sky
But soon there will be solace, coming not too soon
Because she has her sister, the ever shining Moon

And gifting the light of life, she ruled over the day
Always full of love for making sure there is no dismay
Giving all the ponies direction with her knowledge great
Forever is she leading them all to a much brighter fate

For there’s a bright future that will soon be found
Both Dusk and Dawn will always rest sound

And now the Moon is sailing through a star-lit sky
Watching sleepy vales with a twinkle in her eye
Bringing light to night for those far below
Singing them to sleep so tomorrow they can grow

The Darlings of Equestria, ever caring in their task
Being there for each other, there is no more they would ask
Ponies together, sing songs throughout the hills
Joyful to know that soon there will be freedom to do as they will

For there’s a bright future that will soon be found
Both Dusk and Dawn will always rest sound
Rest now, Dream Now
For there’s a bright future that will soon be found
Both Dusk and Dawn will always rest sound

Rest now, Dream Now
Rest now, Dream Now
Rest now, Dream Now

For tomorrow my Darlings must be strong

~~~~

To veiw Riku's awesome story:
http://www.fimfiction.net/story/125613/remembrance

Yes, there is a little mistake somewhere, as this was a live recording. I am working on mastering it later on.

Enjoy!

title: Interrobang Pie- Rainbow's Blood (French Dub)
description:
Tout a commencé quand madame Dash,
La jument dans les cieux sans trait de lâche,
S'est casser les os contre la vitre,
D'une voiture royale a là Britannique.

Tellement de lésions avait-elle,
Qu'elle ne pouvait même pas faire un arc-en-ciel,
Il sonnait des tonnerres, il pleuvait de la pluie,
pour des dizaines de jours et des dizaines de nuits.

Les humains sur la terre sous souffrance voluptueuse,
Criaient en colère "Quelle vile frimeuse!!"
Ils lançaient des cailloux sur tous les nuages
Pour essayer d'ârreter ce grand barrage.

Mais le secret est que la criminelle,
En fait etait notre princesse venielle,
La seule raison pour l'acte céleste,
Est qu'elle hait les Français avec un zeste.

Ô, quelle vie cruelle,
Pour la jument dans le ciel,
Ô, quelle vie cruelle,
Allez lui aider, pov'con sans ailes.

Ils ons trouvé Dash à côté d'un port.
A peine de la vie et sur le point de la mort .
Sa guérison fut vite et surprenant,
Tout à cause de son acharnement brûlant.

En plus, au sujet de son niveau de sang,
Rainbow Dash a perdu que vingt pourcent!
Et les Français, admirants de sa jeunesse.
L'ont nominé leurs nouvelle déesse.

Canterlot est devenu la Bastille d'aujourd'hui,
Entournée par les forces de la reine de la nuit.
Comme la retribution la plus approprié,
Elles ont lançé des voitures volantes vers l'enemie.

Les voitures anglaises ont détruit le château,
Du soldat le plus fort aux minuscules plateaus.
Celestia a perdu contre le Lightning Bolt,
Et maintenant attendons pour la prochaine révolte!

Ô, quelle vie cruelle,
Pour les juments dans le ciel,
Ô, quelle vie cruelle,
Allez leur aider, pov'con sans ailes.

Ô, quelle vie cruelle,
Pour les juments dans le ciel,
Ô, quelle vie cruelle,
Allez leur aider, pov'con sans ailes.

Bon, je ne peux plus inventer des nouvelles paroles. Alors voici un changement obligatoire dans la "clef". Voilà!

Ô, quelle vie cruelle,
Pour les juments dans le ciel,
Comme elle est cruelle,
Allez leur aider, pov'con sans ailes.

title: Winter Rap Off (Feb 2012) Entry
description:
Lyrics:

Feared by many, Zecora spends most of her days
Forgotten by the masses, deep in Everfree's haze.
Alhough he woods are a place that everypony fears,
The atmosphere reminds her of her yesteryears.

But in such a desolate place, she can rarely rehearse,
Since no forest-dwelling animals are fluent in verse.
So on occasions, she travells to a nearby town:
Not Ponyville or Canterlot, one of less renown,

Where the literary arts are both accepted and known
And one's talent can be freely and professionally shown.
She would've stayed there, but she ultimately chose against it,
For her potion-making hobbies would've taken a great hit.

On a more serious note, she looks at old photographs
Of those she knows she'll never again be able to share laughs.
Everfree's deepest secret which will never be known.
She sits at home crying: forever alone.

title: The Tale of the Minty Skinnie
description:
Entry for the Toastbeard ZIQ27 compo

Vocals by Cats Millionaire and me.

Lyrics:

Cast to a far away land, and I don't
know how I ended out here; but there must
be a Reason for all of this, so I'll
trot 'till my hooves are bust.

Humans everywhere, am I in
paradise, or am I just dead.
I can't decide if this would be my
punishment or a reward.

I want to return home
where i'm not all alone,

where i have my sweet bride
and my friends, that all like

who i am, they don't judge
me for who i can not be
because of my
strange anatomy

No you can't, no you can't,
no you can't, no you can't,
no you can't, no you can't
return to your homeland.

It's over, they found out
that you like humans now;
No use going back
to that stupid town. 

I thought what i wanted was this
place, but i can see now; the faults of
humans are worse than how I imagined,
I can't put up with all of this.

Screw the skinsuits, screw fingers, I'd
rather trot than walk effortless;
with my horn i so neglected
I'd weave music till perfected.

Bon-bon was right, I should've noticed;
I was turning into a worthless
being; well, not anymore;
Lyra's done with the fandom.

Songs

Everypony's Bangin' - Silva Hound
How Far We've Come - Silva Hound and ArtAttack 
Disco Lights - Alex S and PinkiePieSwear

This was the mix originally intended for the Bornycon performance.Unfortunately, Due to poor planning and lack of basic electrical knowledge (on Bronycon staffs part) the stage I was playing on did not have the proper amount of power for the event causing a brown out and make my mixer malfunction. After this huge disappointment, I returned to New Mexico and recorded the mix the way I wanted it to sound. Well here it is. This was done in one take (as it was intended to be). There are a few problems with it but its live and I had fun making it. I really hope y'all enjoy it. Thank you so much everypony for all the support.

title: ArtAttack - Still Shy VIP (Feat. Metajoker) (Expy Remix)
description:
Original: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xF_5LLKrT7o

Fluttershy vector by: http://thenaro.deviantart.com/

Big thanks to:
 - ArtAttack (http://www.youtube.com/user/HaveAnArtAttack) for making an amazing original track, which is far better than this.
 - Metajoker (http://www.youtube.com/user/metajoker1844) for having an awesome voice.
 - Kyoga (http://www.youtube.com/user/nihilisticpony) for helping me get the track and the vocals in key with his godly music theory knowledge.
 - the4thimpulse (http://www.youtube.com/user/the4thimpulse) for helping me with mixing the track during the final stages of it's production.
 - Everyone else who helped out or told me they liked the WIP of this at some time, especially Evdog, BronyTuber, Wolfie, ExplodingPonyToast, Sellyme, and Moonlightsiesta.

Ah, this track. It took far too long. I started it about a month and a half ago with the intention of making it an original work about Vinyl Scratch. However, it was very hard to find a vocalist that worked and come up with decent lyrics, so it kind of got left alone for a while. Then I put the acapella from Still Shy VIP over it, and it fit so well I decided to turn it into a remix. I wanted to try and get it as perfect as possible... but I eventually decided I may as well upload it and move on to the many other projects I have planned. So here it is! I hope people enjoy it!

(Also, overall I spent 28 hours working on this according to FL, which is far longer than anything else I have done... O.o)

Cheers,
Expy/Porcupine

title: Mare in the Moon
description:
This is my first crack at Cosmic Downtempo. It might just be my favorite genre of electronic music now, and while this might be a bit more melodic than your average CD, I'm not sure that people have entirely nailed down what Cosmic Downtempo is. I do know that it's supposed to have a lofty space feeling, and what better way to illustrate that than with a song for Luna.

This also marks the final pre-release for the UEP album. Now to begin the "remastering" process, whatever that means. Look forward to an announcement video on July 14th, and maybe even an ad video before that.

Mare in the Moon vector by "SpiritofthwWolf"
http://fav.me/d3e9he0

If you find you like my work, please comment, rate, like, subscribe, follow, etc.

description:
CELESTIA:
I'd say I wanna be ya

I be runnin' this shit,
I knocked you outta da box.
What's Luna famous for?  Wearing socks?
Bitch be runnin' in tears from every one of my mocks
Banish yo' ass for years so you can bring me some moon rocks.

I'm Best Princess




LUNA:
Yo yo I'm comin' up mean,
Straight outta my Moon Hell
Take a look at my color scheme
Not a drop of pastel

To practice my dope rhymes.

You just jokin' and ventin'
New Lunar Republic, bitch!
Representin'

And now it's Luna's turn to step on up and be tall.

You couldn't ever conquer me

You never beat me without elementals of harmony
I'm riding it high on the fan art scene
You could treated like a princess but to them, I'm a queen.

Don't have to stoop so low
To make the point that you stink
Cause even Hasbro come to know
That I ain't never been pink.

I'm Best Princess.

title: Twilight's Battle Theme
description:
Basically, i wanted to create a fighting theme for Twilight. A song that would fit in a fighting game
pretty much. I tried to not only compose it as a battle theme, i also tried to compose it after her 
personality.
So, in the end it turned out to be a sort of rock-pop with some orchestral parts in it. If you guys got any suggestions
on what genre this is, feel free to write it in the comments. I'm not sure what to call this myself!

As always, i appreciate anys sort of feedback.

I just really wanted to tell you all that the

title: Dreaming is Timeless
description: This is a mashup of Matthew Mosier's "Dreaming, Waiting", with Archie's "Magic is Timeless". I've been friends with Matthew for a while, and introduced him to MLR.Now he's about 3 times as popular than me. XD But he deserves it. I wish him the best.

title: [PREVIEW] Struggle For Existence (Changelings vs. Ponies Mix)
description:
This is the second break of a WIP for an album I'm working on called Drone For Hire. It tells the story of a Changeling deserter and a raging war with ponies... with fat hard beats, high-pitched screeches, dark melodies and euphoric breaks. :)

This track illustrates an on-going conflict between Ponies and Changelings. The break itself is about 70% done.

I've been trying to add a few scenes from The Royal Wedding in the background in which the Changelings are rampaging through the streets and shrieks of agony from ponies, but I'm going to do that later. I want to finish the music first.

title: Winter Wrap Up (End of Our Days Mix)
description:
PLEASE READ!

This remix took me a very long time to finish (around a month) what with work, school, and what not, but I am very happy with the way it turned out.

It starts off a little slow, but that was my intention. I like to include my own little melody when doing a remix to kind of mesh the original song with my own style (if you could call it that).

With that said, I have been a fan of the show for a while, and much like the television series, this song isn't trying to be anything more than what its meant to be, which is a relaxing song you can enjoy and remember.

As always, I love reading reviews regardless if they are good or bad. So please feel free to say whatever you like and perhaps give some critique on the way!!

title: Thy grace, Queen Chrysalis
description:
So the story behind this one is quite simple really. Imagine a scenario where Cadence and Shining Armor didn't defeat Chrysalis. She 
became the new ruler of Equestria. While a harsh and sturdy leader, the more time spends with her beloved subjects, the more her heart
opens towards them. If she were in a old RPG, her alignment would be Lawful Evil. I wanted this song to reflect not only herself, but also the feelings her subjects 
feel when they spend time with her. (If that's by her side or in her dungeon is another story.)
Therefore, the song is filled with different emotions and feelings. There's evil parts, more harmonic and melodical etc.

title: The Great Toastbeard Hip-Hop Mashup
description:
[b]FILLIES AND GENTLECOLTS....[/b]

I present the The Great Toastbeard Hip-Hop Mash-Up.

"ZIQ: Pony Music Compo - a one-week compo based on a theme"

there have been 41 such ZIQ compos and 40 winners chosen

To celebrate TB's b-day, I sampled. All. 40. Of. The Winners. 

All at 160bpm. 

Filthy Drums Breaks, 808s, Beatboxing, and moar. Holla.

title: Be Assertive (ft AndTheRainfall)
description:
Hey this track made the Balloon After Party!! Wooooot! This is the first track of a 2 track collaboration I'm doing with my best brony friend AndTheRainfall. This track was a blast even if it was running headlong in the wrong direction from everything else we figured that others would be doing (we did sloppy noise rock mixed with punk rock attitude and ‘gasp’ a sense of humor) or that we’ve both made so far. I’m so glad it was accepted despite being a nice hot fun mess. We stayed up until 3:30 and just made the deadline so well worth the lack of sleep.

You can get the whole album (for free even) here http://balloonparty.bandcamp.com/album/after-party
More info on the recording if you care, lol http://djpon-3.tumblr.com/post/26541677675/thatrainfallguy-aviatorsmusic-finally-the ATR did all the guitars!

title: Eurobeat Brony - Luna (DJ Andµ Bootleg Instrumental)
Yarr, Pirates (feat. Marshmelon)
description:
This was a song made for ZIQ 26. Marshmelon wrote and sang the lyrics, and I made the instrumental track. It was mixed and mastered by HMage. I made this four months ago and I'm just now uploading it, so I've improved quite a bit since then.

LYRICS:
Yo ho, yo ho ho (x8)

I've got me crew! Hoist the anchor, me lads! 
Set sail for Pony Island, for thar's booty to be had! 
(PINK CELESTIAS ALL!) Nay, that be not the treasure I seek! 
Avast, Fluttershy's Ass! (Yay!) Louder! (YARR!) 

On our ship, The Poison Joke, we don't take no gruff! 
(Christ, we're *pirates!*) Who cares if we watch pony stuff! 
We've loaded up our cannons with confetti and balloons 
'cause they're far easier to carry than them Spanish gold dubloons! 

[Well, that be the first verse! Let's sing a rousing pirate chorus! 
(Arr!) Are ye ready, me lads? (Arr!)] 

Yo ho, yo ho ho (x8)

Hoist the main sail! If I've read my stars correctly 
Take a left at Friendship Pass, and we'll find the Ilse directly 
(Captain, what about that giant purple beast?) 
Why, that's just Stephen Magnet, jump the ship, give him a feast! 

On our ship, The Poison Joke, we don't care 'bout gettin' laid. 
But we all trust in the friendship bonds that Twilight helped us made 
Our flag is is full of awesome, 'cause it's Rainbow Dashin' round 
'n' all the sailors run and hide when they see Toastbeard's come to town! 

[Alright, ye scurvy dogs! Can ye hold yer own without the bassline? (Yarr!)] 

Yo ho, yo ho ho (x8)

Well the Cutie Mark Crusaders 
joined and left within a day 
And the Royal Princess Navy 
Knows to stay out of our way 
We respect each buck and colt 
Each filly and each mare
We burn toystores to the ground 
If tha ponies be nay thar! 

Yo ho, yo ho ho (x8)

[Various pirate sounds]

title: Brew ~A Prequel~ Remix by Colortwelve feat. MC Flowny
description:
Hip-Hop Remix of the Russian Gypsy Jazz Remix of Pinkie's Brew

UPDATE: 7/9/12 7pm - WE MADE EQD!!!!
http://www.equestriadaily.com/2012/07/music-remix-bubble-berrys-orphanage.html#idc-container

Lyrics:

Pinkie - 
gimme a sec to take in all of your words
you tryna tell me that you want the spin the world in reverse

and bake a portal to a different time a different dimension
in an attempt to save your parents with a time intervention.?

Hold up. 
Now I ain't sayin what you want can be done. 
But then again we got an Alicorn that raises the sun.

Check it.
I'll check my recipes to see what we got. 
No harm in messing with the universe, let's give it a shot. 

This book I have is admanantly saying this is taboo.
That if we tap into the time-stream that we're the breakin the rules.

But hay, it's an experiment, and your reasons good. 
To do a little voodoo magic like a good daughter should. 

Now here's a list, take your time and make sure everything's perfect. 
Because you only get one chance, it'd better be worth it.

Pay attention to the words that I'm about to describe.
Cause if you mess up just a little we will probably die.

Watch as I work my gypsy magic 
Eye of a newt and cinnamon 
Watch as the matter turns to batter
open the portal, jump in!

Now, it's says 'caution' - it's probably a guideline.
I don't see a problem with maybe dicing the timeline.

A fine line between madness and kindness.
If it was just me, honestly, I wouldn't try this. 

But it's just advice, you can take it now or leave it.
And you could live your life knowing you never succeeded.

And believe me, I can tell in your voice, you really need it.
To bring your parents back would be an emtpy life, completed.

Don't ever think I'd ever let a pony leave defeated.
So once you crack basilisk eggs... make sure to beat it. 

And the time dough, please take time to really knead it.
The lack of folding space equates the wormhole's overheated.

And the LAST THING we need is another event horizon. 
But if you do it right you'll find the cake is slowly rising.

And voila! You've created and baked a time rift.
Or a Magic-based Culinary Paradigm Shift. 

Watch as I weave my voodoo magic
Heart of the bat, and marjoram
Watch as the mixture starts to blister
open the door to dark lands.

Once you go, the portal is up to you.
And you can tweak the recipe to change what it'll do. 

Before I let you leave, would you mind signing the waiver.
I'll need it signed in blood, so put your hoof upon the paper.

There is a small chance you'll unlock the great abyss. 
But what the hell, you do it for the parents that you miss.

It's a shame that I can't go to Bronycon
So I vent out my frustation in this bloody song.

Yet I can merely use my time to rhyme.

Are hanging out IRL with Tara Strong (U JELLY?)

And be the founder of a new brony community!

But why be depressed? We too feel the pain!
But we still have the Galacon or BUCK to gain!
(Haha, you Americans! Let's see you spend a jillion dollars to fly over to our house!)
We'll have cowbells and music and artists of high calibre,
Not to mention we'll have Discord as our movie manager.
I'll meet you there in person, or maybe through the feed!
And we shall be the friendship that you'll ever need!

title: A Medley Of Some Unfinished Tracks
description:
This is basically a random assortment of songs I've worked on that I ended up losing or crapping out on. Enjoy.

1)Grand Nocturne
Intended to be some kind of "Vinyl meets Luna" track. I felt really good about it, but I got massive musician's block and just decided to scrap the project. I have the file saved, so I might pick it up again some time though.

2)Tune Of The Moon (Luna's Theme)
Self-explanitory. A theme for everyone's favorite ruler of the night.

3)Colors Blur (Theme Of The Running Of The Leaves)
I loved the Running Of The Leaves portion of Fall Weather Friends, and I wanted to make a song for it. Again, I got stuck, and I felt that it really wasn't all that great. That midbass freaking sucks.

4)Chill Quick
Just a simple little Drum n' Bass loop. Probably something Vinyl would listen to while brushing her teeth or something.

5)Prepare To Be Taught! (Cheerilee's Theme)
Heavily inspired by early 90's house music.

6)In The Vapor
Not much to say about this one. Mane 6's first journey into space?

7)Chilled Juice
Moonlight beach party! Well, that's what it makes me think of.

title: Remain
description:
Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/navy-brony
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/navybrony

Lyrics:
(Intro/Verse 1)
Come with me to a place,
where emptiness surrounds the essence
of what we started and where we're now.
Lost and forgotten, a disharmony.

(Verse 2)
Ask yourself now why you are here?
We're still going strong.  The end isn't near.
I serve as a messenger, but heed this if you must
It's only if you're unaware that it will come to pass.

(Chorus)
We will strive onward
and we will persevere
for we bear the true meanings of
love and tolerance
and if we ever decide to go our separate ways
we'll look back at this time and then we'll smile.

(Bridge)
There was a time when we agreed.
There was a time when we could stand eachother.
An everlasting friendship, forged by ourselves,
bringing hope and vision to a darkened world.
But we found a way to fight ourselves.
But we found a way to fight everyone.
A brief endearing moment, forgotten,
like a summer's breeze, blowing by.
You thought it was the fault of the cloppers.
You thought it was the fault of the furries.
You thought it was the fault of everyone else,
but did you stop and think that it was the fault of ourselves?

(Chorus)

Inspiration for the song?

First off, this song isn't to make anybody frustrated or angry.  I won't lie, there's been some issues with the community, but nothing out of the ordinary, and that's the problem right there.  People like to blame others for whatever situation happens that they don't expect and/or they don't like.  This song was meant to have an uplifting message.  One that basically states how we may have our issues, but as long as we don't blame others for those issues, we can always move on with the community.

OMG talk about a serious buzz kill type song.  Ah well, that's what I do best.

Genre: Electronic/Industrial

title: [Mashups] Leftovers Mix
description:
This is my first "Leftovers mix". This a mix of mashups that I could not complete for reasons such as: Too short or repetitive, I've already done a mashup with one of the sources, It was not my own idea (a cover), or the mix didn't work and only one part did well. Because of these reasons tracks in the mix may not be completely "done". If you complete any of the mixes in this mix, Please do post as a response here. Enjoy.

(StormWolf + WoodenToaster vs Pendulum)

(Twenty Ten vs F3nning)

Giggle At The Ghostly vs Move Along
(MLP Cast vs The All American Rejects)

title: Becoming Popular (Solo Acoustic Guitar Arrangement)
description:
Here's a "warm fuzzies" version of "Becoming Popular" by everyone's good friend, Daniel Ingram. I liked how "Love is in Bloom" came out and a YouTube friend suggested "Becoming Popular", and there you go. An hour to arrange and many days to practice and it's still not perfect...let's just say it's "charmingly rustic"?

So, pour yourself a glass of merlot (if you drink, I don't, so it's root beer for me), grab a nice lamb or beef shank (or if you're vegematarian, a hearty stew), sit with your special somepony down by the fire in your cabin in the woods (of course) and let the correct notes take you away. And nevermind the messy ones. ;P

Here's the sheet music for it: http://www.mediafire.com/view/?dcrvl1apij1vuu1

I saw this image and just had to put it with this song. It helps the warm fuzzies multiply. Artist is: http://rizcifra.deviantart.com/ and I'm really liking the emotion he puts in his works.

Remember kids: Daniel Ingram wrote this piece and all copyright resides with him, his publishing company, Hasbro, or something like that. Who knows with corporations.

title: MC Flowny ~ Diane's Cupcakes
description:
Me and 'guns have been on this for a while, and it was fortunate he was able to complete it before Halloween.  (Nightmare Night).

This is an homage to all things terrifying and grim... A Horror Core Rap about Pinkamena Diane Pie.  Long story short I finally mustered the courage to read 'Cupcakes' and found it more disturbing than it's reputation.  Pair that with Gun's demented beat... and you have "Diane's Cupcakes".  

I imagine Zecora sitting around a fireplace telling foals the legend of the Pink Haired Serial Killer and the demonic presence that coaxes her to do it.  This penultimately completes my Halloween Songs for the month... with hopefully one more to be pulled off.

Enjoy. 

LYRICS: 

Don't ya smell it in the air. 
Somepony hungry for tthe blood moon is comin near.
This be Nightmare Night, the mightiest break.
They shudder at the thought of becomin a cupcakes 

He come Diane, Pinkamena 
Hair so straight wit an insane demeanor 
Seen her in the corner wit a knife and a gleam 
in her eyes.  Tonight another pony dies. 

Hi... I'm the voice that hides inside Pinkies mind. 
She thinks it's fine that we converse every single time.

If I resided inside anypony else...
They'd seek out mental help, or think that they were into hell. 

Well, my luck she embraces me.
It takes a certain sanity to casually awaken me. 

I've seen the depths of depravity that this girl possesses
Of the hosts i've possessed she the best by stretches. 

In the sessions that share we peelin' ponies like they oranges. 
Saws and syringes we diggin inside their orifices 

Horror films & Stories they couldn't replicate this. 
WHY HATE US, IT'S FATE ~ YA NIGHTMARES MADE US
Subjugated to blades that split ligaments 
And rip tendons to ribbons a hacksaw stickin in. 

Blood splatters like rain puddles, and brain matter 
gathers and clutters the floor to insane laughter. 

*CHORUS* 

And it doesn't reay matter, you can STRUGGLE, RESIST! 
Cause the harder that you fight means the HARDER THAT I GRIN AND I WISH 

you could show me this agony everytime I want it. 
And I'm HONEST every time you faint, I WANNA VOMIT. 

BECAUSE YOU NEED TO BE AWAKE.
YOU NEED TO SEE ME EATING YOU ALIVE ~ CUPCAKES! 

And these other horror song's you've heard?  JUST FAKES. 
And it's not FATE, your FACE ~ DISPLAYED ON MY PLATE. 

I have planned and calculated the method since DAY ONE
This DEMON's been SCREAMIN for me to TASTE ONE. 

It's TAKES one of these Ponies to even MAKE ONE.
How to take this horn from your head?  cALL JASON. 

Add in some cinnamon to it.  With the Spine Fluid. 
Divine drink of the Blind Druids.

When you DIE, You & I are unified INSIDE ME. 
BEHIND THE EYES OF of Pinkamena RESIDES ME.

title: Gypsy Strings (Gypsy Bard Orchestral Mix)
description:
First of all. I ADORE the original of this song :) Friendship is Witchcraft is brilliant.

It can be found here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4LohgzBKXLY

I decided that the part I loved about the song was the lyrics. Which is strange because I'm not normally a fan of lyrics. So I created this version in an attempt to highlight the lyrics with minimal accompaniment while still sounding interesting.

I didn't spent a whole lot of time on this but it is enough to fill the gap between now and when I get a new midi controller :)

I based it on a midi file created by the talented "OctaviasPianist" which can be found here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hEN2GUh6YpE
I used a mixture of the old and new versions of his midi.

title: Bloom - MC Flowny (8 Bars over the extended ver of Love In Bloom)
description:
8 Bars over Love Is In Bloom

This is my short but sweet nod to a very infectious pop track that surprised me when I watched the Season 2 Finale.  Pinkie pulling Pon3 from wherever and suddenly Twilight proving why Unicorns were genetically gifted to perform.

I loved this song!  I loved it even more that an extended version came out, and I always wanted to put a short 8-bar verse on there.  It seemed appropriate.  Anyway, to keep it consistent I kept the first part of the video, and after my verse, I wanted the rest of the song to play with pictures that would be continuation of the photos from the first part.  It's fast... and it's short.  But I promise the next release is a full fledged song.

Lyrics: 

From the beginning I could tell. 
Our story together whatever way would end well. 
And well, here we are on the verge of matrimony.
I'd be the groom and you would be my little pony.
Only in this case you would be my light.
You would be my life. 
And in every sense of the word you would be my wife.
And it's right, when we first met. 
You planted the seed. 
And it's bloomed to a love that I NEED. Please.

Credits: 
Hasbro for MLP
Hub for FIM 
Daniel Ingram for the song
Rebecca Shiochet for singing it

description:

IAmSwagg back on the track, let's get it on

Drop a hot beat and start my rise to fame it's insane
All of these fans I do attain
Put a hoof in the game without having to be profane, call me tame
Goin against the grain so by the time I leave my reign
It won't ever be the same
Check it, it's me rockin this microphone
Vinyl Scratch, on the track, just to aid my flow
And you will like the show, get set, let's go
Rainbow Dash on my side, I can't be slow
Now let's hit it
Me and Pinkie won't quit
We'll party all night until one of us split
My beats I transmit, through the mic I emit
This bit with such wit, Twilight Sparkle would sit

(Chorus)
And listen to the bronies on the track like that (like that)
Yeah we got bronies on the track like that (like that)
You know we got bronies on the track like that (like that)
Cause we make it hot on the track when we rap

IAmSwagg Canterlot flow like that

(Verse 2)
We got bronies on the track like that
MLP, make it real, on the track like that
You know I love this show even though I'm black
Stand strong, so cool, you can call me Big Mac

title: Between The Sky And The Stars
description:
CREDITS:
-Mallard Puddlebuck for the help in mixing the song
http://www.youtube.com/EquestrianHype
-Glaze/WoodenToaster for the vocodised vocals and advice
https://www.youtube.com/WoodenToaster

Instrumental coming soon


LYRICS:
Once again I'm back here,
Cornered by the audience and their watching eyes,
Grace, style, power, control,
Are what I must use to break the lies and to
Show
No, prove
That I am capable
That I'm infallible

They always said
"Adjust yourself to your surrounding"
But really the lesson is the other way around.
Why should I bow down to their rules,
When I am the one who moves around.

The bell chimes, it is time,
Enter the stage now and show,
Exactly what you can do, what makes your inner heart glow.

We don't see much eye-to-eye, (We don't see much eye-to-eye,)
We watch you as you go by (I see you sometimes nearby)
You make a fool of yourself (You make a fool of yourself)
And we just look down and sigh. (And I just look down and sigh.)

We say you're better than us (You say I'm better than you)
That you possess innate charms (That I possess innate charms)
Yet why does it feel as though (Yet why does it feel as though)
You're the one causing self-harm?
 
Hold your talk
Suck it up and rise up to the
Dance floor
Lock the door
Shut it out

Hear them speak
Hear your screams
You'll prove them wrong so
Smash their pride and give a shout
LET IT OUT!

Finally I'm back here,
Confronting the audience and their watching eyes,
Grace, style, power, control,
Are what I shall use to break their minds and to
Show
No, prove
That I am capable
That I'm infallible

I am free.

title: The Teardown of Equestria
description:
Imagine a world where the Brony fad tones down, Princess Luna becoming Nightmare Moon, and a sad place on the internet where some men refuse to watch My Little Pony. This song is a metal ballad song which covers the story.

Features a live metal guitar played by my trusty Fender Squire Mini.

The amp preset used for the guitar is Industrial Overdrive in Garageband (The program used for creating music on a Mac).

Made in Garageband using Mac OS X 10.10 Yosemite on a Late 2012 Mac Mini.

Tools used: Fender Squire Mini, Garageband, Mac OS X 10.10 Yosemite, Mac Mini (Late 2012), Audacity (for final mixing).

title: Alone she wanders through the Equestrian wasteland seeking friendship
The return to the mine
description:
So! New song here! Decided to go back to the kind of style i used in "Friendship Never Fails", so a melodical and upbeat electronical song. This time, i used real drums tough.
Backstory is quite simple. 
The song's story and music is based on an idea i had for a MLP platforming game. Created this for a level where the Mane6 would have to travel back to the mines/caves
the Diamond Dogs lived in. What would they find? What sort of adventure, and beauty, waited for them ahead?

Tried to make it both adventures and sort of emotional, both to make it fit with the level i had in mind, but also to fit Rarity's personality. "A Dog and pony show" focused on Rarity, 
and thus i also tried to make the song similar to her personality. While she is very calm, caring and loving, she also enjoys adventures and would never
step down to help her friends.

title: Moonstuck (Original Mix)
description:
HEAR IT HERE: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=STL7kDNP6_A

***

Well, I had massive art-block for few days. I couldn’t make anything - wallpaper, photos, music… Absolutely nothing. Just random surfing through the networks. Also yesterday I didn’t have access through the whole day but at least I received I-DE-AS! Finally!

What can I say about this track… Originally I made it few days ago and it was kinda ready to send to YT. But when I rode it in Audiosurf I realised it was so… boring! Really. Seven minutes long trance lullaby. Then the art crash came… and finally - yesterday. I reorganized the track, corrected the pads and suddenly I had Moonstuck’s Woona crossing around my mind. So I thought: “instrumental Moonstuck track isn’t a bad idea” and I made it.

Why Moonstuck? Dunno, really. Maybe because that pads in the break reminds me that pic I used as a cover - Woona sitting on the Moon and stargazing. Also I like that series :) So if you somehow doesn’t know it, visit Moonstuck’s tumblr (link below).

And one last thing: I didn’t put that cut version of track without a reason. It’s kinda experiment, you know. I wanted to give you an essence of this track, without the intro and outro. The original mix you’ll find in Download section.

GENRE: Electronic || STYLE: Trance
BPM: 136
_____

Bandcamp wav: http://nicolasdominique.bandcamp.com/track/moonstuck (1$)

ART
Cover (by EnnervateIndustries): http://fav.me/d53muu4
Moonstuck: http://woonastuck.tumblr.com
http://egophiliac.deviantart.com/

_____

VISIT MY OTHER PAGES:
DeviantART: http://niklasshepherd.deviantart.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Nicolas-Dominique/127278100744857
Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/nicolas-dominique
Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/99plusmusic

I made this when I felt really bad for myself, sad/angry. 

It's about MLP, of course.

It's about a Changeling who gets punished. because of his foolishness to make friends with the citizens of Ponyville, when he clearly should've been following his tasks. Feeling shame that he did such things, he exiled himself. He went on a search to find himself, to fill his abandoned mind with what he was destined for.

YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/navybrony
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/navybrony

Background image used with permission, by John Joseco: http://johnjoseco.deviantart.com/art/Crazy-Pie-and-Angry-Shy-209810495

Decided to remix one of my earliest songs because I've learned a lot in music since then, and didn't just want to create a remastered version, although I did remaster the original song too, which can be downloaded here: http://www.mediafire.com/?33764609n60qal1

This will also be my last song under the name of Navy Brony.  From now on, Navy Brony will be used for PIRL videos, parodies, etc.  I will still be uploading songs on this account, but they will be under the name of Navron.

A little background on the song (considering there's no lyrical content):

Story is about an obsessive brony who, through using Astral Projection, attempts to visit Equestria.  He succeeds, but the Equestria of his mind is not the Equestria he envisioned, and is soon trapped in a nightmare in which there is no way out.

Genre: Trance/Dubstep

Where are your friends now? Have a look around. They all

title: Acheron - Derpy and Carrot Top's Epic
description:
You're listening to Part 4 of Derpy and Carrot Top's Epic. 

Art by the wonderful Ziom05:
http://ziom05.deviantart.com/art/Derpy-s-and-Carrot-Top-s-journey-Part-4-327556715

Album Art:
http://www.mediafire.com/view/?5d3u8kvuv0f10rm

Soundcloud:
https://soundcloud.com/the-carbon-maestro/acheron-derpy-and-carrot-tops

Tumblr:
http://carbon-maestro.tumblr.com/

Part 4 of the series Derpy and Carrot Top's Epic. In Greek mythology, Acheron is one of the tributaries to the river Styx in the underworld.

I imagine them just floating downriver with no return. Just chilling. The dead are whispering. Death is beautiful, yet creepy. Or you can imagine the whispering choir as "life" entering the realm of death. 

I imagine the Timberwolves are not chasing our protagonists, but instead they are running away from the ice (notice how one freezes in the left). These are just my opinions and in no way should reflect on your interpretation to Ziom's amazing artwork. 

Part 5 will be out soon.

title: Aint no party like a pinkie pie party
Rainbow Dash Hates...
description:
"I was inspired by [Swedish singer-songwriter] Robyn's 'Don't F***ing Tell Me What to Do,' with the composition and whatnot... the lyrics were structured similarly to that track, except without the 'Don't f***ing tell me what to do' part. So basically just a remix of some audio from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, but at the same time, it's like a ponyfied version of Robyn's song.

"Dashie hates a lot of stuff on this song (i.e. Derpy [Hooves], ponies touching her hooves, so on). Kinda repetitive but I think it works." - Adrian 'Impala' Mata

-----

[Rainbow Dash] 
I hate losing... [16x]

[Verse 1] 
I hate an egghead 
I hate acting all sappy 
I hate Derpy 
I hate ponies touching my hooves

I hate sour apples 
I hate my life (Not cool!) 
I hate an out-of-control vehicle 
I hate adorable trash

[Repeat verse 1]

[Verse 2] 
I hate a bucket of turnips 
I hate drawing frowny faces 
I hate over-the-top super-hyper antics 
I hate Mare Do Well

I hate playing too nice 
I hate falling off cliffs today 
I hate an out-of-control vehicle 
I hate adorable trash

Not cool!

I hate... 
I hate... 
Hate... 
Hate...

Not, not cool! 
I, I...

Cool... [4x]

-----

released 04 June 2013

MUSIC/PRODUCTION 
Composed and produced by Adrian "Impala" Mata in FL Studio 11 
Vocals - Ashleigh Ball (as Rainbow Dash)

SAMPLES/INTERPOLATIONS 
"My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic" (Hasbro/DHX/The Hub/Discovery Communications) (some soundbytes from kyrospawn [ kyrospawn.deviantart.com ] and My Little Pony Team Fortress 2 Mods [ www.mlptf2mods.com/create/reference-materials ]) 
"Don't F***ing Tell Me What to Do" by Robyn (Konichiwa Records/Cherrytree/Interscope/Universal Music Group)

ARTWORK 
MysteriousKaos ( mysteriouskaos.deviantart.com ) - Rainbow Dash vector 
James "dadio46" Borland ( dadio46.deviantart.com ) - Shard brushes 
Media Militia - lens flare

title: Rebecca Black vs Wooden Toaster - _Russian Cereal Factory_
description:
I couldn't find a clean acapella, so this is not as good as I would have liked it to be. 

Some of my friends overanalysed the song "Friday", and came to the conclusion that it was about a group of amoral kids that knew there was a bomb on the school bus and avoided it without telling anyone. The reason why they're partying is because they're glad they're still alive (which is kinda cruel and inconsiderate). The moral of this story is don't overanalyse pop music.

The original version of the picture can be found here: http://images5.fanpop.com/image/photos/29100000/Me-and-The-Filly-rainbow-factory-29138180-637-477.png I think the artist's name is Hachu, but I wasn't able to find him.

title: Something I'm Not
description:
The original idea behind this one was to make a hardstep track in the style of Omnipony. I sort of got there, but I still can't get a track nearly as loud as he can. I really need to work on mixing too before I even consider slamming the limiter on a track.

At one point I thought the track would end up being about Wendigos, because I think it has a sort of icy feel to it. But I really wanted to use that spike clip, and realized that the song could sort of work with the idea of Spike becoming a monster that he is ashamed of being seen as.

Eh, could have come up with something better I'm sure, amongst other things. But I'm pretty happy with this overall, so I hope you are too. Still taking critique as always.

If you find you like my work, please comment, rate, like, subscribe, follow, etc.

--

title: Fluttershy's goodbye remade
description:
Special Song time!
So, for reaching 500 subscribers, i wanted to do something special. And i thought "Let's remake my first song, Fluttershy's Goodbye!" 
I was actually going to wait with it, and do it when i reached 600 or 700 subscribers, but my good friend Senjan told me to go for it, so i did! His channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/Senjan Check him out, he is awesome.

For those of you who haven't heard the original, here is a link to it: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TnvYRJwJA-Q
Here is also the idea behind the original and the remake :
When composing this song, i had a scenario in my head, where Fluttershy (for some reason) had to permanently move away from Ponyville.
This song would play when she and her friends had their last get together, where they all talked about memories and so on and so forth.

I tried to make sure this version were pretty much like the original, and therefor i didn't really add to a whole lot of new things.
I kept it simple, melodic and emotional. Basically, i wanted fans of the original to also like this one, just as much or more.
 
Thanks for sticking with me guys. I really appreciate all the feedback and praise you've given me. Let's aim for 1000 subscribers!

title: Interstellar Alicorn
description:
I'm just gonna say it; I'm really excited about what's in store for Twilight in her new life as a princess. Some people seem to think the changes that are going to happen will ruin the show forever, but I'm fully confident this will open up all sorts of new interesting stuff for the show to explore.

I made this tune with the potential of Twilight's new life in mind. The scene in the ethereal realm definitely captured the spacey mood of the track, too, which I'm particularly proud of.

So without further ado, have some classic goa trance.

Thanks to:
IamtehPILOT for letting me use the image: http://iamtehpilot.deviantart.com/art/It-s-Time-354839872
http://www.mlptf2mods.com/create/reference-materials as always for their awesome vocal rips.
And finally to the people who make this show that continues to inspire me.

title: A Tangled Web (Pinkie Pie)
description:
Pinkie has all these relationships, but how does she keep track of it all? I figure she has some sort of ethereal system of categorization that only she can see.

That silly filly and her colored strings.

Instrumental:
http://soundcloud.com/steven_ad/a-tangled-web-instrumental

Pinkie Vector by tdreyer1:
http://tdreyer1.deviantart.com/art/Pinkie-Pie-Back-of-the-Pie-310588331

Strings by me. In Paint.net. Which explains why they look like lines. Because they're lines.
===

LYRA-ICS:

Nothing could prepare this world to see with different eyes.
Nothing's free or everything is- until you set a price.
We're all interconnected by a string, it seems.
The never-ending, patent-pending Tangled Web Pinkie Pie, alright.

(All Rights Reserved. Trademark and Copyright Pinkie Pie.)

Hmmmmmmmmm...

One is blue, and one is yellow.
White and purple, orange too.
A palette of most every color
Across the world and all around her.

You know she's never alone.
You know the world is her home.
You know she's never alone
She couldn't stand it.
You've got nothing to lose,
And if you feel sad or blue
She'll tie a string onto you.

Hmmmmmmmm...
Hmmmmmmmm...
Hmmmmmmmm...
Hmmmmmmmm...

===

It takes two to tangle.

title: Becoming Bitular (Becoming Popular)
description:
MP3: http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/493487

Commission for Peter H.

"Becoming Popular (The Pony Everypony Should Know) is a song featured in the episode Sweet and Elite. The song is accompanied by a montage sequence of Rarity mingling with Canterlot high society and becoming a highly-regarded socialite. Derpy is featured among the many ponies in the mosaic picture at around, sporting her paper bag costume, from the episode, Luna Eclipsed, and a pearl necklace. Photo Finish, Sapphire Shores, Hoity Toity and Prince Blueblood, all well known celebrities, briefly feature in the music sequence as well."

title: Super Twilight 64
description:
MP3 (Instrumentals): http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/495390

Arrangement/Art: SuperPsyguy
Vocals: SerenaMidori
Lyrics: 
SerenaMidori
SolidJake

"Bob-omb battlefield" is © Nintendo

Dear Princess Celestia, here's what I learned today!

Come on down to the old library! Which just happens to be a big tree
Inside you'll find, books of all kinds, of that I can guarantee
Everything is so tidy and neat, every bookshelf is stocked and complete
Spike writes down her thoughts, but only with lots of easy words
('Cause he's dumb!)
Spike: Hey!

If you've seen all the books that she's read, you'd agree that she is an egghead
She never had friends, just ink and pens, spent time studying instead
She thought it would all go downhill, when she was sent to Ponyville
These crazy mares, made her theirs, and now she's stuck
(They're insane!)

Every single day they drive her up the wall
She can never read or concentrate at all
She writes to Celestia 'bout what she's learned
If a letter didn't show, she'd be concerned ("She" here is Celestia, can be shown better in the video?)

She's the brains of the team
Follow her strict regime
If things don't go as planned
She'll overreact
Under stress she can't work
And she's kind of a jerk
If she can't understand
She'll burst into flames!

Back when she was just a foal, learning magic was her only goal
Try as she might, it just wasn't right, and that magic took its toll
But thanks to a Sonic Rainboom, that shook up the whole testing room
She got a lift, and found her gift of great magic
(Cutie mark!)

She helps every single filly, when they're off task and silly
Solver of crime, traveler of time, making checklists in her sleep
Her job as an organizer, is actually fun for her
Much better than, way back when, in Canterlot
(Kindergarten!)

A pony that is prompt and on time, there's no doubt
Whenever a deadline's missed, it freaks her out
Jumping to conclusions that are usually wrong
She gets even crazier than Tara Strong!

Even if she's sad and down
She will not get pushed around
Make a threat to her friends
She will buck you up
Her power is not a trick
Element of Magic
Together in the end
They can save the day

Sea Ponies appeared in the two G1 specials and the G1 MLP movie. Inhabitants of the lakes and seas, they love water polo and spontaneous song and dance numbers. For some reason they are very fondly remembered by fans, mostly due to their tremendously odd designs and THAT SONG!

title: Interrobang's Piefect Mash Clash
description:
Read the description for download links!
---------------------------------------------------------------
mp3: http://www.mediafire.com/?36jrj6dmxv8h5qg
ftm: http://www.mediafire.com/?n6r1an69tel4d5s
nsf: http://www.mediafire.com/?lw722rlgwr43vm5
soundcloud(wav): http://soundcloud.com/uberkillius/interrobangs-piefect-mash
sheet music: http://www.nahimpullinyourleg.com/?ihopethisisntactuallyaurl

This is an NES chiptune made by re-imagining various themes from Interrobang Pie's "Clash with Dash" and "Rainbow's Blood" and a theme from "Cirno's Perfect Math Class" by IOSYS as well as a section that uses a similar arp technique found in Pipsqueak's Thunder Plunder. There are a couple of hidden melody bits in the bass, but I'll let you figure those out for yourself~.

I mostly consider this a remix of Clash with Dash, but here are all the original songs the melodies come from.
Clash with Dash by Interrobang Pie
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rrVGjsG4GV0

Rainbow's Blood by Interrobang Pie
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5zk_9kmbw2U

Cirno's Perfect Math Class by IOSYS
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GNeyqFfXf7k

This was also Eurobeat at some point, I'm not sure if it still is though.
