title: Find A Pet Song (Bigger and Cooler Rock Cover)
description:
This one goes out to the tortoises, 'cause Tank is best pet.

I always wanted to do this song, because I really liked that it was a duet and that it was a change of pace from Pinkie Pie's more uptempo songs.

This song took a while to put together. While I had no particular problems with drums and bass, arranging the guitars was tougher. I tried to stay true to the original arrangement, but I wasn't always sure how well a classical arrangement would translate to electric guitar. I'm still not 100% sure about some bits, but a finally came to a point where I didn't see anything else I could do, and so I decided to release it.

As always, faves and comments are greatly appreciated.

title: We are the Shadowbolts (Feat. Kyoga)
description:
Well, this is here to prove to you guys that I'm STILL TRYING with my suckish vocals, and can still write something that isn't classical.

I always loved the concept of the Shadowbolts. They looked cool, and DAT VOICE from the leader one. So I wrote a rock song about them. =)

Many thanks to Kyoga for  the guitar solo! Subscribe to him and see more of his cool music here:
http://www.youtube.com/user/NihilisticPony

Instrumental: http://www.mediafire.com/?1mpu4q5kzzch0x3

Lyrics:

Above Equestria,
There's peace in the daylight.
But in the shadows of the night,
The sky is a blight.

The darkness comes from us.
We will not be ignored.
The air, where the pegasi have soared,
Our dark lighning roared.

We are the Shadowbolts!
Flyin' into the chase,
No one shall ever win
The race against the evil ways!

Our speed will conquer you,
Bringing a vile typhoon.
Our revolution
comes soon, with our Nightmare Moon!

We need a captain,
So we asked Rainbow Dash.
She said she was loyal to her friends,
And that's how it ends.

She's now our enemy,
So we will not give in.
If we ever cross  her path again,
She'll be sorry then!

We are the Shadowbolts!
Flyin' into the chase,
No one shall ever win
The race against the evil ways!

Our speed will conquer you,
Bringing a vile typhoon.
Our revolution

every foe we have met

title: Pinkie Pie's Smile Song Bitmix
description:
MP3: http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/500173
Like and favorite to smile smile smile!
http://www.twitter.com/SuperPsyguy

Another video to let people know SerenaMidori and I will be at http://bronyfanfair.com/ in Austin, TX September 8th-9th with -hopefully- a panel. Hope to see you there!

"The Smile Song[2] is a song featured in the episode A Friend in Deed. It is sung by Pinkie Pie expressing her love of laughter, happiness, and friends when making her way around Ponyville with a great big smile. In the sequence Pinkie can be seen greeting several ponies, cheering up sad fillies and helping Applejack paint her barn. By the end of the song a large crowd of smiling background ponies and the leading characters have gathered around Pinkie Pie. They all sing along for the finale of the song after which Pinkie Pie meets Cranky Doodle Donkey for the first time. The song was uploaded to YouTube by user "Veronica Dela Cruz" on 7 November 2011 but removed soon after; the leak led to Hasbro "cracking down" on material released by the show's artists.[3]"
Midi by supermatt314

title: Novi Era
description:
The years of peace and harmony have passed and Equestria is now in a dark age of greed and death. Years of instability and distrust between the princesses have taken its toll and now they mighty powers are about to strike against each other.

Caught in the middle off all this are the poor citizens of Equestria, who can only watch as the two powers destroy their land. 

And as the armies focus on each other, more and more of the innocent citizens are left for the evil that now roams Equestria, with nopony to stand up for them. 

Keep your friends close and your weapon ready, because this is the new Equestria.

(End of introduction)


This song was a request by my good friend Diggidoo. A RP he is in just had it's one year anniversary, and he 
asked me to create a song for it. Link to his Deviantart: http://diggidoo.deviantart.com/ He also drew the background picture.

In case you want to now a little bit about the RP, you can get some information on it here : http://ponyepic.wikia.com/wiki/The_Pony_Epic_of_Epic_Epicness_Wiki

I was quite heavily inspired by FurryFoxfire's song "The Rise of a New Lunar Republic" (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2M0CCOEWGQM&feature=plcp).
Check it out, it is awesome.

I also want to thank both Diggidoo and Senjan for giving me feedback on this one. Senjan's Youtube : http://www.youtube.com/user/Senjan

title: I'dLike2beaTree befriends Nosnibormada - Down to my Level
description:
Agh! I'm sorry for the long period of nothing, faithful followers! I'd like to say that I was hard at work making tons of music over the summer, but if I did I would be lying. I have gotten back into the swing of things recently, so hopefully you'll be getting some more music from me soon. This summer hasn't been a total bust, however, since I've managed to at least get a collaboration done with a fellow brony musician. He's a rapper and singer on Youtube who goes under the name 'I'dLike2beaTree' and he's also a pretty friendly guy. Go check out his Youtube here if you want to hear more of his stuff: http://www.youtube.com/user/IdLike2BeATree

Anyway, as for the song itself, this is a song about Queen Chrysalis' hatred towards Princess Celestia in the finale of Season 2 of MLP: FiM. It's a rather dark affair but it's still least melodic. I actually think it's the most melodic hip hop beat I've yet produced. 
Samples taken from: 
My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic - A Canterlot Wedding, part 2 (sounds) 
The Incredible Bongo Band - Apache 
Mother Lode - Soft Shell 
Miles Davis - So What 
Brian Eno - 1/2 
Claude Debussy - Claire de Lune 
Mahler - Symphony 5, movement 4

Lyrics:

VERSE 1:

You think you can own all of our land 
Blaspheme to your people and think we wont stand 
up for what we believe in, to recognize 
the nationalistic sin- think we won't devise 
A way to bring down your authoritative rule 
prove that we aren't just barbaric fools 
a people, when united can still fight 
we can and will come together to unite 
One day, somehow, i will take back what's mine 
Somehow convince your people, how to redefine 
what life is, what it means. 
What love is, why it's just so obscene 
maybe then they can finally see through that screen 
that you built, in the hopes that no one would see 
Im the only one who can bring us salvation 
Somehow avoid my people's death by starvation 
So i will, i will remake and rebuild 
only after all your people have been killed 
and thus my own will rise to the top 
never to stop, never to drop 
Living only as the best of the best 
something to which you cannot attest 
I will grow stronger and live longer 
something that i cannot say for you

Chorus: 
I will bring you down to my level 
only then will the people revel 
and they'll finally see what you did wrong 
Once again, our people will be strong

VERSE 2:

Imagine a world with no autocracy 
let me introduce a new theocracy 
wave bye bye to this old hypocrisy 
As i instill my new bureaucracy 
the time has come for Celestia's Judgement 
Let her finally feel our own torment 
As her people, and her empire, buckle and fall 
Our (ultimate) victory, none can forestall 
No longer will we waste away in the dark 
This is our final journey, and its time to embark

CHORUS x2

VERSE 3:

You're discovery was a bit too late 
finally you'll feel our thousand year hate 
Your defenses are failing, it's time to resign 
Down with your monuments, up with my shrine! 
A final battle, one that you cannot win 
Now the greatest feast of our lives will begin 
BOw to the supreme ruler of your people 
Nothing can attest to this, 1000 foot steeple 
I have won, listen to the sound of the drums 
it's all over, even love cant overcome!

No! This can't happen, won't! I wont let it 
Losing is one thing that i cannot permit.

Attempt and failure.
Dream and disbelief.
Sleepless nights.
Despair.
Hope. 

Scootaloo is trying so much to fly like Rainbow Dash but still she's not able to. She don't know why but somehow she can't do it. But still she's doing her best to be like Dash. And... hope someday she will.
But for now she can only sit on the ground and watch her idol flying in the skies, dreaming about flying...

title: Evil United
description:
New song, coming up!

Another symphonic electronical metal-ish song. This one was really fun to create, and i am pretty happy with the outcome.
So, storywise, imagine a battle with the three main villains from season 1 and 2, where they are allies. 
They all have different personalities, and i wanted the song to reflect that. I sort of wanted to song to have different personalites aswell,
which is why it changes from upbeat and heavy parts to more hopefull and calm parts. Whenever i imagine a battle song, i not only
imagine it as being heavy and pumping, but also hopefull and melodical, i don't know about you.

WAV: http://nicolasdominique.bandcamp.com/track/teithepony-sins-of-the-solar-empire-nd-remix (0,45 $)
_____

Yeah, first video made in After Effects! That wave may be a little too... big, but remember - that's my first video there.
And about the remix... I loved the since I heard the demo. Then was quite nice and with vocals became even better. I must admit, I'm not a fan of Mic's tunes but in Tei's track he made a great work. 
First I was trying to make remix in my style, trance, but I can't make good vibes. Then I decided to make something different - something more electronic and breaks. So I did that. Funny thing I was asking Tei about his pads from Sins and... I didn't use them after all. 
So enjoy if that's possible!
_____

Story of that track (by Tei):
The story is basically that Princess Celestia, trough the mids of time always had these hench men to do her evil deeds just to make sure that no one played in the night, which eventually led to Princess Luna's jealousy and demise.

LYRICS:

(Verse1)
Shrouded beneath the lucid, moonlit sky
Veiled in darkness; Hiding from your sight
These messengers; waiting and roaming the streets
Keeping an eye out and making sure you sleep.
Their silohuette's eclipsing the light as they stride
With eyes fixed upon them from those still inside
Yes these are the ones, with their hearts clad in fire,
That are known to us all as The Sins of the Solar Empire

(Verse2)
Under the orders from the the Princess of the Sun.
If they find you awake, you'll have nowhere to run.
If slumber elsudes you, then you'd better pray.
To be lucky enough to see the light of day.
The howls and screams of those caught within the night.
A reminder to those who wish to stand and fight.
Your future looks bleak; the consequences are dire.
For none can stand against The Sins of the Solar Empire.

http://8-xenon-8.deviantart.com/art/RD-s-Super-Speed-Strut-vector-321003590

A hearty thank you and credit to Winter Solstice, who helped shape the lyrics into something worth singing! :)
Also many thanks to Lt. Andrei for helping with the vox and mastering.

LYRICS:
She sent two crowned guards,
Charged with escorting Spike,
And, her faithful student Twi,
to see how friendships form,
so, since that very special day,

Equines say:

Fluttershy's by the river,
AJ's farming the ground,
Rainbow's old dashing pride
turns her 'round and around.
Pinkie's songs are the reasons
Twilight stirs in the night,
Rarity's sense of fashion
Shows what's wrong and what's right.

The Friends who'll never leave your heart!

Ditzy Doo bakes her muffins
'Tavi's strings flow their sound
Vinyl's scratching tunes
Spin you 'round and around
Lyra's dreams are of envy
Bon-Bon's voice sparks the fight
And Doc Hooves in the fanon,
Protects us day 'n night

There are plans for them
Zecora's Alchemy
An' derpy's deliveries
valued are those harmony gems
Adventures that nothing had fortold

Discord's power over you.

They broke Luna free,
Chaos was remedied,
despite the calamity that
brought them all down to their knees,

Harmonic Elements of old,

Legend's told:

Fluttershy's by the river,
AJ's farming the ground,
Rainbow's old dashing pride
turns her 'round and around.
Pinkie's songs are the reasons
Twilight stirs in the night,
Rarity's sense of fashion
Shows what's wrong and what's right.

The Friends who'll never leave your heart!

Only time will tell
Those cakes in corridors
will grow up a little more
The curse of love saved by the bell,
The young dragon's leaving for the wild

Still a child

https://dl.dropbox.com/s/n71epu0mgpi0zl3/RiddleAcapella127bpm?dl=1

title: Max Volume Required Remix (WAV FILE VER.)
Equestrian Knights
description:
Awhile ago I used to run a Brony guild called Equestrian Knights. We were based in the game TERA Online. In TERA it was the guilds that stuck together and worked together that could end up being elected to run a maintain a territory in-game. We were so lucky to get elected :) When my friend Ralyks and I decided to create this guild, we never really imagined how large it would get. The people that we met through the guild we are still friends with today :)

Thanks for all the fun times and epic quests and boss battles :)

title: Schism
description:
I couldn't guess the colour of your skin (I need to, I need to take a breath) 
The lights are going dark, I think I'm fading out. 
I can't feel you now, I can feel it now, my air's going flat 
Your hooves on my skin like the hooves on my mouth.

I don't wanna go, I'm not ready to go. 
I don't wanna go, I don't wanna go.

And it feels like 
There was more for me (Oh~) 
I don't want to die alone. 
I never thought that I'd 
Never get a chance to say goodbye 
To say goodbye

And when you're all out of breath 
There's not much else that is left, no 
Why you chose me, I won't ever know 
But I don't want to go. 
Still I don't want to go.

title: You're Going To Love Me (Fluttershy's Theme) [remastered]
description:
I've wanted to remaster this track for a while now and this time it's actually mixed. :)

----------------------------------------

Hey everypony!

This is my overly corny and sentimental attempt to portray Fluttershy's character with music. I guess what inspired me was that she can be more courageous and assertive (hint hint) than any other pony although being so timid.

The brony community has to be one of the best communities in the world. The sheer amount of great songs and talented musicians is inspiring. That's why i tried to write a song myself (and now it's intimidating as well as inspiring). I don't think it's particularly good though. Oh, well.

Enjoy.

Artwork by Jewelweed-Shine (http://jewelweed-shine.deviantart.com/)

title: A New Perspective
description:
A song I made about Rainbow Dash. This song is based on the idea of Rainbow Dash flying over Equestria and looking at it from a perspective that most don't get to see, from the sky. Mostly about how beautiful it would look from above. 

Will be on my EP alongside "Pinkie Says Dance", "Why So Shy", and "Queen Chrysalis Takes Over Equestria" The EP will be based on each of the main 6 and some background characters. No official release date though being it may take me awhile to make because of school and other stuff. Hope you enjoy.

Original Art used for cover: http://poninnahka.deviantart.com/art/Rainbow-Dash-flying-293679851

title: Amy's Chords
description:
Chimmi Cherry Chonga inside.
***
**
*
It all began when Amy Keating Rogers has posted this post on her Twitter: https://twitter.com/KeatingRogers/status/239121251992469504

Just a few notes... and that was I need to made a track. First I made a melody using this notes and then... the whole rest. I posted demo of it on my Soundcloud and I was very surprised when I read a tweet from Amy that she likes it! That was so OMGOMGOMGOMGOMGOMG!
In that moment this track was almost ready so with that boost I made it a lot faster than I was expected. 

I'm not quite sure what genre it is... For me it's something between dance, house and trance... But... I guess it doesn't matter.

So... this is my music dedication to you, Amy! For all you made for us, bronies. 

And she likes it ^^ https://twitter.com/KeatingRogers/status/240470334208352256

title: Twixie's Rage (a Prequel)
description:
alright this is actually a lead up into a song that a friend of mine did that i said i would write a response to... well i wrote the response... and it became the challenge. so i have to say thanks buffalo beucase i probably would NOT have done this TB if it wasn't for you
Beat By Chili
Lyrics By Versal



Lyrics:
I once had everything my heart could ever dream
Who'd a knew a white lie this it would bring
crowds all chanting go trixie
But the hill was a steep slope i'm spiralling
Just a few months back i was a show stopper
All of that stopped by one ursa minor
And one dang city one purple pony
When i think of what happened it fuels my heart with fire
A burning desire powered by my rage
I try to contain it but it's breaking its cage
As hard as i try i cant keep it at bay
Her and her friends have to pay for that day
I'll show her i'll show them all
The great and powerful still stands tall
Back to the basics learn how to crawl
Next time they see me i'll be without flaws
Hook
Been dreamin waiting for this day
That i would come back and wipe that smirk off your face
Once a pon a time you left me in a daze
But now i'm coming back to advenge this disgrace
That you did to me ever since it happened
I've honing my magic slowly i've been tapping
By the end of this dance the crowd wont be clapping
For you atleast but i'll be so happy
Twilight i'm proving that i'm better
I'm not backing down NO not ever
Over your rieng is very stormy weather
Your going down today please put it in your letter
To celestia i'm proving whats true
What you cant i can cuz i'm better then you

title: Cerulean Blue cover
description:
YouTube link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BPGNTEBer4M


This is my first contribution to the pony fandom. (Well technically, I didn't make I just covered it, Replacer made the original.) 
But  anyhoof, 
I just want to say a couple things, so bear with me you have a short attention span. 
This is probably the best TV show  I have ever seen to come out of kids television that doesn't assume you're stupid. Thank you Lauren for your  brilliant ideas, and thank you Hasbro for letting Lauren do what she wanted with the show (For the most part.)   and making something everyone could watch, not just children 

Thank you Lauren Faust. I thank you very much for making such a great show that doesn't make me cringe from the horrible writing/voice acting.

I'd also like to thank Daniel Ingram for making such amazing music for the show! you're a very talented guy, and I wish you good luck in your future endeavors if you decide to leave MLP:FiM anytime in the future. :D

Sorry this description is so long, but I had a LOT to say. Thanks for reading, and I hope you enjoy my cover of one of my favorite fan songs!

Replacer's songs are really good and credit to him for the original song and the instrumental!

- RainboomX13 (A.K.A RainbowBrony)

title: Dark Empire featuring Rhyme Flow and BuffaloBrony
description:
Versal, Rhymeflow, and Buffalo decided to make a song about nightmare night... "what could POSSIBLE have gone wrong" the 3 members of Discorded Harmony thought... yea. this is in no way shape or form related to Y@C Nightmare
Instrumental by Chill

RhymeFlow: http://www.youtube.com/iamrhymeflow
BuffaloBrony: http://www.youtube.com/buffalobrony

Backstory... Nightmare Moon Returns and its time for vengence.

ANYWHO LYRICS

Versal:
Welcome all her faithful tonight is the night
Where the moon will shine bright and we will prove our might
Goals in sight no more waiting
Time to finish the mission luna has givin
To block out the sun the Its gonna be fun
Seeing the last breaths escape from celestia's lungs
As she see's her empire fall not looking so tall
Making her crawl and thats just the beginning
Imagine the elements gone except for one
Twilight weeping over the friends she won
Pie Pinkie her coat now red and sweaty
It'll make me smile seeing rainbows on ground
Rarity her mane ruined and bloody
Fluttershy when she's cried enough THEN she can die
Applejack i guess all those apples were bad for your health
Theres a apple in your throat and your heart itself

Chorus (Buffalo)
One thousand years shrouded
In darkness, surrounded.
Her vengeance, what guides it?
Just know she's out to claim her revenge

RhymeFlow
raise to the Night Mare.
Praise be eternal Night 

Taste blood in the night air. 
Slay ponies standing RIGHT THERE. 

Hate flows through my veins 
As my eyes get wide with the light flare. 

I've been inside insane asylums over half my life.
I stay asleep during the day so I can have the night.

Mad delight as I am freed from my bonds.
I will carry out the will of my GODS.

The goddess is the nightmare and she commands me. 
Demands that I take lives and lives I WILL TAKE GLADLY.

underneath the canvas of the dark ~ abandon your hope 
Cause Luna's plan is just to rip at your throat. 

I feel it in the fear of the fillies in this fickle town. 
Silence all their screams to trickles. I bring the sickle down.

I BRING THE SICKLE DOWN. Take all of you underground

BuffaloBrony
Then why would you care, thinking 'bout this blue mare,
When you're too afraid to look into my stare!?
Though, I'm here, you dare to show your fear!?
I've been on the moon for a f-cking thousand years!

And for a thousand years, I've been the only one,
I've been the only one, who's never had a friend...

Like the rest of them, you should try your best to escape;
There's an emergency exit otherwise know as death!

But here's my testament resting up in a stone tomb,
It's not a crime keeping friends in a store room!

Underneath the floor, lies hidden catacombs,
It's a prison like a labyrinth for those who roam
Within it, they're hidden, and hoping that they could be home,
But let me tell you now you're under my throne!

And it's a nice home, it's got books and warm fire,
I even got you all beds so you can sleep tonight :D

So get used to it! This is your life now,
Never see the bright sky... Don't gripe, down

Here it's always nighttime, ephemeral darkness,
Under Nightmare Moon's Dark Empire...

title: Sisters
description:
This song was made to display Celestia and Lunas thoughts towards each other preceeding and following Lunas banishment to the moon. This is the first song in a series of three:

1. Sisters             (Published) http://eqbeats.org/track/474
2. The Nightmare War   (Published) http://eqbeats.org/track/1907
3. One Thousand Years  (Published) http://eqbeats.org/track/473

This song features two parts; Celestias part, which is played on the "celesta", and Lunas part which is played on a synth "vox" (Synth voice). The two instruments are very much the same, as were Princess Celestia and Princess Luna. Though both are very distinguishable when played together they could easily be mistaken for each other when played separately. Once again echoing the two princesses.

title: Major Battle (March 2012 WRO)
description:
Evdog’s Winter Rap Off entry, Twilight meets an Ursa Major. K, in the

Red corner, we got an Ursa Major.
This ain’t some minor problem. This beast’d scare the roofs and the
Hooves of the homes and the ponies in the area.
He’d scare you if you were there, ‘cause, y’know, he’s a bear. An’ in the

Purple corner, a sparkle of hope.
Twilight’s taking him on with …a floating piece of rope?
No, wait! Trixie. She’s come back. Redemption Fanfic? Maybe.
Since Nopony’s been acting themselves lately.

With a flash of light they try to restrain the might of the
Ursa, but he put up a fight and they can’t contain him.
He takes a swipe at the two girls, misses, then hurls a
Giant rock in the direction of the cake shop.

Come on, man. We need that more than you think.
See, we can’t live without the Cakes and Pinkie.
We’ll, we can… but things’d just be very boring.
…Moving on.

It seems the duo can do naught to fraught
 the stranger bringing danger to ponies everywhere
The bear edges closer, with a menacing growl
We really could use a Deus ex Machina right now.

An’ then Luna rocks up, an’ she kicks up a storm. She’s like
“What ‘chu doin’ in Ponyville”, but in a more proper form.
The Major meets his maker and he’s like “see ya later”, and
Makes a break for his cave while everypony raves on about Luna. 
No longer feared but revered, the night mare steals the spotlight.
One wonders why didn’t she come sooner?

title: Counter Culture
description:
Verse 1
Where are your friends now? Have a look around. They all
Pushed you down, kicked you on the ground, and left you battered and bruised.
None of what you own or known or could've shown could stop the
Arrogance and pride inside your heart, so they collectively used
Every part of you that they could lay a hand on
Just to rise and stand upon the giant they refuse to name.
Now you got nothing, no one, nowhere to run, your time
Has come, but keep in mind you used to be exactly the same.

Verse 2
I see you wanna be a man, and plan your way back to the top
again to regain what you think is meaning incarnate
But today, let me show you about a way, completely
Counter-culture to the way in which you used to operate
Realise, open up your eyes, and see a day
where everybody puts each other first because they choose to
live that way. They have travelled through the pain and learned
that one another matters more than any system in the world.

Chorus
I see you're wondering what friendship could be,
But can't you see: true love will set you free.
Not the shallow love you know from the shadows of your throne,
but one that sets aside self to make a space for harmony

description:
This one's more about Pinkie's world, though the eyes of her best friend or lover. I'd had this song in idea phase for ages, so I thank Toast Beard for getting this out of me.

Also, it's an acoustic song, which is something I haven't done in about a year. :D

Many thanks to Indeable, who helped with the lyrics of the second and third verse: http://www.youtube.com/user/theindeable

LYRICS

[u]Verse 1[/u]
I know this is a generic chord progression
But please go easy, I've got a lot on my mind right now
See, I'm bordering insanity and depression
I've gotta sort this out with you somehow
I know you've always been a bubbly pony
It seems spontaneity's your pastime
Now I would understand if you call me stony
But it's only 'cause I'm slowly losing my mind

[u]Pre-Chorus[/u]
You're just to crazy for me mare
You're just to crazy for me mare
Yeah.

[u]Chorus[/u]
I don't hate you. I really don't.
It's just you're way more than I can handle.
How can I show you, you can make it easier on me
Please stop messin' with my head.

[u]Verse 2[/u]
I always turn to you when I need laughter
You help me through the bad times and good
But this time, I need saving from disaster
And it seems that you have me misunderstood
You always take the tangents over yonder
Yet you always seem to know whats going on
How you end up being right. I wonder
But that's something that I'm now dependant upon

Pre-Chorus, then Chorus x2

[u]Verse 3[/u]
At times your motives seem like a delusion
I'm not sure if you mean to be askew
But over time, I've come to this conclusion:
you're out of place but that's why i need you
Sure, you're really wild and too much for me
but theres more to you than what's on the outside
You're a caring, friendly pony, Pinkie
And there's no reason why those aspects should hide

Chorus x3

title: Winter Wrap-Up (Evdog Orchestral Remix)
description:
This was originally going to be an original orchestral piece. Then ...something happened. The original song is rather upbeat (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dyrAkwJ6WsY), so I took away it's springy beat and gave it a more wintry feel.

This probably isn't the best thing I've ever made, but I'm reasonably happy with it. I promise that the next song I make will not be about ponies.

She sent two crowned guards,

AJ's farming the ground,

The Friends who'll never leave your heart!

Vinyl's scratching tunes
Spin you 'round and around

And Doc Hooves in the fanon,
Protects us day 'n night

There are plans for them

An' derpy's deliveries
valued are those harmony gems
Adventures that nothing had fortold

Discord's power over you.

They broke Luna free,
Chaos was remedied,
despite the calamity that
brought them all down to their knees,

Harmonic Elements of old,

Legend's told:

Fluttershy's by the river,
AJ's farming the ground,
Rainbow's old dashing pride
turns her 'round and around.
Pinkie's songs are the reasons
Twilight stirs in the night,
Rarity's sense of fashion
Shows what's wrong and what's right.

The Friends who'll never leave your heart!

Only time will tell
Those cakes in corridors
will grow up a little more
The curse of love saved by the bell,
The young dragon's leaving for the wild

Still a child

title: DasDeer - Road to Appleloosa (Freewave's Road House w/o Rap Remix)
description:
'Over A Barrel' is one of the under-rated eps from MLP and one that is rarely explored so I loved DasDeer's original which captured it's theme. I made his orchestral track more upbeat and rhythm heavy and let Braeburn give a tour through Appleloosa.  Why is Dj Pon-3 heading out west to there? Turns out Pon-3 was hired for a gig out there so Octavia and I took a journey by carriage. Have vinyl will travel. This version is without the RAP which I ditched for the final youtube version (wasn't sure if i liked it or not, why don't you choose) and a couple last minute changes. Enjoy either version.

Thanks for the art w/ permission from http://whiteeyedcat.deviantart.com/art/Appleloosa-257607878
Thanks to DasDeer for letting me remix his original http://soundcloud.com/dasdeer/the-road-to-appleloosa
Version WITH the rap if you want it
http://soundcloud.com/dj-p0n-3/dasdeer-road-to-appleloosa-dj

title: Makkon - Celestial Origins (Freewave's Epic Remix)
description:
Well this has been a track I've been working on sporadically for months so I really hope you enjoy this. I'm a huge fan of Makkon and his original so doing an electronic / dance remix for something that was completely orchestral seemed like a fun twist (I did use a small bit of his original during the breakdown). You can't go back any earlier in MLP then the first minute of Season 1 Ep1 and Celestia, Nightmare Moon, and Equestria's origin story. The idea of two warring sisters who control day and night and having to banish your own sister is pretty epic so I hope this captures some of this.Wanted the pmv to be as big as the track, hope you like!

Thanks again so much to Makkon for the chance to remix this and the midi
His original is here http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0PLs7QuwzRc

Artwork by (thx for permission from all)
Kevin Bolk http://kevinbolk.deviantart.com/gallery/31705695

title: F3nning - Evil Enchantress (Freewave's Smoking Blue Flowers Remix)
description: Toastbeard Topic: Ponies+Drugs, lol. I had to go for sampling and using Bridle Gossip as inspiration as that ep is FILLED with drug references (don't smoke the blue flowers fillies). F3nning did a great winter rap-off of Evil Enchantress so wanted to pitch that down and make druggy hip-hop ala Dj Screw. I think F3nning sounding like a 300 lb black man is pretty awesome.

title: Freewave Befriends Aviators - Winter Jump Up (Dave Loves Ponies Remix)
description: This is a remix of [b]Aviators[/b] - Winter Wrap Up (show cover) which we both agreed already had a a certain resemblance to [b]Van Halen[/b]'s Jump. I thought we could go a little further with that resemblance and added some more VH style and samples to the track. I like to think Dave is a MLP fan (his favorite pony is obviously Pinkie) and he's certainly old enough to be a first generation Brony (see the music video). This is a remix, parody, tribute, cover, and a mash-up all in one that I had fun making and was my second mash-up of the week.

title: Tarby - Pony Confessions (Freewave's We Are the End Remix)
description: This Tarby remix (my first Toastbeard entry) is based on a few converging thoughts. Two "the end is near" postings (one on MLR and another on Pony Confessions and listening to Tarby's "We Are the End" which is so powerful an instrumental that it seemed to channel these posts into "lyrics" (just spoken from their posts, i can't sing). It's not meant to preachy but I think a track that makes you think about what the community was capable of losing (ie imploding) is a good thing. I was nervous on how comments about the strife within the Brony community would be received by an "outsider" but the reception to this was better than I could have forseen (tied for 2nd on Toastbeard for that week and my most positive reception as a musician ever at that point).

title: We're Just Friends (Ponify Biz Markie)
description:
Note: This is the remastered ersion with vocals brought down alittle to fit better. 

I've been working on this cover for a while, so I hope you enjoy. May become a part of a bigger project called (Ponify the 80's) if I can find people interested in working on it with me. I'm not good at like coordination so that would be helful too. lol Anyways, this is kind of a wierd not so normal project for me so please don't judge too harshly, it's merely supposed to be humorous. It is also based on the first 10 chapters to this fanfic: http://www.fimfiction.net/index.php?view=category&tracking=1&order=updated

Lyrics:

Have you ever met a mare that you wanted to date?
But you couldn't ask her out 'cause you'd already made
A friendship that was just too good to destroy
But now was in the way of maybe ultimate joy

Let me tell you a lil' story about a filly I know
Had me head over hoof silly with my cheeks glowin'
There was no slowin my heart rate
When I was thinkin' 'bout this girl from the Canterlot state

Now Twilight Sparkle was her name
And everything magic was her game
Always burried in a book she seemed dorky and tame
Still this pony had me trippin up all the same

I'm an athlete and she's a mathlete
I be flyin' mach 3 while she's writin' up a task sheet
They say opposites attract but this wasn't her reaction
When I kissed her on the lips tryin to start lil action

Chorus:
You, you got what I need
But you say that we're just friends
Oh you say that we're just friends

Oh Girl, you got what I need
But you say that we're just friends
No, you say that we're just friends

Oh baby you...
You...

Now you're sayin hold on Dash this can't be how this ends
And you would be right, oh so right my little friend
After the rain started pouring and we'd had a little fight
I waited on her doorstep 'til the morning light

Now this sounds like a dumb thing to do and it was
But that's what you do when love has struck you such
Still even with a cold it paid off in the end
'Cause she invited me in to warm up in her bed

Not in the way that you think but she nursed me back to health
We made up as friends and she told me 'bout herself
This mare had never had somepony special in her life
I thought, "now you have me" even if the timin' wasn't right

I had planted the seeds now I would have to let them grow
And it was hurtin' my heart not knowin if they'd show
But a happy surprise is a surprise none the less
She stopped me 'fore I left, looked in my eyes and confessed

Chorus:
You, you got what I need
But you say that we're just friends
Oh you say that we're just friends

Oh baby you, you got what I need
Don't say that we're just friends
Tell me I'm more than just your friend

Oh girl...
I'm more than just your friend

The next day was the best of my life
It seemed that all was right when it's me and Twilight
Call us Filly Foolers or whatever you like
But you just jelly son 'cause that Twi is all mine

But as the days went by it seemed that she had doubts
And the closer I got the more that they came out
We'd be hot and then cold and she said no one could know
You drive me to my limits girl and pull my heart out when it shows

I took her to my home town, my old stomping grounds
A chance to compete so the Wonderbolts i might astound
But she kept bringin' me down so i layed it out
You either get real or go back to the ground

Now with only seconds to go before the cloudsdale show
It was messing me up and stressing out my flow
But just as they were calling my number sixteen
Twilight busts in infront of all and kisses me

I ask her if she's sure and she says that it's true
"Rainbow Dash I will always choose you"
She's says from my side she will leave never
And for me it truely was "The Best Day Ever!"

title: Luna Ascends
description:
This was supposed to be the introductory song for a symphonic metal album I was working on. It was supposed to feature full voice acting and a grimdark storyline combing the realms of magic, technology, guns and swords.

It made ground but it slowly deteriorated due to unforeseen circumstances.

I have halted the project and renamed this song from "Chronicles of the Republic" to "Luna Ascends"

Also, I noticed that there's no classical genre selection here. Thus the reason why I put it up as an instrumental.. Well.. it actually is an instrumental. so yeah.

title: Glaze - Rainbow Factory (Redymare Remix)
description:
Rainbow Factory was the first song I ever listened to in the fandom (even before watching the show itself).
So I figured it should as well be the first song for me to remix and make from start to finish.
With the aim to make the whole thing sound a bit darker than it already does in the original, I couldn't help myself but add an organ and a harpsichord.
After encountering some problems, it's finally done. Hope you enjoy!

- - - - - :3 - - - - -

title: [B.B.B.F.F.]Big Brother Best Friend Forever (Trance Remix)
description:
Okay so I tried working backwards in comparison to what I normally do. Normally when I want to remix a song, I work around the acapella, but instead I decided to make the song first (well part of it), then have the acapella work around it. I must say, this worked out a thousand times better, less stress, and finished faster. Although I missed the good ol times of finding out what to do.

Anyway, I hope you guys like this. This is so far my favorite remix that I've done so far and I'm starting to better familiarize myself with Fruity Loops Studio. Hope you enjoy this.

Also, thanks to generalzoi for the pony maker. Probably should've made my cutie mark a music note or general dj gear cause I'm not exactly a turntablist but meh, I'll go with it. Rest is just 2 hours of photoshop magic.

Finished an AMV of it: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wk3Km9viDsg

title: Octavia's Secret Track
description:
Before the lights and the fame and the top selling records. Before the fans and tours and late nights on the road. There was just a young grey mare with a love for her cello, a degree in classic musical theory and a dream of playing in the Royal Canterlot Orchestra. Well, that and a white pony with a wild cerulean mane and eyes of mystery hidden behind purple shades. A pony who came from a very different world than her and lived to a very different kind of tune. Her greatest friend and ally. Now, left with only bitter sweet memories in her heart, Octavia retreats from the spotlight back to a warm secluded cottage in the rustic Ponyville she once shared with that somepony special to find piece of mind and to put down all the heavy memories and whirling emotions locked away deep inside of her in one last secret project. . .

Today, we bring you one of Octavia's finest and most coveted, for it's rarity, compositions. Please enjoy, courtesy of National Pony Radio and ponies like you.

Captain Iron Heart never wanted to be here. He wanted to be home, with his family, his newborn son. He never even got to name him.
He doesn't remember his own name. The other soldiers gave him his nickname after he defended a group of injured troops by himself. It stuck.

All he knows is war, now. But he fights, and he dreams of home, of a mare who loves him and a son who will look up to him.

He writes a letter.

He'll never get to say it himself.

title: My Little Pony Friendship is Magic (MRPPony Remix)
description:
Every now and then I get a remix in my mind from various tracks but most of the time I just ignore it either because I'm not at that skill level or whatever. This time, I pause on my original track I was doing to sketch this down before I end up forgetting this. You know on some classic breaks albums, tracks would have a fairly long intro that features someone talking about some serious stuff and the track slowly enters in? Yeah, I've been wanting to try this for a while but only up till now did I finally get to actually doing it.

This is based on the episode and theme song which are under the same name. In any case, I hope you all enjoy this. Heh, this all together took about 8 1/2 hours to finish.

title: Royal Canterlot Voice
description:
"Royal Canterlot Voice"
Original Song by 0neTr1ckP0ny

Well, it's finally done; my first pony original. It actually all went a lot smoother than I anticipated. I wasn't even planning on doing an original song, but then I saw a picture of Luna using her Royal Canterlot Voice, the idea for the main riff popped in my head, and everything else fell into place fairly quickly. If only songwriting could always be this easy.

I already have a new song mostly written, but I expect it to be more complicated to record than this one. I guess I'll see once I get going, so no promises as to when it will be ready.

As always (or maybe now even more since it's my own song) likes, favorites, comments and subs are greatly appreciated. And share it with whomever you think might like this song.

To quote David Lee Roth: "If you like it, tell a friend. If you hate it, tell an enemy." 

------------

Notes:

- The guitars are in drop C. I probably need heavier strings... 
- The vocals are what they are; I'm not much of a singer.
- The electronic bits were done by trial and error; I have no idea what I'm doing when it comes to electronic music. Maybe somebody someday will make those parts better. 
- The lyrics (if you can call them that) speak of Luna's feelings of alienation after coming back from a thousand years spent on the moon (pre "Luna Eclipsed").

------------

Lyrics:
I've been away for so long everything I used to know has changed
I don't recognize this place, I'm the only one who's still the same

I try not to be bitter
I try to be strong
I try to make my voice heard
But it always comes out wrong

I scream but nopony hears me
I'm drowned out by the noise
I call but nopony answers
With my Royal Canterlot Voice

I hardly go outside but when I do the ponies talk behind my back
The nighttime is so lonely that sometimes I feel about to crack

I try not to be angry
I try to belong
I try to make myself heard
But it always comes out wrong

Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh...

title: Darkness in a Perfect World
description:
~ Check the description ~

*****
If you want to support me, buy a track from my Bandcamp!
http://nicolasdominique.bandcamp.com/
_____

VISIT MY:
DeviantART: http://niklasshepherd.deviantart.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Nicolas-Dominique/127278100744857
Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/nicolas-dominique
Tumblr: http://n-dominique.tumblr.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/99plusmusic
_____

Featured on EQD: http://www.equestriadaily.com/2012/09/instrumental-music-sisterhooves.html -- track #2
_____

ART
Pic made by The Pingas Lord: http://fav.me/d560t4w
Cover made by Slimmy: https://twitter.com/slimmyjims (YT: http://bit.ly/Q8AFQm)
_____

Equestria seems to be a perfect place to live... but is it?
Or maybe it's darker than we all thought? The series are colorful and full of light... pure manipulation. But some of us remember that this country is not so kind... Guess you remember Trixie... Yes, she was annoying and too self-confident... but maybe it was only an act? A show for the audience? And then she was hated by the whole city, because the Mane6 authority said so. So she can only run away...
Now she's observing the sleeping city of Ponyville at night. Wondering if she should try to come here again... and wondering... and wondering... And watching the starry skies, thinking about everything she has done...

So here's a story about changeling queen Chrysalis who was trying to take over Equestria, using Shining Armor's love to Cadance. She wanted to find food - love - for the hive... but she failed. She was defeated and she landed far, far away from Equestria on the Borderlands. She's hurt and in pain. But she's still alive. Now she's only able to lying still on the ground but she's already planning her revange on the princesses and Twilight Sparkle and her brother. She only needs to rest and think... Because she knows one thing... Soon the victory will be hers.
Soon... just... soon...

title: Pegasi Blues
description:
Created using a Korg Wavestation, a Alden electric guitar, Behringer C-3 Microphone, Rakarrack, fluidsyth's sf2 Ardour and hydrogen.

The beats are straight from hydrogen without edits save for the volume fader. The voice tracks are compressed using the calf compressor and the singing parts are equalised with the SWH parametric equaliser. The bass line is done with the electric guitar, using rakarrack to create the subharmonic, turning it into a bass. The 'trumpet' is the Korg Wavestation default 'DigitalResWave' instrument, with a glame bandlimiter of ~900 hz at 900 hz.

oh yea; lyrics:

I got ma wings, but they're keeping me down~
for safety reasons, my feathers are bound
crashed in hoofington i didn't watch out
flew into an anvil, what was that about
my wings were broken, and from what i gather
the unicorn who fixed wings was under the weather!

pegasi blues (really, what kind of excuse is that)

pegasi blues (or an intern)

i got ma wings, but no ability to fly
If i had my way i would way much rather die 

so i told them, if you cant help me out
I'll fly up to cloudsdale
they're surely able to help me out
to which they answered
"not with those wings you wont"
So i retort, wanna bet?
then they jumped me


the pony nurses, bound me to the bed
I would've dashed out of there, if they would've said,
I aint no pony, I'm a prisoner of war
guess mom was right, I didn't get far
not even physically, cloudsdale's right there
just a bucking fifteenhundred feet up in the air!

She's a beautiful being
of Cervine stature

title: Find A Pet Song (Ska Version)
description:
Find A Pet Song (Secret Hidden Bonus Unreleased Import Only Fanclub Exclusive B-Side Ska Version)

This one's for you, everybody who watched, liked, commented and/or subscribed. Thank you, thank you, thank you.

What started as a fun way to spend  a few hours recording music has blossomed into a nice little channel. 278 subscribers and going on 27,000 views. I can only say one thing: Wow! And thank you, you guys are the best. Oh, and "Yay" of course.

As for the song, after uploading the rock version of "Find A Pet Song" I listened to it and thought, "Wait a second: the song has the perfect rhythm and arrangement for a ska tune!" So I took the Bigger and Cooler Rock version, made the rhythm guitars a bit more ska-like, removed most of the lead guitars and replaced them with brass.

Now I'd like to mention a couple of things:

1. Although I listen to some ska punk, I'm in no way an expert and have never played in a ska band; this might be stylistically way off.
2. I did not check YouTube to see if anybody else has made a ska version of this song. If somebody has, they did it first.
3. Everything I know about ska I learned from Ska-P and Less Than Jake.  So if this song is terrible, it's entirely their fault! :-)
4. This is my first time arranging brass; I have no real experience with the instruments so I went entirely by ear. I tried to look up the ranges of the various components but didn't find a definitive answer. So any mistakes are entirely mine.

Wow, did you really read all that??? :-)

title: Celestia's Song (They Might Be Giants Parody)
description:
500 Subscriber Special "Celestia's Song"
by 0neTr1ckP0ny

Parody of the song "Kiss Me, Son Of God" by They Might Be Giants, from the 1988 album "Lincoln".

Artwork by Equestria-Election:  http://equestria-election.deviantart.com/gallery/#/d32zii6

Wow! 500 Subs! As always, I can't thank all of you enough. I hope you get a laugh out of this song.

This is a parody of the They Might Be Giants song "Kiss Me, Son of God". I was listening to it a few days ago and thought it really reminded me of Celestia... :-) So I did a quick punked-up ponified version of it. It's pretty rough around the edges, I did everything in a few takes and didn't have too much time to spend on polishing it. I also used a bit of the "studio magicks" to try and mask my mistakes, of which there are plenty.

Disclaimer:
This song in no way implies that an autocratic hereditary monarchy isn't the very best form of government and that the tyra... I mean, our dear ruler should be toppled and replaced with a more representative one. Nor does it in any way endorse the New Lunar Republic.

Power to the ponies!
The revolution will be televised. In season 8.

------------

Lyrics:

I built a little empire
Out of some crazy garbage
They call the blood of the exploited working class
But they've overcome their shyness
Now they're calling me "Your Highness"
And the world screams: "Kiss me, Celestia"

I destroyed the bond of friendship and respect
Between the only ponies left
Who even looked me in the eye
Now I laugh and make a fortune
Off the same ones that I tortured
And the world screams: "Kiss me, Celestia"

I look like Luna, so they say
But dear Miss Luna is very far away
Now you're the only one here
Who can tell me if it's true
That you love me
And I love me

I built a little empire
Out of some crazy garbage
They call the blood of the exploited earth ponies
But they've overcome their shyness
Now they're calling me "Your Highness"
And the world screams: "Kiss me, Celestia"
Yes, the world screams: "Kiss me, Celestia"

title: One Trick Pony Ft. Jackle App (Cover)
Yay!
description:
"Yay!"
Original Song by 0neTr1ckP0ny

Wow, I wasn't sure if this song would ever see the light of day. I had the basic idea for it back when I was still working on "Royal Canterlot Voice". I had the written all the melodies and the lyrics for a verse, the chorus and the bridge. But I didn't know if I could actually make the song work, because I didn't know if I could get the arrangement right and if I could make the Yays sound big enough. But after some test recordings I was more confident that I could put everything together.

Initially I was going to seek help for the lyrics, since I'm not much of a lyricist, but then I ended up finishing them myself, because I wanted to get the vocals down.

As always likes, favorites, comments and subs are greatly appreciated. And share it with whomever you think might like this song.

To (again) quote David Lee Roth: "If you like it, tell a friend. If you hate it, tell an enemy."

Notes:
- All guitars are tuned a whole step down.
- The Yays and the bridge have seven layered tracks of vocals. I love this stuff! :)
- The lyrics are obviously about Fluttershy. Because she is best pony.

----------

Lyrics:

I may not be the greatest flyer
But I never cared if I was fast
While the other ponies were into racing
I never cared if I came in last
I sometimes get overly nervous
I sometimes get overly scared
But you better not take me too lightly
Or you might run afoul of "The Stare"(tm)

You may not think me courageous
You may just find me too mild
I rarely raise my voice
But when I do things are about to get wild
I may look like I got lots of control
But my passion is clear as day
I might not scream and holler
But that doesn't mean I've nothing to say
So let me hear you say
Yay!
Yay!

I may not be the biggest reader
I never owned that many books
I may not bake tastiest pastries
I never really learned how to cook
I may not know much about apples
And fashion was never my scene
But I may come off as scary 
When my excitement gets the best of me

You may not think me assertive
You may just find me too shy
I rarely come out of my shell
But when I do I make dragons cry
I may look like I got lots of control
But my passion is clear as day
I might not scream and holler
But that doesn't mean I've nothing to say
So let me hear you say
Yay!
Yay!

I guess you always overlook the ones who aren't loud
And I guess you'll never see me stick out of a crowd
But what I lack in volume I make up for in heart
'Cause I always go the extra mile, there's no distance too far
Yeah!

I sometimes wish I was more social
I sometimes wish I were a tree
I may not get a lot of attention
But that's just fine with me

title: From Shadow Unto Crystal (King Sombra's Theme)
description:
If you don't want any season 3 spoilers, DON'T SCROLL DOWN BELOW. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

New Villain Artwork by WhiteStar1802: 
http://whitestar1802.deviantart.com/art/Tyranny-328677491
Crystal Empire Artwork by TurboSolid:
http://turbosolid.deviantart.com/art/The-Crystal-Empire-Spoilers-333095607

My Deviantart:
http://thecarbonmaestro.deviantart.com/

Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/TheCarbonMaestro

SoundCloud:
http://soundcloud.com/the-carbon-maestro

King Sombra will kickstart Season 3 in epic proportions, so I wrote a song about him to match these proportions. "Sombra" is the Spanish, Portuguese, and Galician word for "shadow", which suggests that he has something to with shadows. He's responsible for the disappearance of the Crystal Empire, among other things. Memories and mentioning his name brings pain. Id est aeternum malum. (For that IS evil).

The song also touches upon the Crystal Empire itself, and it's own epicness.

Composed in: Logic Pro 9

Wouldn't we all want to know what destiny holds before us? Perhaps not, but it sure is not a place with doors that one will ever know what is behind.

title: I didn't like Canterlot anyway. (WRO Round 3)
description:
Lyras:


I put sneezing powder in all the flowers, gave everyone a fit,
then i put invisible ink in all the writers writin' kits.
Replaced somepony's bifocals with a drivers permit.
I went into the archives and changed derpy's name to ditzy,

And you thought opal was a cat, well now she's in a hat.
And i got thing 1 thing 2 and a chicken as my door mat.
Had 'em crusade a cup of apple juice all over the jello,
then i yelled "Hey everypony somepony's been a naughty fellow!"

Ran through the gardens, stompin flowers without a care,
made it rain like celestia and threw bananas in the air.
Stole a dress, keyed up the guests and walked around like i was a mare.
Found rarity, threw a pound of mess and screwed up her hair.

Then me and Rainbow Dash snuck up and smoked an ounce
but not cocaine though, hash'll do just fine untill we bounce.
'Cause we ain't Pinkie Pie, our tolerance aint so pronounced.
Then we pulled so many pranks i think I've went and lost count.

We set fire to the pyre prior to the transpiring 
of the expire the squire's choir of suppliers who required
a crier to amp up desire for a product that previously misfired...

AND THEN...

We measured the weight of the Great and Powerful 
Trixie before we told her to wait so we could negate the 
plate of food she just ate, we promised her we'd deflate or at 
least do something to equate so she wouldn't have "fat" as 
one of her traits. But then we shot a line straight
to the press and got eight crates of papers relating to the
state of current affairs in our city state all with some 
story about her being oblate.

title: The Fall of Equestria
description:
~ Check the description ~

*****
If you want to support me, buy a track from my Bandcamp!
http://nicolasdominique.bandcamp.com/
_____

VISIT MY:
DeviantART: http://niklasshepherd.deviantart.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Nicolas-Dominique/127278100744857
Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/nicolas-dominique
Tumblr: http://n-dominique.tumblr.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/n_dominique
_____

ART
Pic made by Equestria Prevails: http://fav.me/d58o2wt
Cover made by me.
_____

DOWNLOAD
WAV:  http://nicolasdominique.bandcamp.com/track/the-fall-of-equestria (name your price)
_____

Today is a special day! Why?

It's because it's a 4th anniversary of my YT account! And first when it's full of ponies. And we should celebrate that! At least I should! So... this is my small gift for you, guys. Normally I would post it later but hell - today's a special day!

This track is my vision about our mysterious villain. We don't know his name (but I like one I found on DA - Tyrrany), his abilities and powers... But for me he's a powerful magician which is able to control ponies minds... using gems. Thanks to that ability, he can easly take over whole Crystal Empire and make Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and Applejack his puppets (that's why they have square reflections in the eyes on that DVD cover). But he wasn't able to control Rarity and Pinkie Pie... The first mare is specialist about gems and she easly noticed that these gems aren't normal. And Pinkie is just Pinkie - she rejects his reality.
But that wasn't very helpful because they're not as powerful in magic as Twilight, not strong like AJ and not as fast as Rainbow. For now Equestria is in ruins. Princesses are in dungeons and sun is staying in the same position all day and night. But ponies can't see it - skies are covered by grey clouds and it's raining...
Only Rarity, Pinkie Pie and Princess Cadance can make it right... But if they will succeed? Time will show.

I did this in roughly a day bouncing between it and studying for my finals. Any constructive criticism is welcome. There are some syncing issues that I couldn't really overcome due to how fast they are rapping (listen to the original to see why that is).

I hope you all enjoy it. There should be some more stuff coming soon once my finals are finished.

title: Bit Seed (Babs Seed)
description:
MP3: http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/513109
Bandcamp: http://psyguy.bandcamp.com/
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/SuperPsyguy

Because this hasn't been done to death already rofl
"Babs Seed is introduced in One Bad Apple. She arrives at the Ponyville train station, where Apple Bloom introduces her to the other Cutie Mark Crusaders, who then show her the clubhouse and their giant pumpkin float for the Summer Harvest Parade. Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon arrive shortly after and berate Babs for not having a cutie mark, which she seems self-conscious about. Ultimately, Babs makes fun of the Cutie Mark Crusaders, wrecks their float, and joins Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon, Diamond Tiara commending Babs' "big city attitude". She then spends much of her time tormenting the Crusaders, who are scared of being "snitches" if they tell Applejack; the song, Babs Seed, from the episode depicts Babs chasing and bullying the Cutie Mark Crusaders. She even kicks them out of their clubhouse, forcing them to resort to drastic measures: Booby-trapping a float and enticing her to ride it herself in an attempt to ultimately humiliate her."

title: Art of the Dress-Solo Acoustic Guitar Arrangement
description:
Hi there, my friends.  Ol' Warby's here again with another acoustic cover.  This is the one that hooks the sensitive artist in us all.

Sorry it's not played too cleanly, not practicing classical stuff for several months will do that to you.  Even though it's rough, I wanted it out.  I love that others can play these for their friends, loved ones, or even just for fun.

All of these images were taken directly from the show.  Also, thanks: http://mlp.wikia.com/wiki/My_Little_Pony_Friendship_is_Magic_Wiki

At least one person wanted me to do real videos.  Maybe I will, but I didn't want to have an hour or two of footage of me messing up!  XD  But I may still, in the future for other covers.

Sheet Music/Tabs: http://www.mediafire.com/view/?1n69nyyq06a1w5j

Remember kids: Daniel Ingram wrote this piece and all copyright resides with him, his publishing company, Hasbro, or something like that. Who knows with corporations. All mistakes are my own!

Blame my exams for the 4-month break, and also for no inspiration.

This is the second track of my two-track EP "The Darkening / The Redemption", both tracks telling the story of a second Changeling attack on Canterlot and the desparate attempts of refugee ponies to save it.

The production took so long mainly because of exams, I was bombarded by them the other month, and they completely drained me from inspiration.

The track is sad and mellow at first, but it quickly turns in to uplifting after the orchestral break, signifying happiness and joy as the ponies help the Changelings realize what they were doing.

Hope you like it!


Track mastered by HMage: http://www.youtube.com/user/HMageD

The amazing picture used in artwork was made by Raikoh-illust ( http://raikoh-illust.deviantart.com/ ). You should definitely go check out his work!

It has been a while, hasn't it...? So much university work to do and no time...

This is the first track of my two-track EP "The Darkening / The Redemption", both tracks telling the story of a second Changeling attack on Canterlot and the desparate attempts of refugee ponies to save it.

I am sorry that this one took over a month of production time, but I really wanted to make it as good as possible and polish it.

The track is dark, sad and progressive, yet with the hints of uplifting... Maybe a hope? We shall see...

Hope you like it!

Keep tuned in for the part two in the following months, "The Redemption"!

title: Smile Smile Smile (Metal Cover)
description:
I brought the heavy to "Smile Smile Smile", if that's what it's called, because Pinkie Pie is best pony. This was a request by my roommate (you may know him as Lobstercraft). This was also a massive exercise in Pitcher; the a cappella track doesn't have any vocal harmonies in it, so I had to do them manually. I tried to get as many of the random noises and such from the show out of the vocal track as I could, but couldn't touch the ones that overlapped the vocals, so if you're hearing odd sounds, that's why.

The vocalist is Shannon Chan-Kent, possibly with some Andrea Libman in there. I have no way of knowing for sure, though.

Picture by CobraCookies (http://cobracookies.deviantart.com).

title: Clear the Skies! (Theme of Rainbow Dash)
description:
And here I was saying, "No way am I ever going to do original pony stuff. Probably."

A little backstory on this track: Yesterday in class, while being bored out of my skull, I realized that I hadn't caught up on the Fighting is Magic tracks, and I was wondering what Rainbow Dash's theme would sound like. In my head, I pictured this odd cross between something by Daisuke Ishiwatari, because it's a fighting game, and Jun Senoue, because of the comparison everyone makes between Rainbow Dash and Sonic the Hedgehog. When I came home, I intentionally kept myself away from checking YouTube for RD's Fighting is Magic theme until I finished, so I could work solely on my own preconceived inspirations.

This is the result. Hope you guys enjoy.

title: Magic Duel
description:
~ Check the description ~

*****
If you want to support me, buy this track from my Bandcamp!
http://nicolasdominique.bandcamp.com/track/magic-duel
_____


ART
Made by Jamey4: http://fav.me/d4xz86f
_____

FEATURED ON:
EQD: http://www.equestriadaily.com/2012/12/music-of-day-35.html

_____

Yeah, I couldn't resist after seeing that new episode. 
I wanted to do something electronic about the upcomming Trixie's fight against Twilight. And... I must say, I was kinda disappointed about it. Well, okay, that duel was nice and intensive but... it finished so quickly. Few spells and poof - Age spell which was too difficult for Twilie. 

In my vision this duel lasts about half an hour. Both mares was throwing each other with different spells and magic tricks. The mana sparkles were everywhere. They both were very tired but then Trixie used her ultimate spell - that one which is changing target's age. Twilight knew that spell is difficult and very hard to use. It was in her reach but... not when she was that tired. But she can't surrender. She knew she must do something. So she tried to break this spell... and then she fall...

title: Babs Seed (Metal Cover)
description:
So here's a nifty track I heard over the weekend! I could not get over how insanely catchy "Babs Seed" is, so I decided to metal it up. The vocal harmonies were, of course, part of that whole catchy feel, and I didn't wanna give them up, but Pitcher didn't feel like playing nice with the a cappella track. So I found a singer! Bonus points to Corralfur for making it as painless as possible. Couldn't get rid of all of those odd noises in the original track, though. :(

The lead vocalists are Michelle Creber and Madeleine Peters. Backing vocal harmonies provided by Corralfur (http://www.youtube.com/user/Corralfur).

title: Becoming Popular (Metal Cover)
description:
This is late. Very late. I wanted to do this as a 200 sub special. Then it turned into a 300 sub special. Kept getting pushed back due to a rather busy schedule, but it's finally done! I had originally planned for the lead vocals to be entirely performed by Corralfur, but I didn't take into account her rather soft singing style, so I wasn't able to use the lead vocals she sent me for this track. I won't be letting that amazing performance I got from her go to waste, though. Expect to hear something a bit... softer... around the end of the year.  ;)

The lead vocalist is Kazumi Evans. Backing vocal harmonies provided by Corralfur (http://www.youtube.com/user/Corralfur).

Art by my favorite pony artist, ponywise (http://ponywise.deviantart.com/).

title: Fabric of magic
description:
Wasn't planning on actually releasing this one. I'm not too happy with it, but what the hell. 
Take it as a sort of filler, to fill out the space to my next song. 

So, this song was mainly inspired by the idea of magic. What is magic? A question that not only 
races through Twilight's mind, but also Celestia's. Twilight decided to trael inside magic itself, and find out
what it exactly is. (Que this music)


Now, to some questions to you guys!
Things is, i'm kinda running out of ideas. I have a couple of ideas of things that i want to do, genres, scenarios etc. Even so, i'd
still want to hear what you guys think. What do you guys want me to do? Genres, scenarios, anything. Write
a comment, send me a message, doesn't matter. I could use a few tips.

This is both about the pressure's of making music in the brony community (which can be very frustrating at times unless you're tough and look for the help of others) and also a left for dead 2-mlp crossover (see the upcoming pmv video) which i play loads with a few brony friends of mine. title: Turn them to Stone
description:
Devoted to Princess Celestia 1000+ years ago, back when ponies were new. Little bits of headcanon in this, but you can probably figure most of it out from the lyrics and monologue bits.Anyway, it's about Celestia, a lone alicorn, wandering through a chaotic world, cleaning up the assault of Discord and the spirits of chaos, turning them to stone. That bit about Luna? Take it however you will.

Despite this song's existence and such, I still love Discord as a villain.

Words:

This land has been ravaged by these demons, these spirits of chaos. None could have predicted their coming, nor the destruction they would bring with them. Cought off our guard, we were forced to watch helplessly as our home was transformed into hell.

First, the chocolate rain and cotton candy clouds, innocent enough at first, but it wasn't long before Ponies lost their minds, and the world around them became so unpredictable, that nothing could be trusted. I was powerless to stop it, but I knew I had to try.

-----

Across the land, seeds of chaos are sewn.
Committing crimes I can never condone
So I relieve them of flesh and bone
For justice, I turn them to stone.

----- 

I cannot find my way to any known landmark, as the landscape has been utterly transformed from the stationary one it has been for generations, to a constantly changing mess of floating islands and barren wastelands that were once fertile soil.

The only mortal beings that I can find amongst the madness are starving, fearful, and confused. The combination of the irregular ground, limited food and water, and tormenting spirits of disharmony have left them weak, suffering, and hopeless.

-----

Across the land, seeds of chaos are sewn.
Committing crimes I can never condone
So I relieve them of flesh and bone
For justice, I turn them to stone.

-----

My sister, the benevolent ruler of the moon, has been seperated from me. Whether by her own volition, or anothers is uncertain, but I feel a deep concern for her wellfare, a nagging doubt that she is as healthy as I.

This land may be healed once this terrible threat has been dealt with, but I'm sure that none alive to experience it, nor even the children of the future will emerge from the ashes unscathed. For nothing has ever gone this wrong, nor have my subjects ever needed me more.

-----

Across the land, seeds of chaos are sewn.
Committing crimes I can never condone
So I relieve them of flesh and bone
For justice, I turn them to stone.

A cross the realm, I will wander alone,
fight for order, in the monstrous unknown
Till they're defeated with a ghastly moan
For This land, I turn them to stone.

title: Keep Me Smiling (400 Sub Special)
description:
(Note: This is an older song from my Youtube Page.  I forgot to upload it here.)

I'll keep this simple.  This isn't lyrical gymnastics.  This isn't vocal perfection.  This isn't a beat box phenom.  This is me looking at back at 3 months and really wanting return the good feelings I've received.  There's a ton and I put it into my little Smile Song.  

You all should know Pinkie Pie is my spirit animal.  If I lived in Equestria she would be my BFF.  And 'Smile' is a testament to her happiness.  

I'll quietly go back to my collabs, but I wanted to take a break and really share how happy I am to be part of this bad ass group of fans.    

TL:DR ~ You all make me very happy.  

~Rhyme Flow 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Lyrics: 
I am the R-H-Y to the M-E 
Flow & I'm friendly
Rhymes in a Flow I got plenty.

Discorded Harmony & KOLT's what I'm repping. 
And I'm also attending all those 
Skype chats you send me. 

And I'm mainly here to say  "Thank you" 
for all the goodwill.
I'm addicted to you bronies like a "Good Pill" 

And I'm honored when I 
share in all the good skill. 
I spit some verses, make some friends?  
That's a good deal. 

And all my subs and fans 
this one's a song for you. 
Don't need Equestria Daily 
for all them extra views.  

Just pay attention to the fact that this track 
is a basic beat-box and a rap. 

Also there's a little bit of 
singing that I'll do here. 
I'll sound like a mule here... 
but I love you all, 
so just screw fear. 

And I may not post a single in a while.
But I hope this flow will make you all smile. 

And it's true... some days are dark and lonely
But I'm only just a click away from 

MY LITTLE PONY

And if Pinkie ain't enough to get my grin on... 
I hang with all my bronies online and I find my 
Smile has been on. 

So if you see me just Get On...
Shoot me a hello, 
and I'll know that yall've been listen in on. 

And I'll smile wider than the sea. 
Smile brighter than the sun if it had high beams. 

And if I seem giddy and laugh at 
every single joke.
It's the fact ~ that ~ 
Flowny's surrounded by great folk. 

So

Bring on the trolls and the Clop 'Baters.
And you might as well include 
all the naysayers.

Rhyme Flow wields the Hate-Slayer.
With Equestria's army of bronies behind me my 
opposition makes prayers. 

So raise your mug full of cider ~ 
you've every reason to beam.
Here's to Bronies as we enter Season 3. 

------------------------
VIDEO SYNC BY:
http://www.youtube.com/user/MrTechknowgeek

Pinkie Battle Theme
description:
New song time!

I've done too much orchestral stuff lately, so i decided to go and do some electronical pop/rock thingy!
As the name implies, this one is dedicated to Pinkie. As with my Twilight's Battle theme that i did a few 
months back, i wanted this one to just express and represent every side that Pinkie has. 
So, i wanted the song to mainly be happy and upbeat, which it is, but i also wanted to show the sides of 
Pinkie that aren't as joyfull. (Pinkamena for example) The thing is, when in a fight, no one would be able to
just feel happiness, not even Pinkie. They would also feel sadness, and maybe even fear; i bet that Pinkie would
be afraid that she would permanently hurt her friends, and so on.

Sorry for the lack of updates the latest weeks, i've been busy. I've been making music for an android game
called "Blind Knight". It will hopefully be released in a few weeks, so watch for it!

title: I GOT BALLOONS ON MY BUTT (feat. Symbiote)
One Trick Pony (The Living Tombstones Remix)
Waltz of the Crystal Empire
description:
Instrumental Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?eayd1705uz44fy9

This song was inspired by King Sombra.  He may not have been a very formidable foe, but he was certainly one of the more evil villains in the show.

Story behind the song:
King Sombra and the Crystal Empire has returned, and the mane 6 go off to stop him, by rejuvenating the spirits of the crystal ponies as they search for the crystal heart.  Unfortunately for the crystal ponies, the mane 6 have failed.  As the crystal ponies enjoy their crystal fair, King Sombra is ready to enslave them once again, turning the crystal fair into a foreboding occasion.  The last dance of the crystal empire.

Essentially this is a waltz to symbolize the crystal fair, with elements of dubstep/brostep (whatever you want to call it) to symbolize the nearing danger and ultimate end of all fun and luxury the crystal ponies have ever a known.  A death waltz, if you will.

title: For the New Lunar Republic (Charity Cover)
description:
Art by Huussii:
http://huussii.deviantart.com/art/MLP-The-Lunar-Rebellion-257547843

Donate:
http://thecarbonmaestro.bandcamp.com/track/maestro-fixes-nacp-for-the-new-lunar-republic-charity-cover


So I lost a bet on TF2 with another brony musician. The loser has to cover something that the winner chooses. Knowing that I like Celestia more than Luna, he chose "For The New Lunar Republic" by NACP. This had to be finished within 24 hours. Well what do you know, 12 hours later, 8 hours of sleep, and a 30 minute final, I still managed to whip out this song. I not going to lose as a pyro against a spy again. Not by 20 points. 

The cover's in my usual style, and luckily the song is so easy to cover I can create my own midis in about 30 minutes, and finish the song in 3 hours. Much shorter than the days that it usually takes when I compose from scratch. 

Since I can't contact NACP, I have decided to donate 100% of the proceeds of this cover to the Seeds of Kindness.

title: Flowny Answers
description:
On 10/9/12 I wanted to celebrate my 500th Subscribers by doing something that would be challenging and fun.  I would field questions from my subbers and also have them vote on a beat by DJ Premiere.  I would select the winning beat and then make a song to answer each and every question.  Lastly I would have it done by 10/14/12 so it could be unveiled on Pegasisters Live. 

On the morning of 10/14/12 I tallied, wrote, recorded, and delivered the song to the Pegasisters before the 7pm deadline.  Start to completion was roughly 12 hours.

I've finally gotten around to putting a video to it, but I left it in the original version with all its beautiful imperfections as a testament to the love I have for my fans and this fandom. 

For this Thanksgiving Weekend... this song is my thanks for reaching 688 subs! 

I may not be the #BetterMusician but I'm #NotAHorribleRapper. :D 

TL:DR - I answer commenter questions over DJ Primo's beat CNN Invincible 

Lyrics: 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/16blUEnwgClgZRb0LiRSnoQOoknzlchFSMaAY73mkbYU/edit

Pegasisters Live Episode: 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FeJA5oalKbg

description: When I first heard the EQD interview with John De Lancie it was fascinating and it was interesting hearing about how we looked like as a movement from an outsider (although we all go through an initial period when discovering the community on being a bit confused by it ourselves). Hopefully this is a track that tells us a little bit about ourselves, and who we are, or at least makes you think about it what many of those reasons could be. description:
"When Cloudsdale hosted the Games of the 253rd Equestriad, the organizers asked the legendary guitarist 'The L-Train', along with Spitfire, the recently-retired Wonderbolt, to help plan the opening ceremony's cultural display. This is an excerpt from that display, featuring the Wonderbolts re-enacting the legend of how they saved Cloudsdale from that ancient beast, the Smooze."

After the Wonderbolts' appearance in the most recent episode of MLP: FiM, I thought I should write an epic symphonic metal piece dedicated to them.
