title: Lightning Dust
description:
Download it on...
Bandcamp: http://impala99.bandcamp.com/track/lightning-dust
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/impala99/lightning-dust

-----

Vector by HankOfficer: http://fav.me/d63oc30

-----

A house dub track, "Lightning Dust" shows off the speed and adrenaline of the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic pegasus herself, Lightning Dust, through synthesizers and various electronic drum loops. It also samples singer-rapper-songwriter-producer Pharrell Williams' 2005 (negatively-reviewed) single, "Can I Have It Like That", featuring rock band No Doubt's frontwoman, Gwen Stefani.

released 02 June 2013
Composed by Adrian "Impala" Mata and Pharrell Williams 
Produced by Impala in FL Studio 11 
Contains samples from the TV show "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic" (Hasbro/DHX/The Hub/Discovery Communications) and the track "Can I Have It Like That" by Pharrell Williams featuring Gwen Stefani (Star Trak/Virgin/Interscope/Universal Music Group).

title: Breaking Bonds+
description:
Open the description for links...




Previously titled "Buffalo Brony - Breaking Bonds+"

This song is dedicated to a close friend with whom I parted with not even a week before I wrote this. As this is the case, these lyrics are special to me, and though I may be skewing Gilda's personality to better fit a sympathetic song, I still think it's very fitting for a song about an old friend who you've parted with.

I know your out there watching me, so when you read this, you know I'm talking to you. Once I'm at the top, I'm coming back to get you. I don't care if it takes me a year or ten, I'm going to work to get you back.

Backstory:
Past a decade into the future, Gilda is looking back at events that had exiled her from Ponyville. Now famous and occupied, her mind still manages to remember the guilt that she felt as she was too prideful to apologize for acting mean. As she was reflecting on how her life had turned out, a blast of sound followed by a wave of rainbow that rattled the clouds around her. In a sudden epiphany, she realizes it's not too late to apologize. After a few moments of self triumph over her prideful limits, she heads on a journey all over the world, starting with Ponyville, to find her old friend and crew, to say sorry for breaking bonds.

Sidenote:
This, from Gilda's perspective, is an alternate timeline "sequel", set over a decade later, to AcousticBrony's and PrinceWhateverer's "Breaking Bonds", hence the +, credit to them for an awesome song and IBringDaLULZ for being the OG rapper.

[11] Featured on Equestria Daily's "Music of the Day #56":
http://www.equestriadaily.com/2013/01/filly-chrysalis.html

description:
So I decided I wanted to publish something before the holidays (or the end of the world). I've had the basic tracks for this lying around since the summer, but I was never really happy with it. Also I didn't think I could finish the song since the group vocals aren't on the isolated vocal track. But I finally found some time to fiddle around with the song, and using the original track I was able to bring the group vocals back while mostly covering the original instruments.

Anyway, it all somehow came together in the end and so I decided to upload. As always, likes, faves, comments and subscribes are greatly appreciated.

title: Luna (Eurobeat Brony Cover)
description:
Ah man, I lost my original description. It was so good, too!

The first song I ever released was "Closet Brony" (https://eqbeats.org/track/2235) and you guys welcomed me so warmly in the community. It was with that response that I decided to continue on and make more songs covering different random things. Many of them can be found at http://superdocisaac.tumblr.com/ but it all started with the Brony Community. You guys rocks. Thanks for having me around!

In my own way of saying thanks, I decided to veer off course from my usual nerdcore and do a cover of my favorite songs from the community, "Luna" by Eurobeat Brony. Yes, I'm singing this time around! I went a different path with it and wanted to give off a Darkwave/Cruxshadows tone with it, so I hope I succeeded with that. I kept fiddling with it on and off for a couple of months and finally decided that I needed to get the idea out in the open. I hope you enjoy it as much as I have making it!

I'm leaving this as an Equestrian Beats original for a short time. Once again, thank you guys for everything! I plan on sticking around for quite a while!

Interested in having me do vocals on your track? I'm game! Hit me up at sircrowbar@gmail.com and we'll work something out!

title: Pressure (Billy Joel Parody)
description:
"Pressure" by 0neTr1ckPony

Parody of the song "Pressure" by Billy Joel, from the 1982 album "The Nylon Curtain".

Crazy Twilight Sparkle vector by brianc1006: http://brianc1006.deviantart.com/art/Crazy-twilight-sparkle-263801718

This actually was never meant to be posted, I just started recording it on a whim after working out the main keyboard riff on guitar, to see what it would sound like. As I was working on it I kept thinking of Twilight Sparkle in Lesson Zero, and so ended up with a kinda sorta pseudo-ponified version. It's not very polished and full of mistakes (not to mention the ham-handed references), but I decided to put it up here because I haven't posted anything useful in a while, and because you guys might get a laugh out of it.

Talk Like Zecora (parody of "Walk Like an Egyptian")
description:
Talk Like Zecora (parody of “Walk Like an Egyptian”)
(original by The Bangles)
lyrics, percussion & vocals by Amadhia “Dreamsong”


To me, Zecora is cool... waaaay cool! :D

It can't have been too long after seeing "Bridle Gossip" that I found myself humming "Talk like Zecora" to the old, Bangles tune, "Walk Like an Egyptian" and throwing myself into giggle-fits. :P

I finally got around to recording it and doing the music for it as a birthday present to myself.  (Yaaay, Im' a solstice filly! :D )

I reworked a MIDI track from some unknown sequencer for the acoustic bass, and the sitar... but all the percussion is live, by me. :)

I wanted to have it be like if Stomp were to have done the music for it... kind-of industrial-tribal-pop! (Is that even a genre? :P )

Anyway... I hope it makes ya laugh as much as it does me!  :D

And remember... Talk like Zecora! :D

-------------------
Everypony knows I'm da one
Dey go to when help is what dey need.
I show my stripes;
(Oh way oh)
I'm not afraid of da Everfree.

At first I filled dem wit' fear
But Applebloom saw da good I spoke.
I knew da way
(Oh way oh)
To take da sting out of poison joke.

Alicorns with deir wings and horns say:
(Way oh way oh, ay oh way oh)
“Talk like Zecora.”

Bad parasprites in de air
And Pinkey Pie bouncing up and down;
She's got da moves
(Oh way oh)
To lead da swarm far away from town.

On Nightmare Night all da foals
Get candy-corn when dey sing a tune.
Wit' Nightmare Moon,
(Oh way oh)
Dey're talkin' like dey're Zecora!

All de newbs in da Sugar Cube say:
(Ay oh way oh, ay oh way oh)
“Talk like Zecora.”

Dig your hooves in de dirt,
Look for herbs, plant da seeds of truth.
Find heart's desire,
(Oh way oh)
Beware it can more den mend a tooth.

If your dragon grows way too fast,
Jus' Ask me and I'll know what you need.
I says in rhyme:
(Oh way oh)
“A dragon grows as he feeds his greed.”

Trixie back in town t'rowing down?
Twi, mix your magic and use da six!
Fake an amulet,
(Oh way oh)
And talk in rhyme like Zecora.

All de newbs in da Sugar Cube say:
(Ay oh way oh, ay oh way oh)
“Talk like Zecora.”

title: The Big Test
description:
After some time, here's me releasing a collab with Magnitude Zero; a rearrangement of the show tunes "The Failure Song" and "The Success Song" (according to the wikia).
Artwork cut out by me from the video by Pinkydash; thanks~ :3

Lyrics:

Mind is sharp, skills intact;
Oh, will I fail or will I pass?
I was prepared to do my best,
Thought I could handle any test.

You were prepared to do your best,
at what it takes, to pass the test.
All those doubts you can dismiss,
turns out you trust yourself and cannot miss.

Such high stakes...
Will you prevail?
Does Twilight Sparkle ever fail?
You clearly have...

Levitation would have been a breeze,
Facts and figures I recite with ease.
I could ace a quiz on friendship's bliss,
but i was not prepared for this.

Oh I've taken my share of licks,
I've made it through the thin and thick;
for I could do so many tricks,
but I was not prepared for this.

title: Toastbeard Birthday Special
description:
Hey, Toastbeard is two years old! What's that you say? There's a compo special on that? I'm there!

This is a present to the MLR community for the love and support. Most importantly, it's a tribute to the compo event that started it all.

Lyrics:
Listen everybody, you heard it here, a special event turns two this year
Let us gather 'round so we can hear the joyous sound
Haven't you heard , don't you know, this is the place you need to go
For your brony music fix, there's no other place that is just like this
A very special time, now comes this way
Birthday music we shall play
For everypony to celebrate the songs that we create

So, crank the volume and feed your ears, 
'cause Toastbeard turns two this year.

title: I've Got to Find a Way (JazzBrony Remix) [VIP] {Full Mix}
Freewave + Dreamsong - Young Folks
description:
This is an electropop cover of Peter, Bjorn & John's "Young Folks". I thought this would be a great track for Big Mac and Cheerilee post Hearts & Hooves Day ep. Now that the CMC (err the "Young Folks") are outta the picture the two can take it a bit slower and get to know if it is a match. This works as a duet between the 2 characters and is really about unfolding a relationship. Fluttermac fans this may be post-breakup, who knows, it's just fannon. I also really wanted to do this song as Dreamsong and I are both older then most in the community (the other young folks), have been doing our own thing as well, and are spending lots of time not worrying about pony politics and just having fun making music. Thanks to her for the amazing vocals and for being such a wonderful friend. She did an amazing job on this and we're continuing to work together for out eventual album coming out in the near future.

Her youtube is http://www.youtube.com/user/Amadhia and pony.fm is https://pony.fm/dreamsong Also know as Amadhia in case there is any confusion. Please visit and subscribe if you want to keep tabs on her upcoming music too.

title: Resist Refuse Rebel Arise
description:
The story about Nightmare Moon in the first two episodes always struck me as quite biblical. I always imagined there had to have been some sort of Lunar Guard, loyal to the fallen princess. Outcast and shunned, they would bide their time, awaiting their leader's return. A great theme for another militant song!

Lyrics:
For a thousand years We've lived under oppression 
For a thousand years she's made us bow 
A thousand years will come to their conclusion 
A thousand years, it all ends now

Now is our moment, we've never been stronger 
We will be exiled and outcast no longer 
Now is the moment of just retribution 
This is the night of the Dark Revolution

Resist the rule of the Tyrannic Monarch 
Who's claiming to be our superior 
Refuse the will of the Lying Protector 
Whose motives are always ulterior 
Rebel against the despotic status quo 
The crown shall be crushed underneath our hooves 
Rise up and join the New Lunar Republic 
The night shall last forevermore

Forward Legion, take by force 
The lives and homes, which are rightfully yours 
Storm the castle, burn the keep 
Bring the Princess to her knees

Now is our moment, we've never been stronger 
We will be exiled and outcast no longer 
Now is the moment of just retribution 
This is the night of the Dark Revolution

Resist 
Refuse 
Rebel 
Arise

Resist the rule of the Tyrannic Monarch 
Who's claiming to be our superior 
Refuse the will of the Lying Protector 
Whose motives are always ulterior 
Rebel against the despotic status quo 
The crown shall be crushed underneath our hooves 
Rise up and join the New Lunar Republic 
The night shall last forevermore

title: Reckless
description:
Ok this track is a Lightning Dust track for Rainbow & Rooted. This is kind a musical synopsis of the Wonderbolt Academy episode and taking an audio ride on the Dizzitron. However I'm going in with identifying with Lightning Dust's character a bit. Can recklessness be an admirable trait when it comes to music? If Rainbow Dash is playing by the rules to get into the Wonderbolts (ie Rainbow & Rooted) then I'm going the reckless route; taking some chances, taking a few u turns, and mixing some genres together. Will i make the team (err album) and be a wonderbolt too or be shown the door?

Edit: Actually no. Didn't make it on the comp, lol, oh well.... Either way i had a fun time making this track and i hope you enjoy your flight... :)

title: Freewave and Sylverlining - The Mirror Lies
description:
Well here's a change of pace, old school heavy metal!!! I read a few fanfics recently and fell in love with a fanfic about Lyra discovering that Bon Bon is actually a changeling and wanted to make an appropriate song about it. 

Plot from a Change of Face by by TheDeinonychus
http://www.fimfiction.net/story/24388/a-change-of-face

Despite the change in "race" its still very much a love song and intense one between the pair.  I'm also in luck because http://mpa-art.tumblr.com/ did plenty of artwork too based on the plot and he gave his permission for the use of that for the pmv. 

I am so glad And The Rainfall (Don) introduced me to SylverLining as she was awesome on this track and has a hell of a voice. I look forward to hopefully working again with her soon. I gave her this track and she did a home run on the vocals.
Her youtube is here http://www.youtube.com/user/SylverNuckelavee
Her soundcloud is here https://soundcloud.com/sylverlining She'd love to do more metal vocals if anyone out there is looking for a vocalist (or other genres too frankly). Give her a shot and a sub if you like her.

title: Smile Song - Fingerstyle Acoustic Guitar Cover
description:
I don't know about you all out there, but I had a very difficult summer.  Money troubles, injuries, disappointments, but worst of all: losing a loved one.

Throughout life's unusual course we face unwelcome surprises, but that does not mean we should just fold up and never be happy again!  Quite the contrary.  Smiling, laughing and acting like a big goof can brighten your mood and may even help others through their dark time.

So, again, show your friends and family some attention!  Heck, show yourself some attention.  It can help pick you out of the pits and keep you from the morass of modern life.

Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?eno6to914vn87i5

Sheet Music/Tablature: http://www.mediafire.com/view/wyz762h65kfurg8/Smile.pdf

Remember kids: Daniel Ingram and Amy Keating Rogers wrote this piece and all copyright resides with them, their publishing company, Hasbro, or something like that. Who knows with corporations. All mistakes are my own!

Someone with a better guitar and a stronger thumb should be recording these; there's too much buzz when I play.

title: Bronies on the Track (Like That) feat. Clavi Sound and Melody Beats
description:
Open description for links!



Backstory:
 So, Sunset Shimmer is still learning the ins and outs of friendship. What better way than by watching My Little Pony: Friendship is magic on Netflix!? And surprise, surprise, when the ponies burst into song: bronies are on the track! Let's hope Sunset Shimmer takes away a good lesson from the song. We all know Pinkie Pie's rapping didn't help Rainbow Dash with learning the Wonderbolt's history, but maybe this time me and my friends can help both Rainbow Dash and Sunset shimmer the magic of friendship, and what it means to be a brony on the track!

Download: https://eqbeats.org/track/8496

Notes:
Alright~! First song of 2015! New year, new goals~ Specifically for me, 2016 subs by 2016!
Thats about a year to get around 900 subscribers, and doing the math
That's around 2-3 subs per day.
So, what does that mean for you? It means more hustle, more songs,
More content, and new things that I'll be trying out!

Shouts out to IAmSwagg007, and IAmRhymeFlow for starting this up,
Lightning Charger for doing a remix with me,
And finally ClaviSound and Melody beats for this new one!

This song is, effectively:
A remake with a collab of a remix of a collab of a remake
With a collab of IAmSwagg's remix of Like That, which is a collab.

.-.

Eeyup.

Also, if there are any hip hop fans within the community,
Feel free to ask for collabs or help with any of your tracks.
We definitely want to get Brony Rap back on the frontlines!

Anyhow, enjoy, my little ponies :D

Animation, music video, subtitles, mixing and mastering by Buffalo Brony,
Vocals by Clavi Sound, Melody Beats, and Buffalo Brony.

Don't forget to subscribe!

Clavi Sound's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/ClaviSound

Melody Beat's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJeekQkP_oDa4O3U_cKwOGg

Buffalo Brony's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/BuffaloBrony

title: Real Tragic (A Parody of Magic)
description:
I mean it's a parody. TheSydeGuys sings as Event Horizon, the Draconequus Spirit of Destruction, who's trying to show the ponies that his magic and specialty is still needed. The Conductor, an antagonist of Equestria as a whole who always speaks from radio is sung by... Event Horizon. That's me. 

Lyrics: 

Event Horizon:
"I'm Event, welcome to the show
Destructive tricks, so hear we go! 
We're gonna have some fun, hold onto 
your hats!"

Conductor:
"We don't care who you are anymore! 
Just pack your things get out the door.
You think that you're destroying
don't make us laugh!"

Event Horizon: 
"I have something more!"

Conductor:
"We've seen it before!" 

Event Horizon: 
"It's much more special!" 

Conductor: 
"We'd rather be in hell!" 

Event Horizon: 
"It might be the same crap, 
be patient, you'll see. 
You can call it fake, 
but 
this 
is
real 
tragic!"

"Yeah, yeah!

"Real Tragic!"

Event Horizon: 
"Look as I make stuff levitate
Making world balance at high stakes
And of course the famous 
Class D meteor,

Got minions and oh so much more
I even brought the fire works, 
for all of you to watch me destroy"

Conductor: 
"Who cares about that, it's all the same thing
All the same crap, we've seen before!'

Event Horizon: 
"It might be the same crap,
be patient, you'll see. 
You can call it fake, 
but 
this 
is 
real
tragic!"

"Yeah, yeah!" 

"Real Tragic!"

*song filler* 

Conductor: 
"Why do you still want to destroy? 
We've tried to tell you, all along
That this crap is old and you have to face that!"

Event Horizon:
"I've heard you; what you all have said. 
But I don't think I should be mad. 

The most important thing 
is do enjoy what, you do!"

Conductor: 
"But it doesn't make sense!"

Event Horizon: 
"It doesn't change a thing."

Conductor: 
"Even if we say it's bad?"

Event Horizon:
"I'm still destroying!" 

Conductor: 
"It might be the same crap,"

Event Horizon:
"Be patient, you'll see." 

Both: 
"You can call it fake
but 
this
is 
real 
tragic!"

title: Not so Fabulous
description:
I've done songs about the Mane6 before, but I decided to redo that series of songs, mainly bectause the series before was pretty sub-par. Now that I've got the hang of this, I'm redoing the songs for ALL of the mane6, not gonna pull that "song about two of them" thing again. Each will have her own song.

   As for this particular one, I based the Idea behind this song on Rarity questioning her fabulousity and beauty. As the song progresses, you'll notice she fluctuates between confidence, to uncertainty, back to her well-known fabulous personality.

Next one on my list is for Ponyville's own daredevil flier, so stay tuned.

Youtube Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4NKEstlXUjs

Lyrics:

For an eternity, I have reigned

My power is divine 
I rise from the ashes of transgression
I shall persist until I re-attain what is mine

My rule is everything
I am the alpha and the omega
Witness firsthand what darkness brings

You're nothing without me

Submit to my grand design
The act of being demands it
I shall persist until I re-attain what is mine

Misguided resistance
Leading a life so meaningless
I embody the only purpose

You're nothing without me

Bow
Bow before your King
Bow 
Bow before your King
X2

Encased in the frozen north
A thousand years I await
My vengeance will be brought forth
Equestria shall be torn agape

It is a matter of time
Your fate is sealed by your incompetence
My sovereignty will not be denied by this abject crime

You abate the force of a god
My victory is all but a certainty
There is nothing left but destiny

You're nothing without me

Bow
Bow before your King
Bow 
Bow before your King
X2

For an eternity, I have reigned
For an eternity, I shall reign

title: Muffin Eater (WRO July Round A)
description:
Lyrics: 


Muffin, Just the word and she's huffin', puffin',
Runnin' across the town, and she's comin to get her stuffin'.
What's in, these delectable little puffed things, 
That spurred on this mare till she finally gets enough, then,

The stuff she keeps eating and beating, down she is fleeting and cleaning, 
plates in one seating, she's treating, towns, to repeating, her feeding is leading,
mistakes into their house of the baked goods, 
then she's poundin down a louse, cause she's misunderstood.

It was so dark, when she finally found her cutie mark and
She ignored it, because BUBBLES AIN'T A CALLING
Now of the muffin, ain't a doubt she's a boss king,
they're just like cupcakes, WITHOUT ANY FROSTING

"But how?" you shout..
Can she open her mouth...
And eat all those muffins?
Well the story goes, yeah I heard it goes, hey yo, 

Zecora, could you let me eat so much more of 
the mystical little treat, that you know that i adore, uh,
for four months, I will offer to do your chores,
and i'm sure for more, that i will never go into your drawers

NO, just take it, take my blessing and leave,
You see your absent-minded shake is straight messing my leaves,
And now forever on, you can eat a whole couch,
but please, I concede, just GET OUT MY HOUSE

title: Vine
description:
Youtube Video Here: 
http://youtu.be/aw_3nGOZbZ0

Lyrics:

Knew a man with a hard work ethic.
A Driven individual with skills so technic. 

Excellent and unmatched, unlimited in that 
capacity. Not a bad personality.

In his strength was a weak link. 
Cause when you rise in the ranks your's the prize other's teeth sink. 

Other guys see the meat, think 
Use lies and other wily devices like a heat seek

ballistic. Sick and sadistic
You're instincts get flipped, and then you missed it. 

And this is the abyss, that the rumor mill built.
And the life that you had, all the lies still killed.

Full tilt, you swell with ill guilt.
Cause the misstep you felt, trippin on full stilts.  

And it's fulfilled your fail has peeled all your layers.
The will of the grapevine, sealed by the haters.

(Chorus)

Divine is the vine when it finds you. 
Lies that'll strangle and bind as it ties you. 

If you hide or you try to 
Fly from the site, it's the lies that rise up behind you.

No Escape from the Grape Vine, it'll take sinners and saints 
From the Insane to the Great Minds. 

only remedy is take time.  
Even the holy and the wise are unsafe from the fake lie.

(Verse 2)

A seed planted will breed man into deep havoc
They'll need packets of Xanax so they can breathe dammit.

And these habits will bleed men into weak addicts
At least that'll completely make the beef static. 

Once he's had it, the peace vanishes, he's damaged. 
Cause he's saddened by these events, grief, panic. 

Belief wavers and trusts shatters, his heart seizes. 
The Winter thrust on his soul, solely a dark season. 

A hard reason, but seriously, a rumor does it. 
Consumes your body like tumor in your mind's oven. 

The size of it can double when lies touch it.
And as such, despise fills ya eyes than ya plummet. 

And you never really recover, the scars ever present 
Resenting any mention of it. It's never endin' 

And eventu-ly everybody you ever even knew 
Will be poisoned by lie and will never believe you. 

(Chorus)

(Verse 3)

Tick tock the sands of time drain.
And you're locked in the guilt of the rumor mind game.

Your life decimated to a fraction. 
your past jaded with vile hated reactions.

Inaction in a sedentary state. 
Agoraphobic tendencies tend to activate 

And it's fascinating > seeing a man once great
Reduced to a pitiful mass, a numb state. 

But it doesn't last forever, you die or you grow. 
Get your ass together, or quit the live show.

Even I know, a man of your caliber, can pull
and put 9 mills up against your temple. 

Successfully... end your life...so fast. 
Or you can man up, and admit you might last.

And you can move forward with the scars of the past.
But no man is safe from the Rumor Mill's Grasp.

title: JayB feat. Giggly Maria - Rain (Sonic Rainboom Remix)
description:
Oddly enough, right when I was finishing this, a cold front came along and plopped a whole bunch of rain all over my area. Maybe I summoned it accidentally.
----------------------------------------------
Original: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KUJJ3I5lNcc
By JayB: http://www.youtube.com/user/Hanni13579
Giggly Maria: http://www.youtube.com/user/MrsGigglyMaria

Artwork by Npm98: http://npm98.deviantart.com/art/Twilight-Sparkle-Wallpaper-351812343
----------------------------------------------
Lyrics:
A heavy cloud is tracing me since I'm here
The shadow it casts touches everything I can see
It seems that it takes all bright colours from this world
To leave it in grey, my vision is blurred

Some hours have passed, the sun should be setting now
I cannot walk on, and fall to the ground
I keep looking up in search for a ray of light
Now stop to pretend! There's nothing to find.

I'm waiting for the rain
To flood this land and drench my mane
I can feel it running down my skin
So open up the gates
Just let it out, don't hesitate
And take the last hope that I kept.
----------------------------------------------
Haha! Jaybrain!

Open description for links~

Backstory:
Wonder what Rainbow Dash was feeling while she was waiting for the letter from Wonderbolts Academy? I was too :3 So, this song is a compilation of anxiety, answers, and acceptance. I was feeling this a while ago when I asked my girlfriend Andrea if she wanted to go out with me again, cause I had done something stupid and we got into a fight. Anwho, enjoy the music lol, sorry about ranting :D

Sidenote:
IIII'MMMM BACK YA HORSEFUCKERS :DDDD

Phantom Phaze's Channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/PhantomPhaze

Nikki-Layne's Channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/nikkilayneponyswag

Art by whomever I give credit to! Sorry, I lost the original link D:

https://eqbeats.org/track/6125

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MmaZxhnoSe2Mbf0KjC0hqGJjXuYnPekElbYaOVx2z3o/edit

title: Sim Gretina feat. ChiChi - What Your Friendship Means to Me (Sonic Rainboom Mix)
description:
I had this tune running around in my head here and there for a couple days. One night, the bassline popped into my head while I was trying to fall asleep. I jumped out of bed, and jotted it down while downloading the stems. All in all, I think the tune came together well.

I used a different cover art from the original, since the original just doesn't suit how the tune comes off to me. It's an uplifting piece, if a bit wistful. I like to think the narrator's entreaties were heard, and the dust was blown off the old friendship in the end. The original cover art doesn't really convey that at all.

Vocals by Ashleigh Ball, Andrea Libman, and Kazumi Evans.

--------------------------------------------------

I'd like to take a moment to apologize to all the people making requests. I'd like to get on them, and I'm gonna try to commit myself to at least one pony cover per month.

This song was begging for a high quality metal cover, though, and no other musician was giving it the hardcore justice it deserves. So I had to get on it.

Welcome to the Cloudsdale arena. Don't worry about falling off if you aren't a pegasus, you're already covered.

Careful for potential strong winds!

Composer: Amythistfire

- This is an original composition inspired for this game.
- Prepare your bodies for epicness.

title: Raze This Barn
description:
Obviously, this is a parody/remix. Made it for Digibrony xD.

Artwork from google images. Could not find original source. If anyone knows who the artist is, let me know and I will credit them.

Lyrics (modified slightly):

Raze this barn. Raze this barn.
One, two, three, four.
Together, we can raze this barn.
One, two, three, four.

Down, down, down. Go the beams.
Hammer those joints, work in teams.
Turn 'em round quick by the right elbow.
Grab a new partner, here we go.

Raze this barn. Raze this barn.
One, two, three, four.
Together, we can raze this barn.
One, two, three, four.

Smash the frame, burning wood.
Working hard you're doing good.
Turn 'em round quick by the right elbow.
Grab a new partner, here we go.

Look at us.
We're family.
Working together,
Thankfully.

Splintering wood falls to the ground.
Hold em' up and tear them down.
Turn 'em round quick by the right elbow.
Grab a new partner, here we go.

Raze this barn. Raze this barn.
One, two, three, four.
Together, we can raze this barn.
One, two, three, four.

Bow to your partner circle right.
Demolish with all your might.
Forward, back, and twirl around.
Finished with the barn lets raze the town.

title: End of Days
description:
Art by Huussii: http://huussii.deviantart.com/art/MLP-Nightmare-Moon-251955601

Lyrics:

Witness the end of days
As I retake the celestial reigns
Tear down the soiled crown
Monolith of arrogance brought down

I have ascended
I am what you could never be
Your time has come, it is destiny

Eternal struggle for perfection
The fruits of which lie beyond the comprehension
Of the ignorant
My existence is not meaningless

Too long has Equestria basked in the light
They will learn to appreciate my night

Bow to the throne of your new god

Witness the end of days
As I retake the celestial reigns
Tear down the soiled crown
Monolith of arrogance 

----------------------------------------­----------

You fool, you know not what you've done
Birthright denied, you were the chosen one
Cast to the heavens, ignominious fate
My judgement is perfect
Eternity awaits

title: My Friend My Lacunae
description:
Project Horizon https://docs.google.com/document/d/1D6PJA5lrE0OzzS-ZC2kbf-4piyyuUdF-zniVqUs79uM/edit
Lyrics https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F7SAAncazW98q6ulUz_0NN-MHFWegTjsKoo_N-9lRm8/edit

Project Horizon https://docs.google.com/document/d/1D6PJA5lrE0OzzS-ZC2kbf-4piyyuUdF-zniVqUs79uM/edit


I dont even know how to talk about. Basically For a while I've wanted to do a song about Project Horizon... and then the last chapter came out. Before I say this let me tell you, Project Horizon is FUCKING AMAZING but dark as FUCK! Like you do not understand. This thing will take your heart and rip it into 2. Ask anyone who has EVER read it. But anyway, the character Lacunae kinda died in the chapter so I got to work on this like not even a hour after reading the chapter. I dont personally think this is all that great lyrically, but what ev. I hope you enjoy this and if Somber was ever to hear this then my life would be complete (Hint Hint)

title: Luna of the Night (A Capella)
description:
A little tribute to the best Princess ever, Luna. 

Interesting Note: When I was writing the lyrics I had originally thought to make it more of a rock/pop song, but then I remembered this fun educational song (about the breakup of the Soviet Union) that I had assisted in recording for one of my favorite teachers.  The style worked itself out in my head so quickly I just had to use it. Enjoy!

title: 2 Hoovez - Bad Pones (feat. Da Mane)
description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E2dTISacRGs
https://soundcloud.com/2hoovez/bad-pones-feat-da-mane


© 2 Hoovez Ent. 2013 

I'm a bad pony, and yall' know that.
Buck around with that click clack I'ma get that big mack.
Please don't relax or I'ma put a spell on you.
I'ma go like Trixie, blow the wheels off you.

Like, okie dokie lokie now you gotta Pinkie promise.
I got all the bad ponies and you know they hangin' wit' queen Chris-
alys Celestiary 5-0 miss me.
Criminal stallions only live to be 50-

thousand years old.
Changelings with the air holes.
Throwin' Cadence further than a javelin pole.
Im a hagglin' street stallion valiant though.
I made this OC impossible.

You know, haha my pones.
Throwin' stones like rarity's rock Tom.
Im' the explosive zap apple bomb rap.
Meet Zecora, even catch a contact ha ha haa.




Pegasi im'a fly witcha'
Earth ponies ride by witcha'.
Trill unicorns grind witcha',
and if youre discord ima do some crime witcha'.

I'm sayin, take your front hooves and your hind hooves.
Better get loose now I might give the mic to my brony 2,
Hoovez.

2 Hoovez

So sick you might even feather flu.
So Season 2 you might even write a letter to,

Princess Luna like in your dreams.
You can't even test me you know how it seems I'm
realler' than the Olden Pony.
Kinda' like the Hub channel disowning Sony.

I'm galloping, straight up.
Eating oats my weight up.
My motivator that paper that,
bits and them real gems.
I made it. Yeah.
2 Hoovez.
(Shout outs my cousin Derp yall' know who it is)

Da Mane

I'll make you throw your hooves up like a bulimic, cannibal.
Known to flood mugs, rhyme surreal, intangible.
Demand a full plate of the fruits of your labor.
Bitter Acres - Want the boots of their neighbors.

Put my roots down in Everfree like Zecora.
Don't bark up the wrong tree, I'm a violent author.
Yo Da Mane Big Daddy Lil' Rein and.
2 Hooves, buckle up we're rattling your brain.

Catch bodies with bear (bare) hands like a dead salmon.
And your ship sinks when I fire head ca(n)nons.
The sketch stallions with belts of projectiles.
Trot into town in the dark wearing neckties.

Catch me setting Bon Bonfire.
To all the houses of non-compliers.
Like the letter D, you're at the end of "your road".
Put my hoof down, on your neck, and you choke (Now that's assertive)".

title: MezzaLuna
description:
It is always an absolute pleasure working on a track with DerpyCrash, so I'm happy to give you guys our latest collab!  This might just be my favorite thing I've done yet!  If you haven't already, make sure to go over, check out his stuff, and subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/DerpyCrash

Download link:
http://leafrunner.bandcamp.com/

Youtube link:
http://youtu.be/i4Cd6N8uga0

Soundcloud link:
http://soundcloud.com/leafrunner/mezzaluna

We both agree that Luna is cool, so it was inevitable that we'd do another song for the best princess.  I think my progressive rock influences may be wearing off on DerpyCrash a bit...

I know I don't put out music really often, but I really do appreciate every single one of your likes and comments.  I know I say it everytime, but thank you so much for listening and telling me if you enjoy my music.  Keep on being awesome!

LeafRunner - Guitars, Bass
DerpyCrash - Bass, Synths, Drum Programming, Keyboards, Production

My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic is ©Hasbro and The Hub.

title: Nothing to do
description:
Diamond had never really been the kind of filly to get to know the other foals, but once she met Silver Spoon-- in the schoolyard-- she'd realized, she might be the kind of filly she wanted to know. A sort of, "I have to get to know this pony" feeling. They quickly became friends, living out their dull lives together, finding excitement together. There's never really anything to do, anyway. Might as well do anything.

Diamond looked her in the eyes and smiled, this was who she needed to spend her life with, at least for now, for now this was enough. Just these two, [i]nopony[/i] else was worth mentioning anyway.

title: The First Step
description:
We collaborated on this a while back over Skype, and performed it for the very first time at PonyCon Australia 2013, having only met IRL that morning. Here's the studio version.

Image by Feather: http://feather-ponyart.deviantart.com/art/The-First-Step-Cover-Art-394603408
Go give her your love here http://soundcloud.com/laura-friend

Lyrics:
V1 (Evdog)
She's been walking such a lonely road
And the longer she walks the longer it seems to go
She's through trying, though she says that she's great
But she wonders deep down if maybe it's all too late

V2 (Feather)
Smoke and mirrors, nothing you see is real
Confidence masking how I honestly feel
I've never known friendship and I want it so bad
What I would give to own what it is that you have

Chorus (Both)
The first step is the hardest one to take
The first step is the hardest one to take

V3 (FEATHER)
I've gotta bury my pride and put it all on the line
If I want to escape from this cycle of mine
It's a risk and half but one I will have to take
So I can better myself for my own sake

Chorus

Bridge
(Ev) Put one hoof forward
(F) I gotta make it
(Ev) Make sure you're sure now
(F) Yeah, I'm gonna take it
(Ev) We'll don't back down now
(F) Yeah I'm gonna try
(F) But why does it hurt so much to say that I'm sorry

Instrumental with woah's

Chorus x2, then Bridge

title: Hirosashii - Alone (UnderpΩny Remix)
description:
Entry to Remix War VII, dedicated to my friend Alex
It came out a little mediocre, sorry.

----------

And I can't stop it, and you won't stop it...

Same day, different story
Never could find the path pleading for me
All day, and all night
I worked hard, but I never reached the light
In the city on the hill
I just know that's the place I will
Turn my dreams to reality
But I can't do a thing for me
I don't know where to go from here
The future's all I have to fear
I've got to find myself a way
To live with happiness each day

And I can't stop it, and you won't stop it...

I wish that my friends would've known
I used to cry when I was alone

No hard feelings to Ponyville
The place where I can chill, but also where life stands still
I need to stop thinking who I should be
I'm generosity, but I need care for me
And I wait for the day when I say I need stray
Away from my life as of now; it's child's play
But my friends have been friends from the start to the end
I hope when I leave, if I leave, that my heart extends
Its love...

And I can't stop it, and you won't stop it...

I wish that my friends would've known
I used to cry when I was alone

Hirosashii - Alone (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=14lc4dU6RVk)

description:
The clouds reflecting the light
Of streetlamps staining the night
Your stars hidden away
No difference between night and day

Luna, you left me
Abandoned in the blazing light
Luna, why won't you show yourself to me?
I need your comfort tonight

A time, a time I recall
Your smile of silver, that was all
I needed to get through the day
Although you were distant
You still showed me the way

Luna, I miss you
Please come back to my world
Luna, how could I throw it all away?
I loved from a distance
Did you feel ignored?

(Remember that night in the Garden you came down my dressing room and said, "Kid, this ain't your night.  We're going for the price on Wilson."  You 'member that?  "This ain't your night!"  My night!  I coulda taken Wilson apart...)

Luna, I loved you
I failed to tell you time and time again

I need the darkness to cloud my pain

I don't want this daytime
I just want your night

If this is freedom, it isn't worth the cost

It isn't worth the cost

title: the sound of french kissing twilicane
Summer
description:
Cover of Jackle App's Summer from Griffin Village.
Worked out by ear, and put into a different key to fit my voice. I had a LOT of fun making this. I actually think the lyrics are quite sad for such a bouncy, catchy song; that's what interested me enough to do a cover.
Enjoy~

Art by Fajeh, used with permission: http://fajeh.deviantart.com/art/Lyra-and-Bon-Bon-282294069


Lyrics:

Plucking strings and broken wings
Are the things that defined my Ponyville summer
When Nice Nurse Mare from urgent care
Put my wings in slings, oh gosh what a bummer
(But I'll abscond)
You wouldn't care when you're in the care of
(Where I'll have fun)
When you're in the care of Lyra and Bon-Bon

I looked all day for a place to stay
But 'no vacancy' signs went on for miles
They saw my cast, I didn't even ask
They took me right in to stay for a while
(But I don't mind)
You don't ask why when you're desperate as I
(Out of the sun)
And you don't ask why when it's Lyra and Bon-Bon

I watched them together while under the weather
And couldn't believe my eyes
Two ponies like this who will share every kiss
Like they'll share the rest of their lives
It made me blue and a little bit green
That they were flushed red with love
I'm too yellow to tell them I'm leaving today
With the orange sunset above

Plucking strings and broken wings
Are the things that defined my Ponyville summer

My name is Pinkie Pie 
And I am here to say 
I'm gonna make you smile 
And I will brighten up your day 
It doesn't matter now 
If you are sad or blue 
'Cause cheering up my friends 
Is just what Pinkie's here to do

'Cause I love to make you smile, smile, smile 
Yes I do 
It fills my heart with sunshine all the while 
'Cause all I really need's a smile, smile, smile 
From these happy friends of mine

I like to see you grin 
I would love to see you beam 
The corners of your mouth turned up 
Is always Pinkie's dream

And your face has made a frown 
I'll work real hard and do my best 
To turn that sad frown upside down

'Cause I love to make you grin, grin, grin 
Yes I do 
Bust it out from ear to ear, let it begin 
Just give me a joyful grin, grin, grin 
And you fill me with good cheer

It's true some days are dark 
Some days are dark and lonely 
And maybe you feel sad 
But Pinkie will be there to show you that 
Pinkie will show you 
Be there to show you that 
Some days will show you that 
It isn't that bad 
It isn't that lonely 
Some days you feel sad 
We'll show you that 
It isn't that bad 
It isn't that lonely

'Cause I love to see you beam, beam, beam 
Yes I do 
Tell me, what more can I say to make you see 
That I do? 
It makes me happy when you beam, beam, beam 
Yes, it always makes my day 
I love to make you smile, smile, smile 
Yes I do 
It fills my heart with sunshine all the while 
Yes it does 
'Cause all I really need's a smile, smile, smile 
Come on and smile!

title: Anthropology (Chiptune Cover)
description:
A little while ago I looked at one of Equstria Daily's music of the day posts. On the post I heard a "chiptune" cover of Anthropology. said cover sounded like a regular midi fed through Peach VST. now, I don't mind VSTs (heck THIS was made with VSTs) but it had way too many notes playing all at once, something most 8-bit systems couldn't do.
it bugged me, to say the least, so I made my own cover within about an hour.
this is a tad bit rushed and isn't the full song, but it's meant to loop endlessly so there's that goin' for it.

title: Lost in Thought (Original Punk Song)
description:
LINKS/LYRICS/DOWNLOAD:

I will admit vocals isn't particularly my strong suit. But I'm more than happy with the instrumental part (which I took MUCH longer to record on).
So anyway, its PONY related, subtly, but I'd say it's more BRONY related. It's a touchy subject, but I mean its just my critique on not just the fandom, but other critics of bronies. So it's all fair in my eyes. You don't have to believe a word I say. Like I said, instrumentals are my strong suit.

Lyrics:

There is no war
No one is dead
Indifferences of these tears we shed
Struck down in our own footsteps
But no blood ever reaches the top of our heads
Stagnated the dreams that we once never had
Nightmare's all I see around me

It's like we're all walking asleep
Potential we're not meant to keep
Differentiated from the stereotype
The part of you that they don't see is hidden from me
Infected hypocritic "herd" mentality
Exaggerate the hopeless tragedy

What's that calling you at your front door?
Is it something that'll make you care about the world some more?
The words you use are different
But your motive's the same
There's nothing more to say
What's left to take?
Some other way?
Maybe another day...


Download/Soundcloud:
https://soundcloud.com/thes...


SHAMELESS PROMOTING:
I play bass in a punk band called "hiveMind.", and we just released a demo, so it would be gratefully appreciated if you checked us out. :)
Demo/Youtube: www.youtube.com/watch?v=KJIjiO­ctT8Y
Facebook: www.facebook.com/pages/hiveMin­d/5...950357?ref=br_tf
Reverb Nation: www.reverbnation.com/hivemind1
Soundcloud: @hivemind-1
Twitter: twitter.com/Frayedpunk

MORE PONY STUFF COMING!

Hypersonic (Revisited) is a release in which I return to the beginning of my pony music career to revisit one of my oldest tracks: Hypersonic. The release features Resurrected, Orchestral and Original Mixes, and Instrumental versions of Resurrected and Original Mixes.

In Resurrected Mix, I recreate Hypersonic with my newly acquired knowledge and techniques, bringing you a complete overhaul of the whole song: new instrumentation, different transitions, more intensity, different BPM, yet staying true to the original composition and ideas.

Tracklist:
01 - Thorinair - Hypersonic (Resurrected Mix)
02 - Thorinair - Hypersonic (Orchestral Mix)
03 - Thorinair - Hypersonic (Original Mix)
04 - Thorinair - Hypersonic (Instrumental Resurrected Mix)
05 - Thorinair - Hypersonic (Instrumental Original Mix)


Mastering by: HMage (http://www.youtube.com/user/HMageD)
Cover Art by: Pyrestorm (http://pyrestorm.deviantart.com/)

title: Feeding Dreams-Buffalo Brony Ft Vylet Pony (dusty remix)
Summer Sun (Centuries Later)
description:
Esta es una historia que hace incontables inviernos hubo de nacer
De una noche cuando el día se pensó nunca iría a volver
De una yegua cuyo miedo la convirtió en él

Una luna y otra sol: dos hermanas trabajando en son
La del día bañada en amor, la noche hundida en rencor
Con la promesa de una era de terror

Caballo negro, sueño del mal
¿Qué pesadilla nos traes?
Yegua en la luna, noche inmortal
¿Qué pesadilla nos traes?

Cuando el amor la dejó, la pequeña abandonó el trono
Y se armó de pistola y cañón, buscando la abdicación del día
Pero la hermana mayor, con pesar en el corazón
Puso la armonía sobre su dolor,
y acabó con la ira de la abominación

De la luna nos observa, nunca olvida lo que juró:
Son mil años de prisión, después el retorno del terror

Caballo negro, sueño del mal
¿Qué pesadilla traerás?
Yegua en la luna, noche inmortal
¿Qué pesadilla traerás?

Luces del alba levantan el alma, reaniman al corazón
La calma en el aire anuncia la mañana, anticipa que viene el sol
No existe ausencia que apague la luz, ni noche que extinga su calor
Aún en la oscuridad hay alegría al saber que ya viene el sol

(Light without dark can't be light
Days are not without the night)

title: For Rarity (feat. Unit Designation Sweetie Belle)
description:
A little bit of Friendship is Witchcraft fun for everyone. 

Freewave was complaining that techno is underrepresented in pony music over on mylittleremix, I had never seen any legitimate pony techno, myself, so I decided to try my hand at it. It came into focus when I thought about Sweetie Bot from Friendship is Witchcraft. The struggle to find an emotional identity within an artificial mind that Sweetie Bot has throughout the series is conducive, IMO, to the futurist ethos of techno, and I feel like if a machine were to make a song dedicated to her adopted sister, this is pretty darn close to what it would sound like.
-------------------------------
Artwork by: BrainSucks
http://brainsucks.deviantart.com/art/MLP-fim-Sweetie-Bot-352581554
Watch Friendship is Witchcraft (No, seriously, watch it):
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbr-HVHOIZZvehxQw0vO4Hq_VEcbDHez7
And check out the Sherclop Ponies website:
http://sherclop.com/
-------------------------------
Lyrics
If you weren't there for me,
How would I feel alive?
Since I am your sister,
Can this unit feel love?

title: I HEAR DEAD FRIENDS
description:
from Toastbeard ZIQ92 description:

"Got a special presentation tonight, something I meant to do last year for Halloween...

a small compilation of stuff from dead friends of mine who just happened to dabble in rapping. aka DEADcompo01

"Rocco" was a very aggressive drug dealer/robber/career criminal type. Claimed he had someone murdered in retaliation once. Died of a suspicious drug overdose that was probably foul play. Owed me money, sigh.

"Gumby" was a mellow drug addict/junkie type. Overdosed on methadone in a seedy motel.

tracklist is as follows:

#1 - Me recording via portable DAT machine in another friend's car when we pick up Rocco, who just successfully fled the cops after they busted a party. He forces me to shut off the machine by threatening to break it, which he totally would have.

#2 - Rocco spitting this one rap he wrote years ago. It was always dope, but he could never get it to flow on a beat, and he never really wrote anything else.

#3 - Gumby freestyling over Eminem "Role Model" on MY FIRST STUDIO SETUP™ (Acid Pro w00t, my dad made me a female XLR to male 1/8th headphone adapter, and we'd plug that bitch right into the back of the computer and go to work. ghetto as fuck). He was so high on Xanax pills that he actually nodded off several times while recording this. I was afraid he was gonna overdose right then and there tbh. Like don't die in my fucking house dude. Eh, he was more like an acquaintance anyway."

title: Cycle
description:
Art by WingWind: http://www.deviantart.com/art/Mirror-Mirror-Wallpaper-286733064
Exis and TimberWolffe helped me write the verses. Well... more like they were just there while I wrote them, but they acted as great catalysts.

It's Nightmare Night (Halloween), so here's a Luna song about her hating the fact that she has been Nightmare Moon.
Stemming from the Season 4 Comic-Con animatic, it got me thinking "Could it happen to her more than once? What if it has? She must hate knowing that her, as the Nighmare, caused so much turmoil."
It also I've been feeling a bit depressed lately, and this was a good channel to express my emotions.

LYRICS
Verse 1: 
This thing inside of me is cold to the touch
Yet it eats at all that I hold dear
Holding control of my sanity and
Lighting a fire with my fear.
Grasping for holds it seems
My life is beyond my means

Pre-Chorus 1:
But This time I will hold my own
And This time I won't be controlled

Chorus 1:
I don't wanna live in this Nightmare
I don't wanna be who I am
I wanna get out of this cycle
A part of me has another plan. 

Verse 2:
Slayin' my demons is easy now I know how
But myself is too much of a match.
The battle wounds, yeah, they heal over time
But there's scars where my heart was dispatched.
In here is darker than night
My hope is shrouded in fright

Pre-Chorus 2:
But This time I will hold on hope
And This time I won't lose control

Chorus 1

Chorus 2:
I ain't letting you be my master
All you ever bring me is pain
I wanna get out of this madness
A part of me has another plan.

description:
I loved Replacer's version of this song, but I've always thought it was far too slow for a high-velocity character like Rainbow Dash. title: Moonsy & Rhyme Flow - I'm Ready (Unthinkable Tia/Cord Mix)
description:
VIDEO AT: http://youtu.be/ZM_0X2Q6z1w
Description from Video:

Happy Valentines! (Hearts & Hooves, "Singles Awareness" etc.)  I've been waiting to release this little gem for a while now.  I worked with the lovely and talented: Moon Shines (http://www.youtube.com/user/musicbymoonshine) 

She wanted to Ponify Alicia Key's "Un-Thinkable" with a little Discord/Celestia shipping. 
I'm not one to turn down a concept, so I thought, LET'S DO DIS!

We were originally going to sing/duet together on a different song, but she decided my voice was better suited for rapping! (A very wise decision :P) 

So if you have a special someone you want to do Un-thinkable things with... YOU DO IT!  *Be Un-Thinkable Responsibly.  

Also, I haven't been able to record since NOVEMBER 2013, but I'm happy to let you know that all changes NEXT MONDAY!  I'll be back in the lab, writing and recording and cranking out much more music for you all!  

I'm going to BabsCon (http://www.babscon.com/) with IbeConcept (http://www.youtube.com/user/ibeabronyrapper?feature=watch) in April, so if you're in the area, say hi!  I might actually get to have my own set!  

Stay tuned for updates for me possibly going to a Midwest Con and... BronyCon 2014? 

Thanks to all of you for sticking around during my very dry spell.  You guys mean the world to me!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

title: This Day Aria (Metal Cover)
description:
Download more music at my website: http://www.itstartsatdusk.com

Original song name: "This Day Aria, Part 1", "This Day Aria, Part 2"
Show: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
Original composer: Daniel Ingram

Follow me on
• Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/duskmusic
• Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/itstartsatdusk
• SoundCloud: http://www.soundcloud.com/itstartsatdusk

Vocals by Britt McKillip and Kathleen Barr

--------------------------------------------------

You voted for it, YouTube fans, and here it is! My metal take on "This Day Aria".

Straight-up metal, as usual. As HurricaneSparky noted, most metal covers/remixes of this source go the symphonic route, so I definitely wanted to keep this one different in that regard. It took quite a while getting all of those tempo changes ironed out, too. And how many covers out there implement Part 2? That's just screaming for the heavy. I also characterized the music according to who's singing, with Chrissy's parts being a bit darker and heavier, and Cadance's sections being a bit more upbeat.

title: The First Step
description:
Got lazy. Made some prog house. These things happen.

Trixie's story is nowhere near complete. Magic Duel didn't even really progress her all that far, in my opinion. More than anything, it simply revealed that yes, she actually has the capacity to apologize for her wrongdoing. Nevermind the fact that she really had nothing to apologize for in Boast Busters. Trixie still seems mortified at the suggestion that someone might actually get to know the version of her that isn't an act, as evidenced by her recession into third person self-reference and her hasty exit at the end. I hope someday, the writers put her into a position where she is forced to get to know somepony, and learns that really, it's not so bad as she's built it up to be in her mind.

Cover Art: Oh the Places You Will See, by ThePleonasticPotato
http://thepleonasticpotato.deviantart.com/art/Oh-The-Places-You-Will-See-360520609?q=gallery%3AThePleonasticPotato&qo=3

Samples From: http://www.mlptf2mods.com/create/reference-materials

title: Oxygen (w/ Almost Anyone)
description:
And here we go, with my first ever original MLP-inspired song! =D

For this song, I envisioned a Pegasi, who perhaps met a Water Pony from beneath the ocean, who is very sad and lonely. This song is that Pegasi's words to the lonely water pony, to come out of the water that traps her, and see the world from above the waves...

The idea for this story originally came from proof-reading a brilliant novel-in-progress by a good friend of mine named Aquatic-Angel (http://aquatic-angel.deviantart.com), so she is just as much to thank for the inspiration as well =)

Also, special thanks to Almost Anyone for producing such a wonderful track to put these lyrics too, your a champ!

Enjoy!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music by Almost Anyone
http://www.youtube.com/user/AlexReadeMusic

Lyrics and Vocals by Fritzybeat

Instrumental:
http://almostanyone.bandcamp.com/track/oxygen

Vocals:
http://www.mediafire.com/download/kt6cy6525l71c21/Oxygen_Vocals.m4a

Download: (MP4)
http://www.mediafire.com/download/q2kdx7hhh0kd5y2/Oxygen.m4a

Watch on Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y_AYXdVovfs

Listen on Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/fritzybeat/oxygen-fritzybeat-almost-1

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Featured on Equestria Daily: http://www.equestriadaily.com/2013/11/spotlight-music-oxygen-froggy-bottom.html

Featured on Everypony Sings: http://www.everyponysings.com/2013/11/original-oxygen.html

Featured on Scottish Bronies: http://www.scottishbronies.co.uk/1/post/2013/11/music-share-8.html

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Lyrics:

Like a dazzling pearl hidden in the darkest night
Your beauty will not shine till' you're in the light
So open up your oyster of sorrow and pain
And let it all be washed away

There's a world above the ocean floor
So just take my hand, and I'll show you more

Your heart like paper your eyes like broken glass
Why are you so dragged down by what comes to pass?
Life can be dark hard times are bound to come
But we can't let this anchor hold us to the ground

There's a world above the ocean floor
So just take my hand, and I'll show you more
So come up here, oh come up here
There's a world for you to explore, just breath the atmosphere

So come up here, oh come up here
There's a world for you to explore, just breath the atmosphere

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hope you like!

~Fritzy

title: Freewave + Sylverlining - I'll Be Your Friend
description:
I thought it would be cool to do a blues / country song (not too many brony versions of that) and make it about Cranky and Pinkie's meeting up. I know a lot of people give Pinkie crap for her tenacity in that episode and initially upsetting him as much helping him. I think its important to remember just how beaten down his character was when he arrived and how she brought some new found joy back to his life. Anyway i really identify with some of the themes with this one so it was fun writing the lyrics. More importantly doing a duet with Sylverlining was wonderful as she's just so talented and having a youthful and fresh approach to music has made me a little less cranky and withered myself. I hope you enjoy this change of pace. :D

Her channel is always http://www.youtube.com/user/SylverNuckelavee and we'll be doing further work together (currently working on the Maressey album). She's fabulous so please show her some support too!

title: Rainbow Dash Theme- Fighting is Magic [DJ-G6PON3 Remix]
Freewave + Mathematicus - Cheerilee's Garden
description:
It's unfortunate that Rainbow Factory is a massively well known song & fimfiction and yet there's been no musical adaption of the wonderfully written and yet terribly scary and grotesque Cheerilee's Garden (arguably one of the best of the grimdark bunch and the MLP equivalent of a Saw or Hostel). So here is a track i put together about the fimfic and with the help of my local friend Mathematicus (bridge guitar, advice, and many other elements). It's definitely not for the young kiddies (and you can push the button and elect for the non-pmv) but hopefully perfect for Nightmare Night and for those who don't mind a bit of scarier fare.

The fimfic is here (and again its a good scary and gory read) http://www.fimfiction.net/story/1766/

Art thumbnail is by the departed swaetshrit http://swaetshrit.deviantart.com/ who sadly is no longer active.
Demotivational (split sides of cheerilee is from) SkiddleZIzKewl
http://skiddlezizkewl.deviantart.com/art/Cheerilee-s-Garden-352841348
And everything else was screenshot and cropped from the show itself.

I'll likely be getting stems up soon if anyone wants a crack at remixing this in a different style. If there's enough interest I'll release an ep of remixes in a month or so (already have a thrash metal version partway done that will be out with that). So keep in touch. :D

Mathematicus is here http://www.youtube.com/user/z4k4t4k and he's actually working on his own grimdark album of the mane 6 based on the ask blogs and they're worth staying tuned for. Please check him out and subscribe if that's at all interesting to you!

title: Freewave + Sylverlining - Mare on the Moon
description:
So this first and foremost is a ponified cover of R.E.M.'s - Man on the Moon, which is a classic song on its own. While having a year w/o ponies was rough there have been amazing developments in the comics but not a whole lot of fan music to reflect those adventures. So this song loosely chronicles the plotlines of #5-8 but also examines skepticism in the fandom. If we examine MLP too closely under the microscope or presume that it's drying out we'll end up damaging the very thing we hopefully still love.

I have all the lyrics originally posted here on my tumblr (plz do read them and subscribe if you want to keep tabs on what's upcoming or what i release)HERE

I do encourage people to support the comics as they are more ambitious then most of the single and many of the 2 parter episodes and have amazing art and wonderful storylines. I wanted to use the art as a teaser. After all pmv's use the show and you don't see movies w/o trailers. I did try to avoid a complete plot givewaway. ;)

Free mp3 here https://soundcloud.com/dj-p0n-3/freewave-sylverlinging-mare-on
and here https://pony.fm/tracks/1697-freewave-sylverlining-mare-on-the-moon

A massive thanks to Sylverlining for her amazing vocal talents and helping me out on the choruses. https://www.youtube.com/user/SylverNuckelavee  She's amazing and you should keep tabs on her.

title: Rainbow Factory (Metal Cover)
description:
Today we delve into one of the darker places in Equestria. Ponies of all sorts try to forget about the horrors that lie within this facility. The nightmare takes place within Cloudsdale. This city is responsible for all the weather in Equestria: its clouds, its snow and even its rainbows. But the secret of the rainbow's creation is a well kept and dark tale, and for good reason. But today, a secret it shall be no more. Today the way of the rainbow factory will be revealed, and horrors that it beholds will be unleashed.


VIDEO: http://youtu.be/buDaPoMuE0E

Credits:
Sxp (Head writer, rhythm guitarist, lead vocalist, mixer) - https://www.youtube.com/user/sxpgt

title: Cerulean Blue (/w Almost Anyone) [Replacer Remix/Cover]
description:
Sorry for taking so long to upload this here, but for some reason EqBeats wouldn't accept the format =/ Silly silly EqBeats =P

DESCRIPTIONS! 8D

The moment I joined the fandom, one of the first brony songs I heard was L-Train's cover of the song "Cerulean Blue", which of course led me to discover the epicness of the original song by Replacer, and while I think L-Train had the right idea in speeding the track up, I felt the rockiness of the track sort of caused it to loose its more emotional side, the happiness of the original if you will. 
I wanted to create something that captured the best of both worlds, something that both gave the feeling of tranquility in flight, and the velocity of flight with Rainbow Dash. This was the result.

Fun fact: this track was originally an old scrapped track Almost Anyone just sort of threw aside for future projects, and I decided such a work of art should never go to waste, so I repurposed it =D

Hope you all Enjoy, and again, thank you to Almost Anyone for his amazing music skills, and another special thank you to L-Train for the inspiration to create this song X3

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Check out the original Cerulean Blue here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uSThrDFhoHM

Music by Almost Anyone
http://www.youtube.com/user/AlexReadeMusic

Lyrics by the amazing Replacer:
http://www.youtube.com/user/dominian42?feature=watch

Vocals and additional mixing by Fritzybeat

Cover Art by my good friend Ziggyfin: http://ziggyfin.deviantart.com

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instrumental:
http://www.mediafire.com/download/sdrai58p246pau8/Cerulean+Blue+%28Instrumental%29.mp3

Vocals:
-(Coming Soon!)-

Download M4A:
http://www.mediafire.com/download/h5wal6ppz5zopwq/Cerulean+Blue.m4a
Download MP3:
http://www.mediafire.com/download/4l8d2cltryqhn0t/Cerulean+Blue.mp3

Listen on Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vOHZzRx65PE

Listen on Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/fritzybeat/cerulean-blue-fritzybeat

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Featured on Equestria Daily: http://www.equestriadaily.com/2013/12/music-of-day-228.html

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Lyrics:

A flash of colour and she's gone, no one can hope to pursue
A flank of red and white and yellow and cerulean blue
And making rainbows awesome since october two thousand ten
Another day, a rush of wind and she'll be at it again
Those airborne virtuosics are the stuff of legends and more
The name is Rainbow Dash and I suspect you've heard it before
Now if you come with me you'll find her where she takes her repose
You won't forget her quickly once you see her as she well knows

If ever you're in need of help she will show up with a smile
And indescribable velocity, impeccable style
Agility in spades and pegasine charisma to match
And when you're falling you can count on her to be there to catch
Don't be alarmed if she does not appear as soon as you shout
You know she probably just stopped to give some autographs out
To call her narcissistic is an understatement and yet
She's just that good, it's not surprising that it goes to her head

Rainbow Dash is best pony
When the world seems everfree
Coloured winds blow through my mind
Everything is left behind

Fly, Rainbow Dash, Fly...

Now Rainbow Dash, I think you could do worse than listening to me
Though you're spectacular it's probable your friends would agree
Your self-aggrandising demeanour is ungracious and cruel
As if you're insecure and compensating, don't be a fool
You know you'll never be a Wonderbolt until you admit
You need to lift your game and act as if you really want it
Still busy napping when you could be out perfecting your art
So much potential, come on Rainbow Dash, you're breaking my heart

Rainbow Dash is best pony
When the world seems everfree
Coloured winds blow through my mind
Everything is left behind

Fly, Rainbow Dash, Fly...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hope you like!

~Fritzy

title: Sooshie Shef ft. Rhyme Flow - Berry Punch Drunk
description:
Youtube Link: http://youtu.be/pizCeB7EIQM

Happy "Day after 4th of July" or as the NON U.S. world calls it... 'July 5th'. 

Believe it or not it's been a DISTURBING 5 months since last I put something on my channel.  I have a horrible knack of NOT releasing music on months that I do performances and so 2 of those 5 months were JUST that.  

In April I was at BABScon in San Francisco, CA
http://youtu.be/BZDZUprqIPs

And June I performed at Club Luna in Anaheim, CA. 
http://youtu.be/Tvw06vvD_y8

At the end of this month, i'll be crashing BronyCon 2014 AGAIN, so... I'm hoping to 'buck the trend' with this Release/Contest.

What is it?  I worked with a friend of mine, Sooshie Shef over 2 years ago with an idea to release a 'Berry Punch'-centric track.  But back then I didn't have the same recording setup as I do now, and he eventually wandered off to do important things like focus on school.  Now that I've found the track, I decided not ONLY to release it, but I thought it would be in good fun to create a contest out of it.

The contest goes out to all Music Producers/DJ's/People that Make za Musicks for the fun of it.  The challenge?  Put together a 'Dirty South' instrumental remix of this 'Berry Punch Drunk' track.  Rules are as follows: 

1. Dirty South Style Beat 
2. Must use my 'Berry Punch Drunk' A Capella 
https://soundcloud.com/rhymeflow/berry-punch-drunk-flowny-acapella/s-vPpVd
3. E-mail me an MP3 Mixdown at I.Am.Rhyme.Flow@gmail.com
4. Send it in at a 256kpbs quality or higher, but no 'WAV' files please!
5. Have it in my mailbox no later than 11:59pm on July 25th 2014.

The winner will be announced VIA Twitter @RhymeFlow1 on July 30th 2014 

The track will be selected with the assistance of myself and a handful of judges who I think will help me make the best decision.

The winner will work with me to put together a 'Final Contest Winner' release of 'Berry Punch Drunk' which includes new recorded vocals, a possible fan VA of Berry Punch doing the chorus, a shiny Lyric Video with jazzy audio/visual effects, shameless promotion of the track on all my Social Media outlets, an opportunity to have a Priority Collaboration with yours truly (oh yeah, big whoop), and if you're AT BronyCon 2014 this year, I will personally buy you a beverage.  (Alcoholic if you're of legal age, and non... if you're... not.) 

I hope you enjoy the track, and I especially hope I can see some of you AT BronyCon! If you're there, catch Flows & Cons at BronyPalooza and don't forget to swing by and say hi! 

TL:DR - I have a contest to remix THIS song, and I'll be at BronyCon 2014! 

~ Rhyme Flow

PS - Toga Berry Punch Art by NicholasNSane 
http://fav.me/d4l9kra

title: Beware the Timberwolves
description:
What's this?  Me uploading a new track within 3 weeks of my last one?  What's gotten into me?

Here's a theme for the timberwolves of the Everfree Forest, as it would be if MLP were a NES game.  I always thought they were pretty cool creatures, and the Apple family related episode this week reminded me of them from season 2.  Hope you enjoy!

I loooooove 8-bit/chiptune music, mostly probably because I grew up playing the original NES and Atari, as well as old skool computer games.  I'd never really tried to make any of my own though, so I took up the challenge and hammered this out in Famitracker over the past day or so.  It was really interesting to see what problems the video game composers of that day had to overcome with hardware limitations.  If people are really interested, I may consider doing a real recording version of this, since I did come up with most of it on guitar anyway.  Let me know if you want that to happen, and I'll see what I can do when I get some more free time.

LeafRunner - Composition, Programming

My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic is ©Hasbro and The Hub.

title: Music Is Magic 2011-2014
description:
In November 2011 I decided to create an orchestral medley of all songs from "My Little Pony - Friendship Is Magic", seasons 1 and 2. Soon I realised that this was a project way bigger than anything I had ever done. Now, about 2 and a half years later it finally is done.
34 minutes, 1042 bars and 222 pages of orchestral score finally add up to this piece of music.

title: Faster Than You Know (Fritzy's GOLDen Remix/Cover) (w/ Almost Anyone)
description:
What would this even be called? A remix? A cover? a mashup? A parody? I don't even know anymore XD

Anyways, here's my "remiovermashrody" of BlackGryph0n and Baasik's brilliant song Faster Than You Know. Essentially how this started, was my brother brought up that a few people were talking about how similar Faster Than You Know was to a song called "Gold" by Owl City. I never saw the similarities musically, but lyrically, the two songs fit together like hoof in horseshoe X3

So, me being a big fan of Owl City, Baasik AND Gabe, I decided to create this bit of music :3 I didn't want to just sing overtop of the original Gold Instrumental though, so I dug up an older mix my pal Almost Anyone made of the song, and used that instead :3

And yes Gabe, I KNOW you are probably really tired of these songs being compared to one another, but you MUST know this had to be done at some point XD 

I HAVE NO REGREEEEEEETS...! *shot*

Enjoy!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8JJg9114bgs

Check out the original "Gold" Here:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: The Reason Why #01 - Intro
description:
"The Reason Why" is a scenario I created for a fan fiction. To point some settings up a little, I composed pieces of music for them.

About the scenario: Because of a virus all ponies start losing their powers - magic, physical strength, the ability to fly. Medicating already born ponies is impossible, and over time the ponies got unable to find the virus' origin. Because of that Celestia restarts a project she had cancelled years ago on moral grounds: cloned ponies growing into adults within a few weeks and then aging normally. They are supposed to rescue Equestria from going down.

title: You're No Harmony (Ska Punk Original)
description:
Download/Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/theshadypony/youre-no-harmony-ska-punk-song
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/user/theShadyPony?feature=watch

YEAH SKA PUNK
PICKITUP 1234 CHIC CHIC CHIC LETS GO
I like this one, what do you think?
This is my first ska-related song, and I've been meaning to put one out for a long time. It's pretty much just about being okay to be a brony, and its okay to express yourself in a unique way that others may find unorthodox. I'm working on another ska song, a hardcore song, and just a couple general punk songs. Stay tuned for more! :)

Do what you always do
Think what you always think

Part of the same old

Myself is lying

Looking to replicate

You're no harmony

You're no harmony

description:
Its about time I released another song eh? =P

Anyways, this song was done with the amazingly talented Orca Flights (who was just signed to a label a few weeks ago, yay!), and (though I forgot to credit him on the image) the brilliant writer Lewanut.

This is one of two songs I started before I became a brony, so as you can tell, the lyrics aren't exactly pony =P But, it was a fun song to work on regardless, and Lewanut did such a spectacular job with the lyrics that I would probably have to kill myself if I never finished it XD

So yeah, the song may be a little bit short, since its a bit of a ballad I guess...? But I hope you like it anyway =)

Couldn't just wait in the crowd that collected
Let a breath out when I got you breathing

Roadside island in a sea of masses
Woken to life blinking through your glasses
Framing your eyes like they're Renaissance paintings

After it all it was you who saved me

Under the stars with our hands intertwined
Our futures ahead at the front of our minds
Predilections so unprecedented
Fixed on your love see the future mended

Like Nephilim, angels mingle with men
It's said angels dance on the point of a pin
We're a pinspeck in the cosmic hanger
A pinhead, waltzing with an angel

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hope you like!

~Fritzy

title: A Prayer for Daylight
description:
Sunlight never cared about borders and neither did you
The sun is out and it didn't wait for you
Routine does not need you

Tears shed for a hero, a prayer from souls in need
but none of this moves a single nerve in me
What good is loyalty to the dead?

Now I'm sleeping on my hooves, head up, looking down,
Fighting off the dust that threatens to collapse these arms
My heart is shrinking up without daylight shining in
Even the sunflowers still think the night's not over

Words said, words I wish I could bring myself to forget
What would possess you to ask this of me?
What good is loyalty to the dead?

Now I'm sleeping on my hooves, head up, looking down,
Fighting off the dust that threatens to collapse these arms
My heart is shrinking up without daylight shining in
Even the sunflowers still think the night's not over

When you died you gave me your hooves to stand up but
identical horseshoes don't make two horses alike
My heart is shrinking up without daylight shining in
Even the sunflowers know that the night's not over

(Spoken word translation:)

In the name of the father, the son, and the holy spirit
As it was in the beginning, now and forever, 
for centuries of centuries, amen
Mary, mother of grace, mother of mercy
In life and in death give us shelter, great Lord
Give her, Lord, eternal rest
And shine upon her the perpetual light
Rest in peace
So be it

title: Luna Republik
description:
"Luna Republik" was written for a correspondent role play that is dictated by corruption, suffering, civil war and omnipresent fear. The piece of music has four parts, while the ending just refers to the beginning. First the string section starts off with melancholic harmonies, then a lonely flute plays a melody that reflects all the suffering caused by corruption and war. The first part permanently rises to a beseeching exclaimation, just before the world of Luna Republik shows an other side: the war and the omnipresent fear. Not many words are necessary to express the horror, but instead there is a change again... maybe there is something positive left?
A secluded melody draws a different image of this world, even though the apparent idyll in the middle of chaos does not survive long before being overtaken by suffering and the piece slowly vanishing into silence...
