title: Fluttershy, Get Them Home
description:
This song was made to be submitted for the Toastbeard compo ER416. Using the Techno Demo song from Alexander Gross's Xewton Music Studio, I created a song that responds to Fluttershy's initial negligence to let the Breezies go home.

This is my first full attempt at this compo. I was forced to use Adobe Audition as I currently have no Digital Audio Workstation (DAW). I will also note that I am not the best singer, but I got as close as I could. The voice effects are supposed to sound similar to that from Glaze/WoodenToaster's Rainbow Factory.

If this mix becomes a winner for this week's response, I will be sure to post it on my SoundCloud and YouTube, with improved audio. Simply search "Midimistro"  (with quotes) to find me elsewhere online.

title: Event Horizon Interferes with 174UDSI's Remix of Discord
Simple Words (feat. Cherax Destructor)
description:
Lyrics:

It hasn't been long enough
But I seem to be doing alright
I was today; I made my meals

Some days I can't be sure
That I'm out of my curse, 
that I can't go back again
I secretly hope I won't if I try

I see friendly faces from time to time
Some days it's hard to even stand upright
Some days are better, I even go outside

Maybe it's true that time heals all wounds
Maybe it works both ways
One fate for me and the rest of us
where consequence is a novel idea
And still it feels like
another encore is a blink away
But there's something better ahead 
and it's waiting for me
Wait for me

Along the streets that saw me die
The rain is dancing under the sun
It washed away all the blood and the death
and all that's left is all the time that is mine, 
I can wait for peace to catch up with my head
For the surprises up ahead
For the decisions left to make
For all the love left to give

And I know it's been rough
And I can't say enough
And neither can I pretend
That I understand
But if you put your trust in me
I'll show you how special your time can be

And even if I can't know what it's like
Because your life is not mine
I can show you that I care
For you I'm always there
You have someone to help you see things through
If you believe in me I'll be good for you too

I don't want to be lonely
Well, who wants to be lonely?
When I feel like I'm falling
You can always lean on me
When the nightmares get to me
You will wake up next to me
When I feel too tired to breathe
You can steal a breath from me
I'll stay with you

Because in this timeline
we've got a shot at a happy ending
The rest can wait until tomorrow
Today I'll stay with you
And it still feels like
another encore is a blink away
But it can wait until tomorrow
Today I'll stay with you

I don't want to be lonely
You don't have to be lonely
I'll stay with you

title: Cloudsailing
description:
Sorry it's been so long since I put out some new music, hopefully this makes up for it!  

I know it seems I do mostly pretty chill tracks, but that doesn't mean I can't rock out!  It's been quite awhile since I had the chance to plug up my electric guitar to the amp and crank it up pretty loud, and now that I got a bit more space in my basement to set up a somewhat permanent space for a studio, I jumped on the chance to do so.  I hadn't really done a Rainbow Dash song before, sounded like the best opportunity to.  It sure would be pretty awesome to be able to just zoom around the sky, sounds like a lot of fun to me.

Special thanks and shoutout to my cousin for helping me record some parts of this and doing most of the mixing and production on this!  And too my uncle as well for letting my play and borrow his Taylor acoustic, as well as break in his two brand new mics!  I definitely want me a Taylor now...

Doing my best to keep inspired, keep working on my arts, animation, and music.  Hearing all your lovely comments definitely helps to keep that going, you guys are all amazing!  Thanks so much as always for listening, liking, commenting, subscribing.  It still blows my mind that so many people dig my music.  Much love to you all!  Will try to see you again soon with more!

Guitars, bass, and piano performed by: LeafRunner
Mixing by Jesse Finney

My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic is ©Hasbro and The Hub.

description:
Yeah, my mane6 EP album Is kind of a bust, I'm just not feeling it anymore. Anyways, with this track I tried to capture Trixie's battle with her own self doubt, Which in the end, although she manages to mask it, couldn't completely banish it.

I know that I only had one song left on the Mane6 EP album, but I just can't think of something good for AJ :(. anyways, I may do an antagonist album instead, seeing how I already have 3 song about them. It's not final yet, but I'll keep you all updated as I go if I'll make it or not, hope you all enjoy the song!

title: Party Cannon
description:
Alrighty, been wanting to do this one for a while, a song based around Pinkie Pie's party cannon! My newest album now contains 2 tracks, and is nowhere near done yet =P, but I promise to have it done as soon as I can. 

Anyways, decided to go back to my old habit of just going with the flow of the song again, since I seem to do better that way. I also manage to get the song done a little faster too, for the fact that I save time attempting to follow a set style to the song, which in turn gives me more time to focus on mastering and editing the track. Also doing things this way is how I made Magic of Harmony, which is now also my most popular song on youtube.

As always I hope you enjoy the track, and keep tuned in if you want to hear more ^.^

title: Twilight Zone
description:
Cover of Twilight Zone by the talented and gorgeous Scarlett Peace, who I definately have a crush on.  I did this and performed it at BUCK last year, but I never got around to putting it on my youtube for reasons I won't go into.  Lyrics and download below.

art by empty-10: http://empty-10.deviantart.com/art/Driven-to-Insomnia-Print-Version-305024730

My brain is plagued with anxiety
Don't you set my mane aflame
Although I do like to practice propriety
This mess might make me go insane 

You recommend I socialize
But I would much prefer to be learning
Don't be surprised if I overanalyze
Its just my OCD

This is my home
You've entered the Twilight zone
We can be alone
Now you've entered the Twilight zone

Why am I filled with insecurities? 
When I set my horn aglow
I can feel the power flow through me
How strong I am, I'd like to know

They say I'm greater than the great and powerful
But I still feel so small inside
And I'll be there at the eleventh hour though
I may want to run and hide

This is my home
You've entered the Twilight zone
We can be alone
Now you've entered the Twilight zone

I felt it the moment I realized 
How happy I was to hear you, to see you, 
How much I cared about you
How much I care

description:
A Scootaloo-themed track for a three track EP I'm working on for the CMC, and man did I have a lot of fun with this track^^.

In this track, I actually synthesized my own sound from scratch for once, instead of slight modifications on pre-made defaults, and the sound came out as a weird bouncy chorus thing that I blended in with the guitar like synth I love using so much, giving it a nice bounce^^.

Hope you guys enjoy as always!

title: Starlit Skies
description:
So, I've officially decided that I'm going to stick to my artistic trancey style used with this song. They always seem to come out so much better than my electronic-rock songs do; or maybe I just like making these more =P. The point is that I'm dropping ANY Electronic project I had in the workings including my next album, Pride and Flame and the CMC EP, although I may make some trance-like song for the 3 of them for that one instead.

Now then, this track I went to capture an image of aomeone gazing up at a starry sky with wonder and awe,and in the end this song came out simply beautifully ^^. Most likely, I'll start working on a Trance style album now, so look forward to more songs like this from now on, Trance songs are just so artistic and beautiful as well as a joy to make, no other style I've done makes me feel quite as proud of it as this song does, so I hope you all enjoy!

title: Go To Sleep (Nightmare Remix ft. Innate and Rainboom)
description:
So like, one day I was talkin' to my homie Rainboom on twitter about rap music. And he was all like "yo, rap to this" and I was all like, "k," and so I did and he thought it was pretty cool so he dropped a verse on the end of it and then I spent a good 12 hours trying to figure out how to export it correctly.  The End.

Aftermath's Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/AftermathMakesMusic

Rainboom's Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/RainboomMusic

Download Links Below!
MP3 (320 kb/s): http://www.mediafire.com/download/k80706rdgljwy8v/Aftermath+-+Go+To+Sleep+%28Nightmare+Remix%29+%28ft.+Innate+%26+Rainboom%29.mp3 

Vocals: (Lossless .WAV): http://www.mediafire.com/download/b6a2s252d20uour/Go+To+Sleep+%28Nightmare+Remix%29+Vocals.wav 

Lyrics:
Hey everypony my name is fluttershy
Ill be walkin through town makin everypony die
Silently I'm stalkin, walkin, starin at you
but you just keep talkin, gawkin
like you have a problem 
Whats your deal? do you want some?
sorry that was rude of me
hope you don't mind my authority
sometimes I just get carried away
and you'll read about me in the morning
stories gory, but they had it comin
so I'm not so sorry
Bore me, implore,
and leave me bleeding on the floor see

I'm a caring pony when it comes to animals
wild animals, not other ponies I'm a cannibal 
I eat em, chop em, brew em, stew em
all the while they like ask what I'm doin
eyes out, ears off, hooves gone, mane lost
Sing em songs when it gets late I help them shut their eyes
Then when they go to sleep I like to cut em into pieces
eviscerate their thighs
No wonder Pinkie Pie and I are friends
with her help I get to make ponies meet their ends
sure I might be going straight to hell
but I dont care as long as there are ponies there who I can Kill
Cause I'm evil
I'll deceive ya
I may look sweet and caring my true thoughts I'm never sharing
I'll leave a fucker staring at their end
Never gonna be the one to stop me
gonna leave you hopping
gonna leave you stopping and mopping
up your own blood
if ya gotta problem, me I'll solve it
with my hooks and other forms of mutilation
new temptations Ponies everywhere 
it's time I begin this starvation It's my new vocation

V2:
Why are these ponies so fuckin surprised
When my eyes turn to night, fill em full of fright,
No Twilight, nothing is alright
I front a kind smile with a 6 inch steak knife
Behind my back, imagine bones crack cause I lack a plan of attack when the sky turns black
My element of harmony is silly see, fuck everypony alive including Applejack
Nopony thanks me for what I do for them and all the kind words that I've said
Nopony cares about me, obviously, so by tonight's moonlight one of us will be dead
The blood drips from the tip of my blade and my lifetime has been fuckin' made
Feel so good like im on a float made of pony skin in the Summer Sun Celebration parade
My kindness is my greatest enemy, it gets the best of me
Apparently I can't parent these kitty cats and bunnies be-
Cause I'm a fucking scary monster in the closet and I'm awful
Filling coffins up with ponies, Unlawful they become fossils
Beneath my feet while I sip on my cup of tea, it's so sweet
How neat are the screams as my pony friends meet a mortal defeat
I love the happy feeling of ripping skin from meat and meat from bone
Stuff the guts of my furry friends so I'll never have to feel alone
Hush now, quiet now The pain hasn't even started yet
Don't waste your tears before this sawblade pierces right straight through your chest
Little Angel Bunny's skull makes a good teacup, don't you agree?
I've hung his eye balls on my door knob so ponies know "don't fuck with me"
Fluttershy is always the one to get kicked around, well not anymore
I'll capture all my PFF's and show them the true meaning of horror
Don't you wanna see how cute your horn looks up atop my head?
Don't fall asleep yet Rarity, I'll tell you when to go to bed

description:

title: Vision Potion
description:
Hallucinogens confirmed for MLP. It's strange; for humans, hallucinations are widely regarded as invalid experiences, since they are only experienced by one individual at a time, even if they are clearly valid to the individual. In the world of MLP, they've got incontrovertible proof of magic, so to suggest that a potion can make one see the past, even though nopony else can see it, just isn't that incredible. It's really downright mundane.
----------------------------------------------------------------
Shoutouts to Freewave, for being a bro and giving me a second opinion on the mix.
Thanks to mlptf2mods, as always, for being dears and providing great show samples.
Thanks to the people who make MLP, and make all this possible.

title: You'll Play Your Part Extended Synth Remix
description:
Toastbeard Episode Response for Season 4 Finale (ER426).

Created using audio file of "You'll Play Your Part" by Daniel Ingram. Remixed using Alexander Gross' Music Studio 2.5 for iOS. Rebalanced, remastered, and finalized using Adobe Audition.

Lyrics:
It isn't that I'm ungreatful for al the things I have earned, for all the journies I have taken, for all the lessons that I have learned.
But I wonder where I am going now, what my role is meant to be. I don't know how to travel to a furture that I can't see.

I have my wings, I wear this crown, I'm a princess, this is true. But it's still unclear to me, just what I am meant to do. I want to have a purpose, want to do all that I can. I want to make a contribution, I want to be a part of the plan. 

Your destiny's uncertain, and that's sometimes hard to take. But it will become much clearer, with every new choice you make.

Patience is never easy. I understand wanting more. I know how hard it is to wait, to spread out your wings and soar. 

But you stand here for a reason: Your gifted and you are strong. That crown is upon your head because you belong.

Know that your time is coming soon. As the sun rises, so does the moon. As love finds a place in every heart, you are a princess, you'll play your part.

We understand you wanting more. A chance to shine, a chance to soar.

Soon will come the day it turns around.

Know that your time is coming soon. As the sun rises, so does the moon. As love finds a place in every heart, you are a princess, you'll play your part.

Know that your time is coming soon. As the sun rises, so does the moon. As love finds a place in every heart, you are a princess, you'll play your part.

We understand you wanting more. A chance to shine, a chance to soar.

Soon will come the day it turns around.

Know that your time is coming soon. As the sun rises, so does the moon. As love finds a place in every heart, you are a princess, you'll play your part.

You are a princess, you'll play your part.

All Rights Reserved. No Copyright Infringement Intended.

title: Daring Do and the City of Gold
description:
Fellow denizens of the internet, I give you my newest piece! I actually started it about two months ago when I started to write out the first part while sitting in my music theory class. This piece has been largely inspired by the romantic period and because of that, i've included homages to Modest Mussorgsky (the promenade theme in the 3rd movement), Richard Strauss (Sunrise theme from "Also Sprach Zarathustra" at the beginning of the 5th movement) and George Bizet ("March of the Kings" from L'Arlesienne Suite no. 1 at the end of the 5th movement).

Movements:
The Chase - 0:00
Adventure and Discovery - 2:54
The Great Gates of Alvidoun - 4:04
Ancient Paradise - 6:07
The Temple of Night - 8:05
The Escape - 10:57
Tranquil Endings - 11:16

Cover Art - http://raikoh-illust.deviantart.com/art/Dare-347715785

title: Trixie Falls Down the Stairs
description:
Here's a new Serialist piece written over the past couple of weeks. At first I was thinking of a more atonal piece but then I kind of decided on a more chromatic sound. Its written for a chamber orchestra of 21 players.

The chromatic lines and wavelike melody convey a feeling of both hectic life and carelessness with an imminent "fall" at the end. Trixie should really watch where she's going.

title: William Anderson - Lunas Theme (Sonic Rainboom Mix)
description:
Basically, I really like Princess Luna a lot. I like her so much. I've written two tunes about her in a row, it seems.

I've wanted to remix Luna's theme ever since it first played in Sleepless in Ponyville. Musically, it is perfect for Luna, and I was absolutely thrilled that it reprised as her motif in For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils. I felt that it would always make a good progression for some dusky Melodic Trance.
----------------------------------------------------------------
Artwork by Matrosha123:
http://matrosha123.deviantart.com/art/Her-beautiful-night-361043292?q=gallery%3Amatrosha123%2F39603665&qo=25
----------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks to mlptf2mods for the samples, as always.
Thanks to William Anderson, for writing wonderful background music. Make sure you take some time to go listen to the show's background music every now and then. Anderson doesn't get enough credit.
And Thanks, finally, to everyone who makes MLP. You're all the best.

title: An Apples Honesty(Acoustic Folk Demo)
description:
EQD link: http://www.equestriadaily.com/2014/04/music-of-day-294.html

I wrote this song shortly after my younger brother passed away in December sort of as a way to cope with the emotions. Special thanks to my friend Steven for doing the vocals.

Lyrics
After all my chores were done on those long summer days
I'd play in the orchard until the sun would fade away
Where I dreamed of one day when I'd grow up big and strong
Just like my Father who taught me right from wrong

I never thought that life could change so fast
Even though it hurts my heart to look right back back upon the past
I am grateful for the love you gave to our family
You raised me to love all others and live a life of honesty
Live a life of honesty.

As the years went by our family began to grow
I gained a sister who I love more than you know
We were gently guided by our parents loving hearts
Until one winter day our lives were torn apart

I never thought that life could change so fast
Even though it hurts my heart to look right back back upon the past
I am grateful for the love you gave to our family
You raised us to love each other and live our lives in honesty
Live our lives in honesty.

Before you left this world we were blessed once again
Dear Mother, She knows you loved her, even if she can't remember when
You'd read her stories to help her sleep at night
She's grown so much now, you'd both smile at the sight

I never thought that life could change so fast
Even though it hurts my heart to look right back back upon the past
I am grateful for the love you gave to our family
You raised us to love each other and live our lives in honesty

title: 3.  Running Free
description:
Track 3 off of my [Hardstyle] For the Herd EP.

An anthem for Bronycon, of sorts...

My mind always drifts back to images of an open field, basking in a beautiful golden light, broken every now and then by an occasional tree, swaying in a light breeze as the leaves break off and drift down to a low sea of golden grasses pushing waves of distorted light as they carry the leaves with the wind.  Sounds of serenity, of the open meadow billowing softly, disturbed ever so slightly by a small group of ponies, sprinting through happily, the infinitely liberating feelings of freedom flowing through each of them, enjoying companionship without the slightest care for any of the bad in the world.  There's something about ponies just running freely over the hills and through the valleys, that lull me into an unprecedented state of tranquility, something I kept in mind when I made this track.

title: The Banishment
description:
My impressionistic piece (Ponyville Bliss) was well received so here's some expressionism! It's a harsh and dissonant piece that conveys the conflict and anguish in Celestia's mind as she banishes her beloved sister turned Nightmare Moon to the moon.

Darkness - 0:00
The Piece starts out with harsh chords to show the anger and jealousy coursing through Luna as she refuses to lower the moon and turns into Nightmare Moon. It continues into an a minor melodic line to represent the sorrow and fear in the ponies while retaining dissonance in the underlying chords to convey a feeling of darkness.

Conflict - 1:04
This section contains two keys, F major and G major, fighting each other in escalating conflict to represent the conflict between Celestia and Nightmare Moon.

Torn Soul - 2:05
This section dives further in atonalism and shows us the anguish and pain in Celestia after she banishes her sister.

Joy and Sorrow - 2:42
The final section of the piece includes a descending major line in 4/4 time to represent the joy of the ponies from Nightmare Moon's defeat. At the same time, the right hand plays a frantic line in the 3/8+2/4 time from the last section representing Celestia's continued anguish. This is also represented in the last two chords. The F major represents the celebration of the ponies through the Summer Sun Celebration while the quiet D minor represents Celestia's pain.

Art: http://www.deviantart.com/art/I-ll-come-back-for-you-260799629

title: Immortals
description:
Hey! Been on a semi-hiatus for the past month due to school and life. Anyways, here's a new modern piece. 

Its inspired by and contains the same rhythmic motive as the beginning of Glassworks by Phillip Glass to give a constant moving feeling, like you are moving through time. The whole piece is about Celestia and how she sees the world and time rush past her due to her immortality.

Cover Art: http://atryl.deviantart.com/art/Princess-Celestia-316775065

title: 7.  Atmozfears - F#CKING J#MP (Feral FurE's BRONYCON DO THE JUMP Remix)
description:
The final track, track 7, off my [Hardstyle] For the Herd EP.

Super ponified version of the original, with 3 different kicks and like 15 different synthesizers.  A high energy track I can definitely see being played (of course!) at the Bronycon Bronypalooza/concert/rave.

Threw in some trot sounds and lots of vocals addressing a distinctively pony crowd.

Any cursing is censored and covered.

We have reached the end of the EP!  Thank you guys so, so very much for sticking by and very generously giving me and these tracks your attention.  It really means a lot to me and I hope you have an absolutely magnificent day!

title: Cube-ing It Right
description:
Hello! So this week's toastbeard was trapped in a musical cube, and the first thing to come into my head was "cube-ing it right."

I jokingly told this to Gigglesplat, who then went ahead and made an NES cover of doing it right on famitracker. It was amazing, but I felt it needed something more so I went to his dorm, sang the vocoded part, made him sing panda's part, and mixed everything together. Enjoy!

title: 2.  Return of the New Lunar Republic
description:
Second track off of my [Hardstyle] For the Herd EP.

Super long song because it consists of a 4 minute-ish speech done to some semi-cheesy orchestral music.

This is another telling of the story of the New Lunar Republic.  One of the more popular fanfictions I've managed to find, and definitely one of the more enjoyable ones.  A very cinematic piece that actually incorporated the absolute most story telling I've ever put into a track, complete with plenty of things I've never tried my hoof at very much.

Folk Punk demo about everypony's favourite baby dragon!


Lyrics:
He spent all those years, sending letters
All those years organizing books better
Now what's Spike gonna do now that he feels lost?
So Twilight said "What'cha been thinking 'bout?"
Spike Said "That's the point, I can't think about nothing
Now I gotta find out who I am"

OI! OI! OI!

So he packed his things and went far away to find his true identity
All those questions swirling 'round in his head about where the hay he came from 
So he'll go out of town, he will get away. 
Finding his kind, as the Dragons take him in you can hear the mother buckers go. 

( solo)

A couple of eggs found in a Phoenix nest, 
He's told to smash them down to pass the Dragon test
Spike's the kind of guy he knows just what
Spike's the kind of guy he knows just what to do
What his pure heart tells him to

Cause his true friends are all around
Now he's back in Ponyville
Knowing he's loved by his Pony kin
Now he's back in ponyville
Shevling books and helping Twi, sending letters
Once a day he thanks his friends
Now he's back in Ponyville
Now he's back in Ponyville
Now he's back in Ponyville
Now he's back in Ponyville
Now he's back in Ponyville

title: Sunset Shimmer
description:
Ever wonder of their roles were reversed if Twilight would have ended up like Sunset?

Anyways, here's a track I spent about 4 months working on. I started it shortly after watching the second Equestria Girls movie. I'm a sucker for a redemption story and Sunset is uber cute in that movie. Sooo sad too! I just want to give her a hug and tell her everything is gonna be fine. I tried to capture both her firey side and the sad side of her story in this track. The struggle is real yal.

Pic: Thanks to Ilona The Sinister for letting me use their awesome Sunset Shimmer graphic called "The Three Forms of Sunset Shimmer. You can find the original here:
http://ilona-the-sinister.deviantart.com/art/The-3-forms-of-Sunset-Shimmer-505073162

title: Crusading for my Cutie Mark
description:
Every day I try something new in an attempt to find how I will shine
But I'm just a little colt, and Cheerilee says these things take time
I try so hard it seems I'll never stop crusading. Crusading for my cutie mark

Yet no matter how hard I try, everypony makes is seem as easy as taking a nap
Except for my new filly friends, who are surprisingly often covered in sap

We try so hard you know we'll never stop crusading. Crusading for our cutie marks

Blank flank, blank flank, they all shout. What they say hurts, but I tough it out
a cutie mark is earned, but I don't know how. I try and try and try but I want it now

Now I have friends who know how I feel
At the end of each day we go to our club house to plan out a brand new scheme
each one's crazier than the last, yet it never works out the way it would seem

We try so hard you know we'll never stop crusading. Crusading for our cutie marks
Every day, keep on going. Never stopping.
For our cutie marks man
Someday I think I'll find my cutie mark. Someday.

title: A is for Applejack
description: Why is this piece called A is for Applejack? Pretty much because the whole piece is based off of a first inversion A chord with an added 9th and why is the whole piece based of one chord you might ask? Because it's a minimalist piece. Minimalism is a very interesting style and is honestly one of my favorite styles of both visual art and music. Also, the style fits applejack so well in my mind. It conjures the image of routine and repetitive work, but a satisfying day on the farm for AJ.

title: Dashie B Goode
description:
Deep down in Equestria near Ponyville
Way up in the sky where the birds all chill
There floats a cloud house light as feather and ash
Where lives a little pony named Rainbow Dash
She never graduated at the top of her class
But when she's flappin her wings, you know she goes fast

Go Dashie Go!

She used to work a job giving sun and rain
But from her tricks and stunts she could not refrain
She'd twirl and zoom and she's drop and spin
Makes standing still feel like a deadly sin
All the ponies on the ground would shout and cry
You know, that little mare can fly!

Go Dashie Go!
Dashie B Goode

Her friends all told her "Honey, you don't need no colt."
One day you'll be the leader of the Wonder Bolts
Many ponies coming from miles around
To watch you in the air 'til the sun goes down
Maybe someday your name will be in the lights
Saying Dashie B. Goode tonight

title: March of the outcasts - TenderFlutter
description:
The idea for this track came to me about a year ago while thinking how is it posible for a pony (or person) to wait in exile several years without losing hope.

I mean, I'm sure this happens every day around the world. People forced to leave their homes because of war, diseases or poverty. And other people just leaving for personal reasons. Or just sent to the moon for making your big sister mad.

In any case, I think it would feel terribly bad to leave your home and your friends. But I also believe that we always find the strenght we need whithin our hearts.

Thanks for listening. Thanks for your support. But most important: thanks for your love. It has been an amazing year and I've made lots of friends around this fandom.

Carry on, my ponies. Love you all.

~Tender
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art credits for beautiful, sad and huggable Luna picture goes for the great and powerful Vicse! Check the original on his dA page

http://vicse.deviantart.com/art/A-Thousand-Years-Starts-With-One-Day-436366269

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Support me by downloading this track in full audio quality via Bandcamp!

https://tenderflutter.bandcamp.com/track/march-of-the-outcasts

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Listen me on SoundCloud!
https://soundcloud.com/tenderflutter

Follow me on Twitter (at your own risk!)

title: Sky
description:
Merry heartswarming eve everyone! Its 4:00 AM christmas morning and its upload time! (sorry, not a holiday piece)

This is a piece that starts off simple in a chord inspired by Steve Reich's "Electric Counterpoint" with some woodwind and piano. The piece intensifies to the climax before calming down again back to the starting chord. In it I try to capture the affinity between the pegasi and the sky, to capture the comfort and intimate connection between the two.

Watch and Subscribe on Youtube: http://youtu.be/rO8q2gk7IsA?list=UU4BcfaCIPAkUI54JjFbEtsQ
Download and Follow on Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/jbrewzy/sky

title: Shampoo Factory
description:
Well, it took us forever to finally work out our schedules to be free to work on this together, but DerpyCrash and I finally got around to another collab!  It's always an absolute pleasure working with you, good sir!  If you haven't already, make sure to go over, check out his stuff, and subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/DerpyCrash  He's a great musician and a pretty swell guy too!

Youtube Link:
http://youtu.be/qbMFU3kicfA

As always, free download over at Bandcamp:
https://leafrunner.bandcamp.com/track/shampoo-factory

Soundcloud Link:
https://soundcloud.com/leafrunner/shampoo-factory

We've both been pretty heavy into chiptune lately, both in classic game soundtracks and original artists.  Here's kind of a level theme for the shampoo factory that serves as the Maneiac's lair, so to speak.  It can get a bit wild, kinda like her mane! Nostalgia for the SNES days, both in composition and the video.  

DC made me learn FL Studio for this, so it was really my first dive into that.  It's nice being able to both work in the same DAW for once!  It was super fun working on this, I hope you guys enjoy as much as we did making it!  I'm sure we'll probably do another collab sometime in the future, we work well together.  I'm also down to maybe do some other collabs if I have the time.  My schedule's a bit all over the place right now, but drop me a message if interested!

As always, thanks so much for listening, commenting, subscribing.  You guys are the best!  Until next time, much love.  /)

LeafRunner - Composition, Programming, Mixing
DerpyCrash - Composition, Programming, Mastering, FL Studio Wizard Advice, Track Art

My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic is ©Hasbro and The Hub.

title: Into Everfree
description:
Hey everyone! Got a new piece. About 1/3 of it was written while I was messing around on my piano and the other 2/3rd is somewhat inspired by Steve Reich's "Electric Counterpoint."

This piece is split into 2 sections. The first section is called the "awe" section. It expresses the feeling of awe when one first encounters the Everfree Forest whether that awe is placed in beauty, size, or the amount of evil in such a forest.

At about a third of the way into the piece, the second section, the "fear" section, begins. This section is written in a minimalist style and expresses the growing feeling of fear and possibly a growing insanity from that fear as the section builds to the sudden climax at the end with no resolution to leave the listener wondering what happens after that. 

What happens to our explorer of this strange forest...

Cover Art is based off a screenshot from the show.

title: Epistemic
description:
Subjunctive, by Integral Archer, is a fanfic that I started out being ambivalent about, but as I've read it, it has become one of my favorite MLP fanfics for the deftness with which Archer takes you into Errenax's mind.

One of the themes in the story is deception, and the role language plays in deceptive acts. I wanted to explore that theme, as well as how language shapes our perception.

If you dig this, go over and read this story. It's definitely worth the time: http://www.fimfiction.net/story/81260/subjunctive
-------------------------------------------------
Purchase this tune: http://jexpsytrance.bandcamp.com/track/epistemic
-------------------------------------------------
Inspired by the fanfic, Subjunctive, by Integral Archer.
Thanks to mlptf2mods, as always, for the isolated vocals.
I don't even remember where the other quotes come from, to be honest. Random youtube vids.
And thank you to everyone who makes MLP everything that it is.

title: Magic (Original Mix)
description:
So yeah, it’s my 20th birthday today.  I made this over the last weekend as a little birthday gift to myself (woohoo) while on a very ill-timed vacation to Destin.

Was going to call it “Magic of Friendship” but quickly thought that it was excessively corny so I settled for just “Magic.”

Inspired by the magic of friendship, unsurprisingly, and by my second favorite pony, Twilight Sparkle, whom is quickly rising to meet my top favorite pony (Princess Luna of course!) at the very high top of my favorite’s list.

Anywhoozle, it’s a Tuesday, I’m out of my mind to be posting this right now, but it’s only once a year I get to celebrate being old lol.

Here's my remix for Sean-JS's remix competition... which I LOST! :'( Now that I think about it, I've never won a remix competition. I love to do them and usually make a good remix, but I never win. I didn't think I was going to win this one anyway because mine sounded a lot different than the original. It's REALLY hard to make a hands-up remix of a downtempo song. Anyway, hope you enjoy it! I've got some pieces in the making and because its been 3 weeks since my last upload, i've decided to upload this old piece thats been sitting on my disk for a while. Its pretty old. I think I wrote it either January or February this year. It's from when I used to write with a more baroque style.

title: Little A.J.
description:
This one goes for our favourite farmer pony Applejack and the backstory about her parents. 
The moral of this story is really simple: Work hard and be strong, because there is always someone depending on you. But never forget the ones who loved you, even though life seems to get harder day by day.

About the song now, I'm satisfied with the final result, I really am, and this is very rare let me tell ya since I always have something to complain about my work.

Also, you CANNOT IMAGINE the hard, really really HARD work I put on the instrumental part of the song at the end, so hope you guys reach that part and leave your opinions on the comments c:

----------------------------------------­----------------------------------------­----------------
ABOUT THE ART:
Oh, by the way, the mind behind those massive, beautiful, deep and lovely Applejack eyes is the talented The1Xeno1. Check the original on his dA page http://the1xeno1.deviantart.com/art/A...

----------------------------------------­----------------------------------------­----------------

Thank you guys. Love you all.

title: Tulips
description:

Cover art made by Claire Pouette. Support her and commission her! http://claire-pouette.tumblr.com/

===

Three minutes until I'm around the bend
Three minutes before sunrise in my head
Am I too crazy to believe in a chance
to spend a while with you
and and not care that you might forget
I want to run to meet you in the morning

A blessing and a curse to know you, oh, Morning
An angel in your eyes, an engine not warming up
to the idea that you and I can't be real
I wish our story wouldn't reset itself
'Cause there's no way I'm gonna sleep
with both of us stuck here

How many times can a moment dying hurt
In spite of knowing I never stood to lose at all
Though at a glance I'm real yet fleeting
maybe I can revel in a promise
I will never have to live up to
And so I run to meet you in the morning

A blessing and a curse to know you, oh, Morning
An angel in your eyes, an engine not warming up
to the idea that you and I can't be real
I wish our story wouldn't reset itself
'Cause there's no way I'm gonna sleep
with both of us stuck here

Caught in our first conversation once again
making a first impression once again
And expecting it to be the last
yet each time I'm disappointed
Can I allow myself a moment
to pretend I could be important to you
and look forward to when I wake up
and just run to hear you say
"Good morning, angel"

title: Tu presencia
description:
English and Spanish video description, viva~

[ENGLISH]

As it's said in the title, this track is going to be part of the Brohoofest 2015 Official Soundtrack. 

And what the hay is a Brohoofest? Well, it's the name of the southamerican brony convention that will be held in Perú on February 21. If you want to know more about it, please check the link below :3

http://brohoofest.bropegworld.com/

Now, about the song: you probably noticed that I tried to put as many as regional instruments and sounds that I could on this one to honor my southamerican culture.
The lyrics are inspired by that pretty pony you see in the cover art: Sari, brohoofest's official mascot. She has a very interesting story (wich hopefully you'll read in some comics once the convention starts) about unity, love, and all that pony stuff :3

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you like the song and want to support me, please consider downloading it at bandcamp :)

https://tenderflutter.bandcamp.com/track/tu-presencia
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[SPANISH]

Como está escrito en el título, este track va a formar parte del Sountrack Oficial de la Brohoofest 2015.

Y qué es una brohoofest? Bueno, es el nombre de la convención brony sudamericana a realizarse en Perú a partir del 21 de febrero. Si querés saber más sobre el asunto, date una vuelta por este link :3

http://brohoofest.bropegworld.com/

Ahora sobre la canción: probablemente hayan notado que quise poner la mayor cantidad de instrumentos y sonidos autóctonos posibles, para honrar mi condición de sudamericano también.
La letra está inspirada en esa ponita que se ve en la imagen del video. Su nombre es Sari y será la mascota oficial de la convención. Tiene una linda historia que seguramente van a poder leer en algunos cómics llegada la fecha de apertura del evento.

Una cosa más, si te gustó la canción y quieres ayudarme a continuar con mi trabajo, considera bajarla desde Bandcamp :3

https://tenderflutter.bandcamp.com/track/tu-presencia

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[LETRA EN ESPAÑOL / SPANISH LYRICS]

Soy parte de un todo y un signo de paz 
unión de ríos que llevan al mar 
llevo en mi canto la fuerza vital 
pueblos del sol de leyenda ancestral 

Ves lo que la unión ayudó a construir 
día en que todos estamos aquí 
son los cimientos de otra realidad 
dos mundos sí pueden vivir en paz 

Siento tu voz en el valle 
y tu presencia en el aire 
siento tu voz en el valle... 

Es el nacimiento de nuestra amistad 
brillan los cielos y ruge el mar 
el sol y la luna testigos serán 
en armonía y en libertad 

Siento tu voz en el valle 
y tu presencia en el aire 
Siento tu voz en el valle...

That's all, my dear pony friends. Take care!

Tender~

title: Babs Attitude (Featuring ScootaLewis)
description:
Lyrics: Babs Seed is a bitch and a bully, if you snitch
Then she’ll fully separate your body from your head
She’s a blank flank, but I think, to be frank,
The little filly can be scarier than an armored tank
I wanna thank all the bullies in Manehatten
For causing this to happen, For bringing her to sadden
The fillies who did nothing but want to be her friend
Little Apple Bloom was so excited, don’t pretend
That you didn’t see the look, when that bully Babs took
Away her dreams of friendship, and shook
Her faith in the idea of the cutie mark crusaders,
Having fun adventures, dismissive of the haters
But she said “see you later” and joined the mean girls
The edge of a smile curls, a cruel grin then unfurls
“Blank flank” she calls them, hypocritically so
And with her newfound friends she turns away to go.

Babs Seed, Babs Seed, Whatcha gonna do?
Got a bully on your tail. Gotta hide, gotta bail.
Babs Seed, Babs Seed, If she's after you,
Gotta run, gotta flee, gotta hurry, don't you see?
Babs Seed, Babs Seed, just a bad, bad seed.

Back home Babs didn’t get attention,
Just an everyday detention ‘cuz she didn’t wanna mention
That she didn’t start the fight, all she ever did was end it
Got a broken heart; mend it, and get ready to defend it
On the approval of her peers, she’s emotionally dependant
For the things she has done, you might think she’s unrepentant
But in truth she’s afraid that the bullies have won
In the light of the sun, she has seen what she’s become
All she wants to do is run from the evil she has done
But evil she’s not, just confused and alone
She’s a mess, and she’s totally misguided
In the wake of her terror all she wants to do is hide it
Put it back in the past where it can’t come back
Brighten up her heart to white from its former pitch black

title: Somewhere up here
description:
Like many artists around the world and over the decades, I've always wanted to write something about "the fly". It's kinda compulsory for us, it's like an instinct that wakes up in the middle of the night and whispers "hey... have you ever wanted to know how flying must feel?" Of course, all these feelings come to me as I watch the pegasus fly, and particulary RD, always eager for more and more air and speed. 

And so here it is, after some weeks of hard work: Somewhere up here.

Hope you enjoy :)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Download this track in full quality via Bandcamp. 
https://tenderflutter.bandcamp.com/track/somewhere-up-here

Your support is very important to me. Thanks, really, you have been way too awesome and kind with my other songs :)

title: Let's Have a Battle (Hard Rock Cover)
description:
This is the second release from 'Draconequus', a metal band in tribute to the spectacular show My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. This video is our hard rock tribute to Daniel Ingram’s song “Let’s Have a Battle” from the Equestria Girls: Rainbow Rocks soundtrack.

This was a fun little side project to commemorate the film’s release, and production for our album is still in full swing.

YOUTUBE VIDEO: http://youtu.be/_6XSOorCXcc

Credits:
Gaz (Lead Vocals)
DYLZAL (Lead Guitar and Backing Vocals) - https://www.youtube.com/user/dylzal
Sxp (Rhythm Guitar) - http://sxp-blog.tumblr.com/
PlunderSteed (Bass and Backing Vocals) - https://www.youtube.com/user/PlunderSteed

If you would like to see more from us, please subscribe to be notified when there are new releases.

Thumbnail Credit: http://uotapo.deviantart.com/art/POV-473053533

We heard you want to rock the school
We thought of something that is better

Why pretend we're all the same
When some of us shine brighter?
Shine brighter
Here's a chance to find your flame
Are you a loser or a fighter?
Me and you, you and me
Why don't we see who is better?
We don't have to be one and the same thing
Oh, what's so wrong with a little competition?
Are you afraid of failing the audition?

Battle! You wanna win it
Let's have a battle, battle of the bands
Let's have a battle, we'll go all in it
Let's have a battle, battle, battle

Let's have a battle, we'll go all in it
Let's have a battle, battle, battle
Battle of the bands

Guitar 1: I can beat you!
Guitar 2: Yeah, right.
Guitar 1: Are you serious? You suck at guitar.
Guitar 2: What, mate?  You can’t even read music.
Guitar 1: Well…ok, that’s true.  Whatever, I’m still better than you.
Guitar 2: Oh, yeah?  Prove it.
Guitar 1: Well ok, then.

Guitar 2: Hah, is that all you got?
Guitar 1: It’s pretty cold, which doesn’t make it easy.  Let’s see you do better, then!
Guitar 2: Well, alright.

Guitar 1: Huh.  That was actually kind of nice.
Guitar 2: Yeah?  Oh.  Uh…thank you.
Guitar 1: Yeah, I like how at the end there, you played a Major D.  Yeah, it really well concluded your um, your battle solo.  Man, what are we even doing? Why do people always want to fight each other? It’s preventing creative people from making great music.
Guitar 2: Well, uh…that’s actually true.  So uh, you want to jam?
Guitar 1: Yeah, ok.

Battle (x7)

Let's have a battle, battle of the bands
Let's have a battle, we'll go all in it
Let's have a battle, battle, battle
Battle of the…

title: Let Yourself Shine
description:
This is my first song ever published on the internet. It's a song about being yourself and not letting anybody get in the way of who you wanna be. Hope many of you find it inspiring.

Lyrics:

Verse
Rise up from the shadows
Stop your hiding now
Don't be afriad of the world 
Live your life as yourself
instead of what others may want you to be
Fuck their opinions and their judging faces
It doesn't matter to you
Let yourself shine

Chorus
Let yourself shine
Be the one on top of the world
Don't let anything stand in your way (Stand in your way)
Be proud of who you are
Don't be a people pleaser
Become one of a kind
Find out who you are!

Verse
Damnation is this world
Bullies are everywhere
An obstacle to happiness
Don't let them stand in your way 
You can fight them
All you need to do is to walk away 
They are stupid
They're not worth listening to

Breakdown
Become one of a kind

title: The Sun Can't Hide (Forever)
description:
This is a song we've been waiting a long time to release.

I wrote this song quite a while back for EBC's Fallout: Equestria radio play adaptation. ( https://www.youtube.com/user/EBC1Productions )

In one of the chapters of the book Kkat mentions this song being sung by Sapphire Shores. We wanted to know what it sounded like so here we are.

Sung by Metal-Mare. 
Lyrics by Dalken Starbyne: https://www.youtube.com/user/dalkenstarbyne
Art by Acesential: http://sta.sh/0pka3jz3lie
Based on that crazy fan fiction we all either love or freak out about, Fallout: Equestria by Kkat: http://www.equestriadaily.com/2011/04/story-fallout-equestria.html

Here, have some lyrics:

This is the way that it has to be
What I meant when I told you
My soul must be free

This is the way that it has to be
When the whole world turns blue
So why can't you see?

Things may seem bleak
And your knees may be weak
But remember what I told you
All those years ago

When the princess brings that big, old sun down
And the moon comes out for the night
And now that you can see her sister's crown
You should have nothing to fright

Because the sun can't hide forever
It doesn't matter wherever
It's never really gone
And we'll still go on and on

So when you're feeling down
And you're feeling blue
And nothing goes the way you want it to
Just remember what I told you
Just remember what I told you

Because the sun can't hide forever
It doesn't matter wherever
With or without a princess
With or without our sight
You can always find your own sun inside
To take away the night



And I'm telling you don't give up
No, don't give in
You're still in this
And in it to win

Without me, you'll be fine
Find your own light
Let it shine

Without me, you'll be fine
Because the sun can't hide
It's right there inside
So the sun can't hide 
No the sun can't hide
Forever

Cease and Desist (Metallica Parody)
description:
After many month of work, it's finally finished. Draconequus presents, 'Cease and Desist' a parody of Metallica's 'Seek and Destroy' about the copyright issues surrounding the brony community.

VIDEO: http://youtu.be/8agWaT2YbFo

Credits:
PlunderSteed (Director, Editor, Bass Player and various acting roles ) - https://www.youtube.com/user/PlunderSteed
DYLZAL (Lead Guitar and Vocals, Angry Singing Lawyer Role ) - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjX7d1UgizdzFcWaRvNLdYw
Sxp (Rhythm Guitar, Game Developer Role) - http://sxp-blog.tumblr.com/
Loony Spectre (Doer of Stuff) - https://www.youtube.com/user/spektrowski

Extras:
Erixeya - Juror 1
Roxikat - Juror 2, Lawyer 2
Gaz - Juror 3, Lawyer 1
JackShine - Juror 4, Studio Technician
Those nice girls at the mall
That one random dude who volunteered to throw PlunderSteed out of Chuck E. Cheese's (after the employees refused)
CALLUMRFUL - Fan Fic Writer and Camerawork
Fuegos - Camera man for Game Developer
Maya - Poni Drawer

If you would like to see more from us, please subscribe to be notified when there are new releases.
We also have a Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/DraconequusBand

Original: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J-tvJcTPxHc

_______________________________________________________

LYRICS:

Alright

We’re Scanning the screen on EQD tonight
We’re looking for you if you break copyright
there’s an empty feeling in our banks
but it’s nothing new, it’s just our quarterly gains

Running on our way, hiding you will pay
Spooling one thousand threads
Running on our way, hiding you will pay
Stuffing one thousand heads

Sewing, cease and desist
Stitching, cease and desist
Stuffing, cease and desist
Selling, cease and desist

There is no escape and that’s for sure
This is the end, you can’t fight anymore
Say goodbye to the game you’ve crafted
You’ve always been making, and now you’re
shafted

Running on our way, hiding you will pay
Coding one thousand lines
Running on our way, hiding you will pay
Coding one thousand lines

Writing, cease and desist
Compiling, cease and desist
Testing, cease and desist
Fighting, cease and desist

Our brains are on fire with a lawsuit to file
And it won’t go away, now your work is on trial
There is only one thing on our minds
Don’t try running away ‘cause your IP
we will find

Running on our way, hiding you will pay
Serving one thousand claims
Running on our way, hiding you will pay
Shading one thousand frames

Juicing, cease and desist
Gaming, cease and desist
Plushing, cease and desist
Rocking, cease and desist

title: Glimmerism
description:
I don't really think Starlight Glimmer's philosophy has anything to do with Marxism. There's an element of equally shared resources, sure, but only because the ability to use those resources is also equal. And those equal ability is the reason Marxism doesn't really apply. Marxism requires individuals of exceptional ability in order to succeed, hence the maxim, "from those according to their ability, to those according to their need." 

This is something different. There's a laudable ideal within this philosophy: equal value to society. But this ideal is enforced through a totalitarian and vaguely disturbing regime. It contrasts with the Mane 6's friendship, which succeeds in creating equal value through understanding and embracing the differences that make us special. The fact that it is so similar to Twilight's values, but with a twist of totalitarianism, is owing to the episode's nature as a dystopia, a literary genre wherein a laudable ideal is achieved in a society through increasingly disquieting means. This can either be used to discredit the philosophy with that ideal at its core (Atlas Shrugged, Bioshock), or as a cautionary tale not to let idealism be co-opted by totalitarianism (1984, The Giver). In this case, it seems to be the latter.

This fusing of the ideals of harmony embraced by the show, with a totalitarian mindset, needs a different name from Marxism, or Communism, or any similar thing. It's its own philosophy. Just as totalitarian Communist regimes were often named after the leaders that imposed them (Stalinism, Maoism), I think it makes sense to call this philosophy Glimmerism.

---------------------------------------------

Art by Cazra: http://cazra.deviantart.com/art/Equality-525055371

---------------------------------------------

Thanks as always to mlptf2mods for their amazing vocal only audio. This music is all the better for it.
Thanks, as well, to the people who make this show, for inspiring me so much.

---------------------------------------------

Purchase this track: https://jexpsytrance.bandcamp.com/track/glimmerism

title: One and the Same
description:
Doc's passion for science in Slice of Life really resonated with me, and I liked how it was cast as an alternate philosophy from magic. I always felt that the approach of magic in Equestria was a kind of brute force, make the cosmos do your bidding, thing, and science is more about understanding what happens when you don't try to impose your will on the environment. 

But, as Arthur C. Clark said, any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic, and as Agatha Heterodyne said, any sufficiently analyzed magic is indistinguishable from science. Really, this is at the core of my own headcanon regarding the relationship between magic and science in Equestria. 

I also liked that, for all of the references to Doctor Who, Doc is adamantly not just The Doctor in this story. He's his own character with his own background and motivations. He just happens to have a very Doctor-like eccentricity to him. 

Fun fact: That lead at the end was inspired when I leaned back in my char while working on this tune, and the piece of junk sqeaked really loudly, and I was like, "I don't remember making that synth!" But it sounded cool, so I put it in.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Purchase this tune: https://jexpsytrance.bandcamp.com/track/one-and-the-same

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Artwork by Muketti: muketti.deviantart.com/art/I-am-the-sand-in-the-bottom-half-of-the-hourglass-524905181

title: Don't You Worry Love (Swedish House Mafia Ponified) - Demo
description:
Sorry I haven't uploaded anything in a little bit, lots of work and vacationing and stuff.

Anyhoo, this song is supposed to be a certain concept, mainly the beginning-ish of my OC's life story.  And that story is basically this: GoldDust Feathers was Celestia and Luna's magical offspring experiment that they for some reason sent away to Earth at an early age, swearing  to bring him back to Equestria once he's come of age or something like that.
So, yeah, my OC is an Alicorn, blah blah blah, I don't wanna hear anything about it.  I think I've done a pretty good job on this song, so you can just enjoy that.

Background used: http://quasdar.deviantart.com/art/Equestria-at-Night-263381180

Original instrumental: Taken down from SoundCloud.
Check this song out on Pony.fm for lyrics.

title: Shadow Bolt (Miley Cyrus Ponified) - Demo
description:
Just thought I'd finish and move on from this one too before the week was out.  Yup, still kinda crappy, what with me straining my voice a little too much again, but you know, it's always nice to learn a few things from your blunders.

So, anyhoo, this is just what the title suggests; a little story of Rainbow Dash indulging just a teeny bit into the Shadow Bolts' behavior style, with an added small bonus of indulging my little love for tickling goodness.  Only a tad bit suggestive, nothing too major.

title: New Life (Taylor Swift Ponified) - Demo
description:
I know, once again, this has semi-okay recording quality. But that's okay, because listening to this stuff is a great way for me to figure out ways to improve my work and all that. 

So anyhoo, this is, yes, a prody of Taylor Swift's "Style", and I'll say, the original song is quite good, which is usually why I do parodies in the first place. Because mine are not meant to make fun of songs, but rather as a tribute to the songs. And these lyrics are a tribute to a future life in Equestria with lots of friendly ponies. :) 

CREDIT FOR INSTRUMENTAL BELONGS TO ORIGINAL ARTIST AND RENDERER.

title: Discord Tells it His Way
description:
VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hlyx4BPXvGQ

This is our 6th music video, and is our most involved musical production to date.  Overall the song is inspired by Discord and the many aspects of his personality.  Each section portrays a different element of his motivations and behavior.  Although we have our own specific ideas of what the sections mean, it’s up to you to interpret them on your own!  We’d love to hear your thoughts in the comment section.

With each song, we try to do something new and a little different.  For this one we decided to perform the piece as an instrumental with no lyrical content, allowing the melodies alone to tell the story. Additionally, we switched up the band’s lineup a little bit for the first time: Dylzal played bass guitar and PlunderSteed played piano and synths.  Finally, this is also the first time we’ve taken a distributed approach to the songwriting.  Each member wrote a different section, then presented it to the other members to critique and tweak to ensure it flowed with the rest of the composition.  At nearly 12 minutes in length, it is by far our longest piece yet.  This production was very challenging in ways that we did not anticipate, since it frequently put us outside of our comfort zones.

A separate video will be available in the coming week, where we share our thoughts on the nitty gritty parts of the production.

We hope you enjoy the song, and we look forward to answering your questions.  As this video goes live, we are already almost halfway through recording our next song, and we have even begun writing the song that will be released after that.

Album Art: http://www.deviantart.com/art/Discord-288082125

Credits:
Dylzal: Lead Guitar, Bass, Drum Arrangements
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjX7d1UgizdzFcWaRvNLdYw

Sxp: Rhythm Guitar
https://www.youtube.com/user/sxpgt

PlunderSteed: Piano and Synths
https://www.youtube.com/user/PlunderSteed

Discord: Vocals
%#&#^36$#(#)????

title: Bad Trip
description:
I like Luna. I like dark, trippy shit. This had to happen. I really liked DPDMS, not just because it was a Luna episode, but because of the way it used metaphorical imagery to convey some very complex and difficult to explain psychological processes. In particular how Luna both literally and figuratively internalized her guilt by bringing the Tantibus into herself. That's some heavy shit. 

This tune's not really about that, though. It's more of an Alternate Universe, what if Luna had not succeeded, kind of thing. The Tantibus getting out of the dream world is a kinda terrifying concept. So have some scary minimal dark psytrance.

Also, gosh, it's been some time since my last post. I apologize, particularly because it's mostly been me being lazy, but I've also been really busy getting ready to ship out for Basic Training with the Army. I ship out on the twentieth, and that's 9 weeks, so expect a bit of silence for the next couple months. After that, I intend to get back into making music whenever I have free time, so don't expect me to disappear entirely.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Purchase this tune:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Artwork by Winternachts: http://www.deviantart.com/art/Nemesis-Me-559696892

Sources Sampled: 
MLP FiM S5E13: Do Princesses Dream of Magic Sheep

Big thanks to mlptf2mods, as always, for always being bros and bringing that swag voice only audio.

description:
Nightmare night is full of surprises,
put on your guises, 
come and play!

Bring your fear, there no where to hide,
there's a spook by your side tonight!

You'll get lost in the haunted maze.
You will die from the nightmare craze!

on this night!

nightmare night?

With the moon so bright in the sky,
are you safe from the eyes of 
nightmare moon?

You might think it's all fun and games,
but there's plenty a fright to see!

Ancient bones prepped to scare.
Step outside…if you DARE!!

It's a fright,
on this night!
Will you live through
nightmare night?

It's a fright,
on this night!
Will you live through
nightmare night?

Lightning bright!
What a sight!
You can't run from 
nightmare night!

Morning bells, the fog is receding.
You might think we're leaving,
guess again!

Nightmare night will always surround you!
You'll never forget this night!

title: Sky and Me (Anneli Heed & the Wasteland Wailers)
The Ballad of Cranky and Matilda
face your fears ft. pinkie pie
'Flutterwonder' Rock Cover by Draconequus (Dylzal)
description:
VIDEO: https://youtu.be/15LlAsNkksg

For this release, we go back to a Brony classic, Flutterwonder.

The song is well known for it use of sentence mixing from the song 'So Many Wonders' in order to create a melody that is very different from the original. But the song also has other admirable qualities, including being very well paced and musically being very graceful and beautiful.

I thought it would be fun to do a cover of this song, as not only did I like the song itself, but I thought it would a challenge for me to make an arrangement of a song that uses only 4 chords that is well paced and doesn't get repetitive. I actually made this arrangement 5 months ago. When I showed it to the others we were still working on Discord and we obviously couldn't shift our attention onto it. Recently though, we decided that if we wanted to start making more videos and music we would have have to start putting less focus on having everyone in the videos, so everyone didn't have to play catch up when learning all the material. So this time, it's just me...oh, and Andrea Libman for voicing Fluttershy for me :P

Alternative Download:
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/draconequus-band/flutterwonder (MP3)

Original by PinkiePieSwear: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=viTkj...
B-roll: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dfj0G...
Thumbnail: (Internet's going super slow where I am, I'll but sort this out later)
________________________________________­________________________

LYRICS:

...Should I even bother...
...nah

title: Xrystallion -new beginning- (as うすうすベア)
description: ここで彼は、王に力を与え、最後にクリスタルポニーの残りのために正義を持っているのに役立つと判断された孤独な、英雄的な結晶種牡馬を意味します。ブレイブ、まだ彼の最高のに非常に雄大な、彼はあなたがそれを知っている前に、彼はその後、結晶ポニーに真の英雄となり、香りの彼の知的で印象的な感覚と一緒にだけで簡単にフラッシュで何かを感じることができる、と帝国は最終的になりますすべてのそれらの年後に上昇します。
